  2362                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2363                                  
  2364                                  ;************************************************************************
  2365                                  ;*									*
  2366                                  ;*	device driver entry points. these are the initial		*
  2367                                  ;*	  'interrupt' hooks out of the device driver chain.		*
  2368                                  ;*	  in the case of our resident drivers, they'll just		*
  2369                                  ;*	  stick a fake return address on the stack which		*
  2370                                  ;*	  points to dispatch tables and possibly some unit		*
  2371                                  ;*	  numbers, and then call through a common entry point		*
  2372                                  ;*	  which can take care of a20 switching				*
  2373                                  ;*									*
  2374                                  ;************************************************************************
  2375                                  
  2376                                  ; 01/10/2022 - Erdogan Tan
  2377                                  ; (disassembled MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS code here with fixed table
  2378                                  ;  addresses, they will be changed to table labels later)
  2379                                  
  2380                                  ; 09/12/2022
  2381                                  
  2382                                  con_entry:				
  2383 00000700 E84000                  		call	cdev_entry
  2384                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2385                                  		;dw 0E4h		; con_table
  2386 00000703 [E300]                  		dw con_table	
  2387                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  2388                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2389                                  
  2390                                  prn0_entry:				
  2391 00000705 E83B00                  		call	cdev_entry
  2392                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2393                                  		;dw 0FBh		; prn_table
  2394 00000708 [FA00]                  		dw prn_table
  2395                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  2396 0000070A 0000                    		db 0, 0
  2397                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2398                                  
  2399                                  prn1_entry:				
  2400 0000070C E83400                  		call	cdev_entry
  2401                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2402                                  		;dw 0FBh		; prn_table
  2403 0000070F [FA00]                  		dw prn_table
  2404                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  2405 00000711 0001                    		db 0, 1
  2406                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2407                                  
  2408                                  prn2_entry:

  2410                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2411                                  		;dw 0FBh		; prn_table

  2413                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  2414 00000718 0102                    		db 1, 2

  2416

  2431                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  2432 00000726 00                      		db 0

  2450 00000732 02                      		db 2

  2452

  2455                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2456                                  		;dw 130h		; aux_table

  2483                                  
  2484                                  ;************************************************************************
  2485                                  ;*									*
  2486                                  ;*	Ensure A20 is enabled before jumping into code in HMA.		*
  2487                                  ;*	This code assumes that if Segment of Device request packet is	*
  2488                                  ;*	DOS DATA segment then the Device request came from DOS & that	*
  2489                                  ;*	A20 is already on.						*
  2490                                  ;*									*
  2491                                  ;************************************************************************
  2492                                  
  2493                                  cdev_entry:	; proc near		
  2494 00000743 2E803E[0D00]00          		cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0
  2495 00000749 740D                    		jz	short ce_enter_codeseg
  2496                                  				; optimized for DOS in HMA
  2497 0000074B 50                      		push	ax
  2498 0000074C 2EA1[0300]              		mov	ax, [cs:DosDataSg]
  2499 00000750 2E3906[1400]            		cmp	[cs:ptrsav+2], ax
  2500 00000755 58                      		pop	ax
  2501 00000756 7505                    		jnz	short not_from_dos
  2502                                  				; jump is coded this way to fall thru
  2503                                  				; in 99.99% of the cases
  2504                                  ce_enter_codeseg:
  2505 00000758 2EFF2E[DE06]            		jmp	far [cs:cdev]			
  2506                                  		;jmp	dword ptr cs:cdev
  2507                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2508                                  
  2509                                  not_from_dos:				
  2510 0000075D E86200                  		call	EnsureA20On
  2511 00000760 EBF6                    		jmp	short ce_enter_codeseg
  2512                                  
  2513                                  ;************************************************************************
  2514                                  ;*									*
  2515                                  ;*	outchr - this is our int 29h handler. it writes the		*
  2516                                  ;*	   character in al on the display using int 10h ttywrite	*
  2517                                  ;*									*
  2518                                  ;************************************************************************
  2519                                  
  2520                                  outchr:					
  2521 00000762 50                      		push	ax		; int 29h handler
  2522 00000763 56                      		push	si
  2523 00000764 57                      		push	di
  2524 00000765 55                      		push	bp
  2525 00000766 53                      		push	bx
  2526 00000767 B40E                    		mov	ah, 0Eh
  2527 00000769 BB0700                  		mov	bx, 7
  2528 0000076C CD10                    		int	10h		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTER AND	ADVANCE	CURSOR (TTY WRITE)
  2529                                  					; AL = character, BH = display page (alpha modes)
  2530                                  					; BL = foreground color	(graphics modes)
  2531 0000076E 5B                      		pop	bx
  2532 0000076F 5D                      		pop	bp
  2533 00000770 5F                      		pop	di
  2534 00000771 5E                      		pop	si
  2535 00000772 58                      		pop	ax
  2536 00000773 CF                      		iret
  2537                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2538                                  
  2539                                  ;************************************************************************
  2540                                  ;*									*
  2541                                  ;*	block13 - our int13 hooker					*
  2542                                  ;*									*
  2543                                  ;************************************************************************
  2544                                  
  2545                                  block13:				
  2546 00000774 2E803E[0D00]00          		cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0
  2547 0000077A 7408                    		jz	short skipa20
  2548 0000077C E85400                  		call	IsA20Off	; A20 Off?
  2549 0000077F 7503                    		jnz	short skipa20
  2550 00000781 E84300                  		call	EnableA20	; assure a20 enabled
  2551                                  
  2552                                  skipa20:				
  2553 00000784 2E8C1E[1C00]            		mov	[cs:i13_ds], ds	; save caller's ds for call-through
  2554 00000789 9C                      		pushf			; fake interrupt
  2555 0000078A 2EFF1E[EA06]            		call	far [cs:i13x]
  2556                                  		;call	dword ptr cs:i13x
  2557                                  					; call through Bios_Code entry table
  2558 0000078F 2E8E1E[1C00]            		mov	ds, [cs:i13_ds]
  2559 00000794 CA0200                  		retf	2
  2560                                  
  2561                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  2562                                  
  2563                                  ; the int13 hook calls back here to call-through to the ROM
  2564                                  ; this is necessary because some people have extended their
  2565                                  ; ROM BIOSs to use ds as a parameter/result register and
  2566                                  ; our int13 hook relies heavily on ds to access Bios_Data
  2567                                  
  2568                                  call_orig13:	; proc far		
  2569 00000797 8E1E[1C00]              		mov	ds, [i13_ds]	; get caller's ds register
  2570 0000079B 9C                      		pushf			; simulate an int13
  2571 0000079C 2EFF1E[B400]            		call	far [cs:Orig13]
  2572                                  		;call	cs:Orig13
  2573 000007A1 2E8C1E[1C00]            		mov	[cs:i13_ds], ds
  2574 000007A6 0E                      		push	cs
  2575 000007A7 1F                      		pop	ds		; restore ds ->	Bios_Data before return
  2576                                  
  2577 000007A8 9C                      		pushf
  2578                                  		; 10/12/2022
  2579                                  		; ds = cs
  2580 000007A9 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0	; 16/10/2022
  2581                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0
  2582 000007AE 7408                    		jz	short corig13_popf_retf
  2583 000007B0 E82000                  		call	IsA20Off
  2584 000007B3 7503                    		jnz	short corig13_popf_retf
  2585 000007B5 E80F00                  		call	EnableA20
  2586                                  corig13_popf_retf:			
  2587 000007B8 9D                      		popf
  2588 000007B9 CB                      		retf
  2589                                  
  2590                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2591                                  
  2592                                  ; BIOSDATA:07BBh (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  2593                                  ; BIOSDATA:07BBh (MSDOS 5.0, IO.SYS) ; 16/10/2022
  2594                                  
  2595 000007BA 9000FFFF                HiMem:		dd 0FFFF0090h

  2603                                  ;************************************************************************
  2604                                  ;*									*
  2605                                  ;*	EnsureA20On - ensure that a20 is enabled if we're running	*
  2606                                  ;*	  in the HMA before interrupt entry points into Bios_Code	*
  2607                                  ;*									*

  2609                                  
  2610                                  EnsureA20On:	; proc near		
  2611 000007C2 E80E00                  		call	IsA20Off
  2612                                  		;jz	short EnableA20
  2613                                  		;retn
  2614                                  		; 18/12/2022
  2615 000007C5 750B                    		jnz	short A20On_retn	
  2616                                  
  2617                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2618                                  
  2619                                  
  2620                                  EnableA20:	; proc near		
  2621 000007C7 50                      		push	ax
  2622 000007C8 53                      		push	bx
  2623 000007C9 B405                    		mov	ah, 5	 ; local enable a20
  2624                                  		;call	cs:xms
  2625 000007CB 2EFF1E[0E00]            		call	far [cs:xms] ; 16/10/2022
  2626 000007D0 5B                      		pop	bx
  2627 000007D1 58                      		pop	ax
  2628                                  A20On_retn:	; 18/12/2022	
  2629 000007D2 C3                      		retn
  2630                                  
  2631                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2632                                  
  2633                                  
  2634                                  IsA20Off:	; proc near		
  2635 000007D3 1E                      		push	ds
  2636 000007D4 06                      		push	es
  2637 000007D5 51                      		push	cx
  2638 000007D6 56                      		push	si
  2639 000007D7 57                      		push	di
  2640 000007D8 2EC536[BA07]            		lds	si, [cs:HiMem]
  2641 000007DD 2EC43E[BE07]            		les	di, [cs:LoMem]
  2642 000007E2 B90800                  		mov	cx, 8
  2643 000007E5 F3A7                    		repe cmpsw
  2644 000007E7 5F                      		pop	di
  2645 000007E8 5E                      		pop	si
  2646 000007E9 59                      		pop	cx
  2647 000007EA 07                      		pop	es
  2648 000007EB 1F                      		pop	ds
  2649 000007EC C3                      		retn
  2650                                  
  2651                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2652                                  
  2653                                  DisableA20:
  2654 000007ED 50                      		push	ax
  2655 000007EE 53                      		push	bx
  2656 000007EF B406                    		mov	ah, 6		; local disable A20
  2657 000007F1 2EFF1E[0E00]            		call	far [cs:xms]
  2658                                  		;call	cs:xms
  2659 000007F6 5B                      		pop	bx
  2660 000007F7 58                      		pop	ax
  2661 000007F8 C3                      		retn
  2662                                  
  2663                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2664                                  
  2665                                  ;************************************************************************
  2666                                  ;*									*
  2667                                  ;*	int19 - bootstrap interrupt -- we must restore a bunch of the	*
  2668                                  ;*	  interrupt vectors before resuming the original int19 code	*
  2669                                  ;*									*
  2670                                  ;************************************************************************
  2671                                  
  2672                                  int19:					
  2673 000007F9 0E                      		push	cs
  2674 000007FA 1F                      		pop	ds
  2675 000007FB 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; 16/10/2022
  2676 000007FF B90500                  		mov	cx, 5		; NUMROMVECTORS
  2677                                  		;mov	si, offset RomVectors
  2678 00000802 BE[0001]                		mov	si, RomVectors	; 19/10/2022
  2679                                  next_int:				
  2680 00000805 AC                      		lodsb			; get int number
  2681 00000806 98                      		cbw			; assume < 128
  2682 00000807 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  2683 00000809 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; int *	4
  2684 0000080B 89C7                    		mov	di, ax
  2685 0000080D AD                      		lodsw
  2686 0000080E AB                      		stosw
  2687 0000080F AD                      		lodsw
  2688 00000810 AB                      		stosw			; install the saved vector
  2689 00000811 E2F2                    		loop	next_int
  2690 00000813 803E[4006]00            		cmp	byte [int19sem], 0 ; 19/10/2022
  2691 00000818 7422                    		jz	short doint19
  2692 0000081A BE[4106]                		mov	si, i19_lst	; stacks code has changed these hardware interrupt vectors
  2693                                  					; stkinit in sysinit1 will initialize int19oldxx values
  2694 0000081D B90E00                  		mov	cx, 14		; num_i19
  2695                                  
  2696                                  i19_restore_loop:			
  2697 00000820 AC                      		lodsb			; get interrupt	number
  2698 00000821 98                      		cbw			; assume < 128
  2699 00000822 89C7                    		mov	di, ax
  2700 00000824 AD                      		lodsw			; get original vector offset
  2701 00000825 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; save it
  2702 00000827 AD                      		lodsw
  2703 00000828 83FBFF                  		cmp	bx, 0FFFFh	; check	for 0ffffh (unlikely segment)
  2704 0000082B 740D                    		jz	short i19_restor_1 ; opt no need to check selector too

  2729                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2730                                  ;
  2731                                  ; procedure : int15
  2732                                  ;
  2733                                  ;		Int15 handler for recognizing ctrl-alt-del seq
  2734                                  ;		If it recognizes ctrl-alt-del and if DOS was
  2735                                  ;		is running high, it Erases the VDISK header
  2736                                  ;		present at 1MB boundary
  2737                                  ;
  2738                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2739                                  
  2740                                  ; 16/10/2022
  2741                                  ;DELKEY		equ	53h
  2742                                  ;ROMDATASEG	equ	40h
  2743                                  KBFLAG		equ	17h
  2744                                  ;CTRLSTATE	equ	04h
  2745                                  ;ALTSTATE	equ	08h
  2746                                  
  2747                                  Int15:		; proc near		
  2748                                  		;cmp	ax, 4F00h+DELKEY
  2749 00000848 3D534F                  		cmp	ax, 4F53h	; del keystroke ?
  2750 0000084B 7405                    		jz	short int15_1
  2751 0000084D 2EFF2E[0B01]            		jmp	far [cs:Old15]	; 16/10/2022
  2752                                  		;jmp	cs:Old15
  2753                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2754                                  
  2755                                  int15_1:				
  2756 00000852 1E                      		push	ds
  2757 00000853 50                      		push	ax
  2758 00000854 B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h		; ROMDATASEG
  2759 00000857 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  2760                                  		;mov	al, ds:17h	; [KBFLAG]
  2761                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2762 00000859 A01700                  		mov	al, [KBFLAG]
  2763 0000085C 240C                    		and	al, 0Ch		; (CTRLSTATE | ALTSTATE)
  2764 0000085E 3C0C                    		cmp	al, 0Ch		; (CTRLSTATE | ALTSTATE)
  2765 00000860 750C                    		jnz	short int15_2
  2766 00000862 0E                      		push	cs
  2767 00000863 1F                      		pop	ds
  2768 00000864 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0	; is DOS running from HMA
  2769 00000869 7403                    		jz	short int15_2
  2770 0000086B E80800                  		call	EraseVDiskHead
  2771                                  int15_2:				
  2772 0000086E 58                      		pop	ax
  2773 0000086F 1F                      		pop	ds
  2774 00000870 F9                      		stc
  2775 00000871 2EFF2E[0B01]            		jmp	far [cs:Old15]	; 16/10/2022
  2776                                  		;jmp	cs:Old15
  2777                                  
  2778                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2779                                  
  2780                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2781                                  ;
  2782                                  ; procedure : EraseVDiskHead
  2783                                  ;
  2784                                  ;		Erases the VDisk Header present in the 1MB boundary
  2785                                  ;
  2786                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2787                                  
  2788                                  EraseVDiskHead:	; proc near		
  2789 00000876 50                      		push	ax
  2790 00000877 51                      		push	cx
  2791 00000878 57                      		push	di
  2792 00000879 06                      		push	es
  2793 0000087A E845FF                  		call	EnsureA20On
  2794 0000087D B8FFFF                  		mov	ax, 0FFFFh	; HMA seg
  2795 00000880 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  2796 00000882 BF1000                  		mov	di, 10h		; point	to VDISK header
  2797 00000885 B91000                  		mov	cx, 10h		; size of vdisk	header
  2798 00000888 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  2799 0000088A F3AB                    		rep stosw		; clear	it
  2800 0000088C 07                      		pop	es
  2801 0000088D 5F                      		pop	di
  2802 0000088E 59                      		pop	cx
  2803 0000088F 58                      		pop	ax
  2804 00000890 C3                      		retn
  2805

  2849                                  ;SR; WIN386 support
  2850                                  
  2851                                  ; WIN386 instance data structure
  2852                                  ;
  2853                                  ; Here is a Win386 startup info structure which we set up and to which
  2854                                  ; we return a pointer when Win386 initializes.
  2855                                  
  2856 0000089A 0300                    Win386_SI:	db 3, 0			; SI_Version
  2857                                  					; Startup Info for Win386
  2858 0000089C 00000000                SI_Next:	dd 0			; pointer to next info structure
  2859 000008A0 00000000                		dd 0			; a field we don't need
  2860 000008A4 00000000                		dd 0			; another field	we don't need
  2861 000008A8 [AC08]                  SI_Instance:	dw Instance_Table
  2862 000008AA 7000                    		dw 70h	; Bios_Data	; far pointer to instance table
  2863                                  
  2864                                  ; This table gives Win386 the instance data in the BIOS and ROM-BIOS data
  2865                                  ; areas. Note that the address and size of the hardware stacks must
  2866                                  ; be calculated and inserted at boot time.
  2867                                  
  2868 000008AC 00005000                Instance_Table:	dw 0, 50h		; print	screen status...
  2869 000008B0 0200                    		dw 2			; ... 2	bytes
  2870 000008B2 0E005000                		dw 0Eh,	50h		; ROM Basic data...
  2871 000008B6 1400                    		dw 14h			; ... 14H bytes
  2872 000008B8 [0C00]                  		dw altah		; a con	device buffer...
  2873 000008BA 7000                    		dw 70h			; Bios_Data segment
  2874 000008BC 0100                    		dw 1			; ... 1 byte
  2875                                  
  2876                                  NextStack:
  2877                                  
  2878                                  ; NOTE:  If stacks are disabled by STACKS=0,0, the following
  2879                                  ;	instance items WILL NOT be filled in by SYSINIT.
  2880                                  ;	That's just fine as long as these are the last items
  2881                                  ;	in the instance list since the first item is initialized
  2882                                  ;	to 0000 at load time.
  2883                                  
  2884 000008BE 00000000                		dw 0, 0			; pointer to next stack	to be used...
  2885 000008C2 0200                    		dw 2			; ... 2 bytes
  2886 000008C4 00000000                IT_StackLoc:	dd 0			; location of hardware stacks
  2887 000008C8 0000                    IT_StackSize:	dw 0			; size of hardware stacks
  2888 000008CA 00000000                		dd 0			; terminate the	instance table
  2889                                  
  2890                                  					;SR;
  2891 000008CE 00                      IsWin386:	db 0			; Flag to indicate whether
  2892                                  					; Win386 is running or not
  2893                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2894                                  
  2895                                  ;This routine was originally in BIOS_CODE but this causes a lot of problems
  2896                                  ;when we call it including checking of A20. The code being only about 
  2897                                  ;30 bytes, we might as well put it in BIOS_DATA
  2898                                  
  2899                                  V86_Crit_SetFocus:			
  2900 000008CF 57                      		push	di
  2901 000008D0 06                      		push	es
  2902 000008D1 53                      		push	bx
  2903 000008D2 50                      		push	ax
  2904 000008D3 31FF                    		xor	di, di
  2905 000008D5 8EC7                    		mov	es, di
  2906 000008D7 BB1500                  		mov	bx, 15h		; Device ID of DOSMGR device
  2907 000008DA B88416                  		mov	ax, 1684h	; Get API entry	point
  2908 000008DD CD2F                    		int	2Fh		; - Multiplex -	MS WINDOWS - GET DEVICE	API ENTRY POINT
  2909                                  					; BX = virtual device (VxD) ID,	ES:DI =	0000h:0000h
  2910                                  					; Return: ES:DI	-> VxD API entry point,	or 0:0 if the VxD does not support an API
  2911 000008DF 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  2912 000008E1 09F8                    		or	ax, di
  2913 000008E3 740B                    		jz	short Skip	; Here,	es:di is address of API	routine.
  2914                                  					; Set up stack frame to	simulate a call.
  2915 000008E5 0E                      		push	cs
  2916                                  		;mov	ax, offset Skip
  2917 000008E6 B8[F008]                		mov	ax, Skip
  2918 000008E9 50                      		push	ax
  2919 000008EA 06                      		push	es
  2920 000008EB 57                      		push	di		; API far call address
  2921 000008EC B80100                  		mov	ax, 1		; SetFocus function number
  2922 000008EF CB                      		retf			; do the call
  2923                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2924                                  
  2925                                  Skip:					
  2926 000008F0 58                      		pop	ax
  2927 000008F1 5B                      		pop	bx
  2928 000008F2 07                      		pop	es
  2929 000008F3 5F                      		pop	di
  2930 000008F4 CB                      		retf
  2931                                  
  2932                                  ;End WIN386 support

  3200 000012BC 00FF010000004E4F20-     		db 0, 0FFh, 1, 0, 0, 0,	4Eh, 4Fh, 20h, 4Eh, 41h, 4Dh, 45h
  3200 000012C5 4E414D45           
  3201 000012C9 202020200000000000-     		db 20h,	20h, 20h, 20h, 0, 0, 0,	0, 0, 46h, 41h,	54h, 31h
