  8153 000001BF B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8154 000001C2 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8155 000001C4 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8156                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8157                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8158                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8159                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8160 000001C6 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8161 000001C7 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8162 000001C9 C3                      		retn
  8163                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8164                                  
  8165                                  gotchr:					
  8166 000001CA 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8167 000001CC 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8168 000001CE 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8169 000001D2 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8170 000001D4 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8171                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8172                                  
  8173                                  notbrk:					
  8174 000001D6 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8175 000001D9 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8176 000001DB B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8177 000001DD EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8178                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8179                                  
  8180                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8181 000001DF 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8182 000001E4 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8183 000001E6 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8184 000001E8 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8185 000001EA 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8186 000001ED 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8187 000001EF B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8188                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8189                                  rdexit:					
  8190 000001F1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8191 000001F5 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8192                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8193                                  bc_exvec:				
  8194 000001F9 F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8195                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8196 000001FA C3                      		retn
  8197                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8198                                  
  8199                                  ;************************************************************************
  8200                                  ;*									*
  8201                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8202                                  ;*									*
  8203                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8204                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8205                                  ;*									*
  8206                                  ;************************************************************************
  8207                                  
  8208                                  con_writ:
  8209                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8210 000001FB E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8211                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8212                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8213                                  con_lp:					
  8214 000001FD 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8215 00000200 47                      		inc	di
  8216 00000201 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8217                                  					; AL = character to display
  8218 00000203 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8219                                  cc_ret:					
  8220 00000205 F8                      		clc
  8221 00000206 C3                      		retn
  8222                                  
  8223                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8224                                  
  8225                                  ;************************************************************************
  8226                                  ;*									*
  8227                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8228                                  ;*									*
  8229                                  ;************************************************************************
  8230                                  
  8231                                  con_flush:
  8232 00000207 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8233                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8234 0000020C B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8235 0000020E CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8236                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8237                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8238                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8239 00000210 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8240 00000212 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8241 00000214 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8242                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8243 00000216 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8244                                  
  8245                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8246                                  
  8247                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8248                                  
  8249                                  ;************************************************************************
  8250                                  ;*									*
  8251                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8252                                  ;*									*
  8253                                  ;************************************************************************
  8254                                  
  8255                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8256                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8257                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8258                                  
  8259                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8260                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8261                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8262                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8263                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8264                                  ;
  8265                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8266                                  
  8267                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8268                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8269                                  
  8270                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8271                                  
  8272                                  ;************************************************************************
  8273                                  ;*									*
  8274                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8275                                  ;*									*
  8276                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8277                                  ;*									*
  8278                                  ;************************************************************************
  8279                                  
  8280                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8281 00000218 E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8282                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8283                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8284                                  prn_done:
  8285 0000021B F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8286 0000021C C3                      		retn
  8287                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8288                                  
  8289                                  ;************************************************************************
  8290                                  ;*									*
  8291                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8292                                  ;*									*
  8293                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8294                                  ;*									*
  8295                                  ;************************************************************************
  8296                                  
  8297                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8298                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8299 0000021D E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8300                                  prn_loop:				
  8301 0000021F BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8302                                  prn_out:				
  8303 00000222 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8304 00000225 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8305 00000227 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8306 0000022A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8307 0000022C E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8308 0000022F 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8309 00000231 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8310 00000234 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8311 00000236 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8312 00000238 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8313 0000023D EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8314                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8315                                  
  8316                                  _prnwf:					
  8317 0000023F F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8318 00000242 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8319                                  TestPrnError:				
  8320 00000244 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8321 00000245 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8322                                  pmessg:					
  8323 00000247 E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8324                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8325                                  
  8326                                  prn_con:

  8328 0000024B E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8329                                  ;prn_done:				
  8330                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8331                                  prn_done2:
  8332                                  		;clc
  8333                                  		; cf=0
  8334 0000024D C3                      		retn
  8335                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8336                                  
  8337                                  ;************************************************************************
  8338                                  ;*									*
  8339                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8340                                  ;*									*
  8341                                  ;************************************************************************
  8342                                  
  8343                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8344 0000024E E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8345 00000251 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8346 00000253 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8347                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8348                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8349 00000256 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8350 00000258 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8351                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8352                                  
  8353                                  ;************************************************************************
  8354                                  ;*									*
  8355                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8356                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8357                                  ;*									*
  8358                                  ;************************************************************************
  8359                                  
  8360                                  prnstat:				
  8361 0000025B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8362                                  
  8363                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8364                                  
  8365                                  ;************************************************************************
  8366                                  ;*									*
  8367                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8368                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8369                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8370                                  ;*									*
  8371                                  ;************************************************************************
  8372                                  
  8373                                  prnop:	
  8374 0000025D 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8375 00000261 CD17                    		int	17h		; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8376                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8377                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8378                                  
  8379                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8380                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8381                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8382                                  
  8383 00000263 50                      		push	ax
  8384 00000264 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8385 00000267 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8386 0000026A 58                      		pop	ax
  8387 0000026B 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8388 0000026D 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8389 00000270 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8390                                  
  8391                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8392                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8393                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8394                                  
  8395                                  NextTest:				
  8396 00000273 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8397                                  					; i/o error?
  8398 00000276 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8399                                  
  8400                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8401                                  
  8402 00000278 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8403                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8404 0000027A F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8405 0000027D 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8406 0000027F FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8407                                  ret1:					
  8408 00000281 C3                      		retn
  8409                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8410                                  
  8411                                  checknotready:				
  8412 00000282 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8413 00000284 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8414 00000287 C3                      		retn
  8415                                  
  8416                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8417                                  
  8418                                  ;************************************************************************
  8419                                  ;*									*
  8420                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8421                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8422                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8423                                  ;*									*
  8424                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8425                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8426                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8427                                  ;*									*
  8428                                  ;************************************************************************
  8429                                  
  8430                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8431                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8432 00000288 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8433                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8434 0000028A 51                      		push	cx
  8435 0000028B 53                      		push	bx
  8436 0000028C 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8437 0000028E 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8438 00000292 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8439                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8440 00000294 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8441 00000298 5B                      		pop	bx
  8442                                  prn_getstat:				
  8443 00000299 E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8444 0000029C 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8445 0000029E F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8446 000002A1 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8447 000002A3 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8448 000002A4 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8449 000002A6 26                      		es
  8450 000002A7 AC                      		lodsb
  8451                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8452                                  					; lodsb
  8453 000002A8 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8454 000002AA E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8455 000002AD 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8456 000002AF E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8457                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8458                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8459                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8460 000002B1 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8461                                  
  8462                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8463                                  
  8464                                  prn_bperr:				
  8465 000002B2 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8466                                  prn_berr:				
  8467 000002B3 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8468                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8469                                  
  8470                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8471                                  
  8472                                  ;************************************************************************
  8473                                  ;*									*
  8474                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  8475                                  ;*									*
  8476                                  ;************************************************************************
  8477                                  
  8478                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8479                                  ; 11/01/2019
  8480                                  
  8481                                  ;********************************;*
  8482                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  8483                                  ;********************************;*
  8484                                  
  8485                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  8486                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  8487                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  8488                                  
  8489                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  8490                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  8491                                  ;;endstruc
  8492                                  
  8493                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  8494

  8496                                  
  8497                                  		; 19/10/2022

  8501                                  					; ioc_pc
  8502 000002BF 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  8503

  8510 000002C8 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8511 000002CC 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh

  8514 000002D2 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1

  8518 000002DA 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount

  8524 000002E3 898F[E804]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  8525 000002E7 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  8526                                  					; return current retry count
  8527                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8528                                  		; cf=0
  8529                                  		;clc
  8530 000002EA C3                      		retn
  8531                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8532

  8562                                  
  8563                                  ;************************************************************************
  8564                                  ;*									*
  8565                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  8566                                  ;*									*
  8567                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  8568                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  8569                                  ;*									*
  8570                                  ;************************************************************************
  8571                                  
  8572                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  8573                                  
  8574                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  8575                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  8576                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  8577                                  
  8578                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  8579                                  
  8580                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  8581                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  8582                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  8583                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  8584                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  8585                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  8586                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  8587                                  
  8588                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  8589                                  
  8590                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  8591                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  8592                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  8593                                  
  8594                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8595                                  
  8596                                  ;************************************************************************
  8597                                  ;*									*
  8598                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  8599                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  8600                                  ;*									*
  8601                                  ;************************************************************************
  8602                                  
  8603                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  8604                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  8605 00000306 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8606 00000308 E87700                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  8607 0000030B 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8608 0000030D 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  8609 0000030F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8610 00000311 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  8611                                  aux1:					
  8612 00000313 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  8613                                  					; won't return if error
  8614                                  aux2:					
  8615 00000316 AA                      		stosb
  8616 00000317 E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  8617                                  exvec2:

  8619                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  8620 0000031A C3                      		retn

  8622                                  
  8623                                  ;************************************************************************
  8624                                  ;*									*
  8625                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  8626                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  8627                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  8628                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  8629                                  ;*									*
  8630                                  ;************************************************************************
  8631                                  
  8632                                  auxin:					
  8633 0000031B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; auxfunc_receive
  8634 0000031D E83C00                  		call	auxop
  8635 00000320 F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
  8636                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  8637                                  		;retn
  8638                                  		; 18/12/2022
  8639 00000323 75F5                    		jnz	short auxin_retn
  8640                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8641                                  
  8642                                  arbad:					
  8643 00000325 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  8644 00000326 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8645 00000328 0CB0                    		or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  8646 0000032A E9AAFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8647                                  
  8648                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8649                                  
  8650                                  ;************************************************************************
  8651                                  ;*									*
  8652                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  8653                                  ;*									*
  8654                                  ;************************************************************************
  8655                                  
  8656                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
  8657 0000032D E85200                  		call	getbx
  8658 00000330 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; have bx point	to auxbuf
  8659 00000332 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  8660 00000334 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  8661 00000336 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  8662 00000339 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  8663 0000033C 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8664 0000033E A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  8665 00000340 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8666 00000342 E8D6FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  8667 00000345 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  8668                                  auxdrx:					
  8669 00000347 E9A7FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
  8670                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8671                                  
  8672                                  auxbus:					
  8673 0000034A E979FE                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8674                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8675                                  
  8676                                  ;************************************************************************
  8677                                  ;*									*
  8678                                  ;*	aux_wrst - return aux port write status				*
  8679                                  ;*									*
  8680                                  ;************************************************************************
  8681                                  
  8682                                  aux_wrst:				; 2C7h:355h = 70h:28C5h

  8684 00000350 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; test data set	ready
  8685 00000352 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8686 00000354 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  8687 00000357 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8688                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8689                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
  8690                                  		;clc
  8691 00000359 C3                      		retn
  8692                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8693                                  
  8694                                  ;************************************************************************
  8695                                  ;*									*
  8696                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  8697                                  ;*									*
  8698                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  8699                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8700                                  ;*									*
  8701                                  ;************************************************************************
  8702                                  
  8703                                  auxstat:				
  8704 0000035A B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  8705                                  
  8706                                  		; fall into auxop
  8707                                  
  8708                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8709                                  
  8710                                  ;************************************************************************
  8711                                  ;*									*
  8712                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  8713                                  ;*									*
  8714                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  8715                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  8716                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8717                                  ;*									*
  8718                                  ;************************************************************************
  8719                                  
  8720                                  auxop:		; proc near		
  8721 0000035C 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  8722                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  8723                                  					; get port number
  8724 00000360 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  8725                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  8726                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  8727 00000362 C3                      		retn
  8728                                  
  8729                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8730                                  
  8731                                  ;************************************************************************
  8732                                  ;*									*
  8733                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  8734                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  8735                                  ;*									*
  8736                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  8737                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  8738                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  8739                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  8740                                  ;*									*
  8741                                  ;************************************************************************
  8742                                  
  8743                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
  8744 00000363 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
  8745 00000366 C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
  8746                                  					; zero out buffer
  8747                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8748                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8749                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  8750 00000369 C3                      		retn
  8751                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8752                                  
  8753                                  ;************************************************************************
  8754                                  ;*									*
  8755                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
  8756                                  ;*									*
  8757                                  ;************************************************************************
  8758                                  
  8759                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
  8760                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
  8761 0000036A E3AD                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8762                                  aux_loop:				
  8763 0000036C 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to be written
  8764                                  					; move di pointer to next character
  8765 0000036F 47                      		inc	di
  8766 00000370 B401                    		mov	ah, 1		; auxfunc_send - indicates a write
  8767 00000372 E8E7FF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
  8768 00000375 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
  8769 00000378 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error
  8770 0000037A B00A                    		mov	al, 10		; else indicate	write fault
  8771 0000037C E958FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
  8772                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8773                                  
  8774                                  awok:					
  8775 0000037F E2EB                    		loop	aux_loop	; if cx	is non-zero,
  8776                                  					; still	more character to print
  8777                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8778                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8779                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  8780 00000381 C3                      		retn
  8781                                  
  8782                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8783                                  
  8784                                  ;************************************************************************
  8785                                  ;*									*
  8786                                  ;*	getbx - return bx -> single byte input buffer for		*
  8787                                  ;*		selected aux port ([auxnum])				*
  8788                                  ;*									*
  8789                                  ;************************************************************************
  8790                                  
  8791                                  getbx:	
  8792 00000382 8B1E[2100]              		mov	bx, [auxnum]	; return bx -> single byte input buffer
  8793                                  					; for selected aux port	([auxnum])
  8794                                  		;add	bx, offset auxbuf
  8795 00000386 81C3[1600]              		add	bx, auxbuf	; 19/10/2022
  8796                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8797                                  		; cf=0 (if [uaxnum] is valid number) 
  8798 0000038A C3                      		retn
  8799                                  
  8800                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8801                                  
  8802                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8803                                  
  8804                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  8805                                  ;								:
  8806                                  ;		    clock device driver 			:
  8807                                  ;								:
  8808                                  ;								:
  8809                                  ;   this file contains the clock device driver. 		:
  8810                                  ;								:
  8811                                  ;   the routines in this files are:				:
  8812                                  ;								:
  8813                                  ;	routine 		function			:
  8814                                  ;	------- 		--------			:
  8815                                  ;	tim_writ		set the current time		:
  8816                                  ;	tim_read		read the current time		:
  8817                                  ;	time_to_ticks		convert time to corresponding	:
  8818                                  ;				  number of clock ticks 	:
  8819                                  ;								:
  8820                                  ; the clock ticks at the rate of:				:
  8821                                  ;								:
  8822                                  ;	1193180/65536 ticks/second (about 18.2 ticks per second):
  8823                                  ; see each routine for information on the use.			:
  8824                                  ;								:
  8825                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  8826                                  
  8827                                  ; convert time to ticks
  8828                                  ; input : time in cx and dx
  8829                                  ; ticks returned in cx:dx
  8830                                  
  8831                                  ;19/07/2019
  8832                                  ;09/03/2019
  8833                                  
  8834                                  time_to_ticks:				; 0070h:2906h =	02C7h:0396h
  8835                                  
  8836                                  ; first convert from hour,min,sec,hund. to
  8837                                  ; total number of 100th of seconds
  8838                                  
  8839 0000038B B03C                    		mov	al, 60
  8840 0000038D F6E5                    		mul	ch		; hours	to minutes
  8841 0000038F B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  8842 00000391 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; total	minutes
  8843 00000393 B97017                  		mov	cx, 6000	; 60*100
  8844 00000396 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; get out of the way of	the multiply
  8845 00000398 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to 1/100 sec
  8846 0000039A 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
  8847 0000039C B064                    		mov	al, 100
  8848 0000039E F6E7                    		mul	bh		; convert seconds to 1/100 sec
  8849 000003A0 01C1                    		add	cx, ax		; combine seconds with hours and min
  8850 000003A2 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; ripple carry
  8851 000003A5 B700                    		mov	bh, 0
  8852 000003A7 01D9                    		add	cx, bx		; combine 1/100	sec
  8853 000003A9 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  8854                                  
  8855                                  	; dx:cx is time in 1/100 sec
  8856                                  
  8857 000003AC 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  8858 000003AD 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; now time is in cx:ax
  8859 000003AE BB0BE9                  		mov	bx, 59659
  8860 000003B1 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply low half
  8861 000003B3 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx
  8862 000003B5 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; cx->ax, ax->dx, dx->cx
  8863 000003B6 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply high	half
  8864 000003B8 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; combine overlapping products
  8865 000003BA 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  8866 000003BD 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; ax:dx=time*59659
  8867 000003BE BB0500                  		mov	bx, 5
  8868 000003C1 F6F3                    		div	bl		; divide high half by 5
  8869 000003C3 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
  8870 000003C5 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  8871 000003C7 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; remainder of divide-by-5
  8872 000003C9 98                      		cbw
  8873 000003CA 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; use it to extend low half
  8874 000003CB F7F3                    		div	bx		; divide low half by 5
  8875 000003CD 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; cx:dx	is now number of ticks in time
  8876 000003CF CB                      		retf			; far return
  8877                                  
  8878                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8879                                  
  8880                                  ; 17/10/2022
  8881                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8882                                  
  8883                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  8884                                  ;
  8885                                  ; tim_writ sets the current time
  8886                                  ;
  8887                                  ; on entry es:[di] has the current time:
  8888                                  ;
  8889                                  ;	number of days since 1-1-80	(word)
  8890                                  ;	minutes (0-59)			(byte)
  8891                                  ;	hours (0-23)			(byte)
  8892                                  ;	hundredths of seconds (0-99)	(byte)
  8893                                  ;	seconds (0-59)			(byte)
  8894                                  ;
  8895                                  ; each number has been checked for the correct range.
  8896                                  ;
  8897                                  ;	NOTE: Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  8898                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  8899                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  8900                                  ;
  8901                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  8902                                  
  8903                                  tim_writ:				; 2C7h:3DBh = 70h:294Bh
  8904 000003D0 268B05                  		mov	ax, [es:di]
  8905 000003D3 50                      		push	ax		; daycnt. we need to set this at the very
  8906                                  					; end to avoid tick windows.
  8907 000003D4 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  8908                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  8909 000003D9 7426                    		jz	short no_cmos_1
  8910 000003DB 268A4503                		mov	al, [es:di+3]	; near indirect	calls
  8911                                  					; get binary hours
  8912                                  					; convert to bcd
  8913 000003DF FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8914                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd	; call far [bintobcd]
  8915 000003E3 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; ch = bcd hours
  8916 000003E5 268A4502                		mov	al, [es:di+2]	; get binary minutes
  8917 000003E9 FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8918                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd	; convert to bcd
  8919 000003ED 88C1                    		mov	cl, al		; cl = bcd minutes
  8920 000003EF 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; get binary seconds
  8921 000003F3 FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8922                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd
  8923 000003F7 88C6                    		mov	dh, al		; dh = bcd seconds
  8924 000003F9 B200                    		mov	dl, 0		; dl = 0 (st) or 1 (dst)
  8925 000003FB FA                      		cli
  8926 000003FC B403                    		mov	ah, 3
  8927 000003FE CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  8928                                  					; CH = hours in	BCD, CL	= minutes in BCD
  8929                                  					;  DH =	seconds	in BCD,DL = 01h	if daylight savings, 00h if standard time
  8930                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  8931 00000400 FB                      		sti
  8932                                  no_cmos_1:				
  8933 00000401 268B4D02                		mov	cx, [es:di+2]
  8934 00000405 268B5504                		mov	dx, [es:di+4]
  8935                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8936 00000409 FF1E[E206]              		call	far [ttticks]
  8937                                  		;call	dword ptr ds:ttticks ; call far	[ttticks]
  8938                                  					; convert time to ticks
  8939                                  					; cx:dx	now has	time in	ticks
  8940 0000040D FA                      		cli			; turn off timer
  8941 0000040E B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8942 00000410 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  8943                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  8944                                  					; Return: time of day set
  8945                                  		;pop	ds:daycnt
  8946 00000412 8F06[F004]              		pop	word [daycnt]
  8947 00000416 FB                      		sti
  8948                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  8949 00000417 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  8950 0000041C 740A                    		jz	short no_cmos_2
  8951 0000041E FF1E[0605]              		call	far [daycnttoday]
  8952                                  		;call	ds:daycnttoday	; call far [daycnttoday]
  8953                                  					; convert to bcd format
  8954 00000422 FA                      		cli
  8955 00000423 B405                    		mov	ah, 5
  8956 00000425 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET DATE IN REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  8957                                  					; DL = day in BCD, DH =	month in BCD, CL = year	in BCD
  8958                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  8959                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  8960 00000427 FB                      		sti
  8961                                  no_cmos_2:
  8962                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8963                                  		; cf=0				
  8964                                  		;clc
  8965 00000428 C3                      		retn
  8966                                  
  8967                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8968                                  
  8969                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8970                                  
  8971                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8972                                  ; gettime reads date and time
  8973                                  ; and returns the following information:
  8974                                  ;
  8975                                  ;	es:[di]  =count of days since 1-1-80
  8976                                  ;	es:[di+2]=hours
  8977                                  ;	es:[di+3]=minutes
  8978                                  ;	es:[di+4]=seconds
  8979                                  ;	es:[di+5]=hundredths of seconds
  8980                                  ;
  8981                                  ;	NOTE:  Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  8982                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  8983                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  8984                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8985                                  
  8986                                  tim_read:				; 2C7h:435h = 70h:29A5h
  8987 00000429 E84E00                  		call	GetTickCnt
  8988 0000042C 8B36[F004]              		mov	si, [daycnt]
  8989                                  
  8990                                  ; we now need to convert the time in tick to the time in 100th of
  8991                                  ; seconds. the relation between tick and seconds is:
  8992                                  ;
  8993                                  ;		 65,536 seconds
  8994                                  ;	       ----------------
  8995                                  ;		1,193,180 tick
  8996                                  ;
  8997                                  ; to get to 100th of second we need to multiply by 100. the equation is:
  8998                                  ;
  8999                                  ;	ticks from clock  * 65,536 * 100
  9000                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
  9001                                  ;		1,193,180
  9002                                  ;
  9003                                  ; fortunately this formula simplifies to:
  9004                                  ;
  9005                                  ;	ticks from clock * 5 * 65,536
  9006                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
  9007                                  ;		59,659
  9008                                  ;
  9009                                  ; the calculation is done by first multipling tick by 5. next we divide by
  9010                                  ; 59,659. in this division we multiply by 65,536 by shifting the dividend
  9011                                  ; my 16 bits to the left.
  9012                                  ;
  9013                                  ; start with ticks in cx:dx
  9014                                  ; multiply by 5
  9015                                  
  9016 00000430 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
  9017 00000432 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; start	with ticks in cx:dx
  9018                                  					; multiply by 5
  9019 00000434 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
  9020 00000436 D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	2
  9021 00000438 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
  9022 0000043A D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	4
  9023 0000043C 01DA                    		add	dx, bx
  9024 0000043E 11C8                    		adc	ax, cx		; times	5
  9025 00000440 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  9026                                  
  9027                                  ; now have ticks * 5 in	dx:ax
  9028                                  ; we now need to multiply by 65536 and divide by 59659 d.
  9029                                  
  9030 00000441 B90BE9                  		mov	cx, 59659	; get divisor
  9031 00000444 F7F1                    		div	cx		; dx now has remainder
  9032                                  					; ax has high word of final quotient
  9033 00000446 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; put high word	in safe	place
  9034 00000448 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; this is the multiply by 65536
  9035 0000044A F7F1                    		div	cx		; bx:ax	now has	time in	100th of seconds
  9036                                  
  9037                                  ; rounding based on the	remainder may be added here
  9038                                  ; the result in	bx:ax is time in 1/100 second.
  9039                                  
  9040 0000044C 89DA                    		mov	dx, bx		
  9041 0000044E B9C800                  		mov	cx, 200		;extract 1/100's
  9042                                  
  9043                                  ; division by 200 is necessary to ensure no overflow--max result
  9044                                  ; is number of seconds in a day/2 = 43200.
  9045                                  
  9046 00000451 F7F1                    		div	cx
  9047 00000453 80FA64                  		cmp	dl, 100		; remainder over 100?
  9048 00000456 7203                    		jb	short noadj
  9049 00000458 80EA64                  		sub	dl, 100		; keep 1/100's less than 100
  9050                                  noadj:					
  9051 0000045B F5                      		cmc			; if we	subtracted 100,	carry is now set
  9052 0000045C 88D3                    		mov	bl, dl		; save 1/100's
  9053                                  
  9054                                  ; to compensate	for dividing by	200 instead of 100, we now multiply
  9055                                  ; by two, shifting a one in if the remainder had exceeded 100.
  9056                                  
  9057 0000045E D1D0                    		rcl	ax, 1		
  9058 00000460 B200                    		mov	dl, 0
  9059 00000462 D1D2                    		rcl	dx, 1
  9060 00000464 B93C00                  		mov	cx, 60		; divide out seconds
  9061 00000467 F7F1                    		div	cx
  9062 00000469 88D7                    		mov	bh, dl		; save the seconds
  9063 0000046B F6F1                    		div	cl		; break	into hours and minutes
  9064 0000046D 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah
  9065                                  
  9066                                  ; time is now in ax:bx (hours, minutes, seconds, 1/100 sec)
  9067                                  
  9068 0000046F 50                      		push	ax
  9069 00000470 89F0                    		mov	ax, si		; daycnt
  9070 00000472 AB                      		stosw
  9071 00000473 58                      		pop	ax
  9072 00000474 AB                      		stosw
  9073 00000475 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  9074 00000477 AB                      		stosw
  9075 00000478 F8                      		clc
  9076 00000479 C3                      		retn
  9077                                  
  9078                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9079                                  
  9080                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9081                                  
  9082                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9083                                  ;
  9084                                  ; procedure : GetTickCnt
  9085                                  ;
  9086                                  ;		Returns the tick count in CX:DX. Takes care of DayCnt in case
  9087                                  ;		of rollover [except when power management driver is in use]. 
  9088                                  ;		Uses the following logic for updating Daycnt
  9089                                  ;
  9090                                  ;		if ( rollover ) {
  9091                                  ;			if ( t_switch )
  9092                                  ;				daycnt++ ;
  9093                                  ;			else
  9094                                  ;				daycnt += rollover ;
  9095                                  ;		}
  9096                                  ;
  9097                                  ; USES : AX
  9098                                  ;
  9099                                  ; RETURNS : CX:DX - tick count
  9100                                  ; MODIFIES : daycnt
  9101                                  ;
  9102                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9103                                  
  9104                                  		; 17/10/2022
  9105                                  GetTickCnt:	
  9106 0000047A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9107 0000047C CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  9108                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  9109                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  9110                                  					; midnight
  9111                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  9112 0000047E 803E[F204]00            		cmp	byte [t_switch], 0 ; use old method ? (>0 is yes)
  9113 00000483 7507                    		jnz	short inc_case	; old method assumes  that Int 1Ah returns rollover flag
  9114 00000485 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; new method assumes that Int 1Ah returns roll over count
  9115                                  					; and not flag
  9116 00000487 0106[F004]              		add	[daycnt], ax
  9117 0000048B C3                      		retn
  9118                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9119                                  
  9120                                  inc_case:				
  9121 0000048C 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9122 0000048E 7404                    		jz	short no_rollover
  9123 00000490 FF06[F004]              		inc	word [daycnt]
  9124                                  no_rollover:				
  9125 00000494 C3                      		retn
  9126

  9154                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9155                                  ;	disk interface routines
  9156                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9157                                  
  9158                                  ; device attribute bits:
  9159                                  ;	bit 6 - get/set map for logical drives and generic ioctl.
  9160                                  
  9161                                  ;MAXERR		equ	5
  9162                                  ;MAX_HD_FMT_ERR	equ	2
  9163                                  
  9164                                  ;LSTDRV	equ 504h
  9165                                  
  9166                                  ; some floppies do not have changeline. as a result, media-check would
  9167                                  ; normally return i-don't-know, the dos would continually reread the fat and
  9168                                  ; discard cached data. we optimize this by implementing a logical door-latch:
  9169                                  ; it is physically impossible to change a disk in under 2 seconds. we retain
  9170                                  ; the time of the last successful disk operation and compare it with the current
  9171                                  ; time during media-check. if < 2 seconds and at least 1 timer tick has passed,
  9172                                  ; the we say no change. if > 2 seconds then we say i-don't-know. finally, 
  9173                                  ; since we cannot trust the timer to be always available, we record the number 
  9174                                  ; of media checks that have occurred when no apparent time has elapsed. while
  9175                                  ; this number is < a given threshold, we say no change. when it exceeds that
  9176                                  ; threshold, we say i-don't-know and reset the counter to 0. when we store 
  9177                                  ; the time of last successful access, if we see that time has passed too,
  9178                                  ; we reset the counter.
  9179                                  
  9180                                  accessmax	equ	5
  9181                                  
  9182                                  ; due to various bogosities, we need to continually adjust what the head
  9183                                  ; settle time is.  the following algorithm is used:
  9184                                  ;
  9185                                  ;   get the current head settle value.
  9186                                  ;   if it is 0, then
  9187                                  ;	set slow = 15
  9188                                  ;   else
  9189                                  ;	set slow = value
  9190                                  ;   ...
  9191                                  ;*********************************************
  9192                                  ;************ old algorithm ******************
  9193                                  ;*   if we are seeking and writing then
  9194                                  ;*	 use slow
  9195                                  ;*   else
  9196                                  ;*	 use fast
  9197                                  ;*********************************************
  9198                                  ;*********** ibm's requested logic ***********
  9199                                  ;   if we are seeking and writing and not on an at then
  9200                                  ;	use slow
  9201                                  ;   else
  9202                                  ;	use fast
  9203                                  ;   ...
  9204                                  ;   restore current head settle value
  9205                                  ;
  9206                                  ;
  9207                                  ;---------------------------------------
  9208                                  multrk_on	equ	10000000b	;user spcified mutitrack=on, or system turns
  9209                                  					; it on after handling config.sys file as a
  9210                                  					; default value, if multrk_flag = multrk_off1.
  9211                                  multrk_off1	equ	00000000b	;initial value. no "multitrack=" command entered.
  9212                                  multrk_off2	equ	00000001b	;user specified multitrack=off.
  9213                                  
  9214                                  ; close data segment, open Bios_Code segment
  9215                                  
  9216                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9217

  9292                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================

  9294                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9295                                  ; setdrive scans through the data structure of bdss, and returns a pointer to
  9296                                  ; the one that belongs to the drive specified. carry is set if none exists
  9297                                  ; for the drive. Pointer is returned in es:[di]
  9298                                  ;
  9299                                  ;  AL contains the logical drive number.
  9300                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9301                                  
  9302                                  SetDrive:	
  9303                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds ; Point es:di to first bds	
  9304 000004CB C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; 19/10/2022
  9305                                  X_Scan_Loop:				
  9306 000004CF 26384505                		cmp	[es:di+5], al	
  9307 000004D3 7409                    		jz	short X_SetDrv
  9308 000004D5 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link] ; Go	to next	bds
  9309 000004D8 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
  9310 000004DB 75F2                    		jnz	short X_Scan_Loop
  9311 000004DD F9                      		stc
  9312                                  X_SetDrv:				
  9313 000004DE C3                      		retn
  9314                                  
  9315                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9316                                  
  9317                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9318                                  
  9319                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
  9320                                  ; if id is f9, have a 96tpi disk else
  9321                                  ; if bit 2 is 0 then media is not removable and could not have changed
  9322                                  ;  otherwise if within 2 secs of last disk operation media could not
  9323                                  ;    have changed, otherwise dont know if media has changed
  9324                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
  9325                                  
  9326                                  media_chk:				; 2C7h:4EBh = 70h:2A5Bh
  9327 000004DF E8E9FF                  		call	SetDrive
  9328 000004E2 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1
  9329 000004E5 26F6452401              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
  9330                                  					; fchanged_by_format
  9331 000004EA 7416                    		jz	short WeAreNotFakingIt
  9332                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9333 000004EC 26806524FE              		and	byte [es:di+24h], 0FEh ; ~fchanged_by_format
  9334                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FEFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
  9335                                  					; ~fchanged_by_format ;	reset flag
  9336 000004F1 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh ; -1
  9337                                  					; Ensure that we ask the rom if media has changed
  9338 000004F6 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
  9339                                  					; fnon_removable
  9340 000004FB 740C                    		jz	short wehaveafloppy
  9341 000004FD BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; Indicate media changed
  9342 00000500 EB2C                    		jmp	short Media_Done ; Media_Done
  9343                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9344                                  
  9345                                  WeAreNotFakingIt:
  9346                                  		;test	byte [es:di+BDS.flags], fnon_removable			
  9347 00000502 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
  9348 00000507 7525                    		jnz	short Media_Done
  9349                                  wehaveafloppy:				
  9350 00000509 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; Presume "I don't know"
  9351                                  
  9352                                  		; If we have a floppy with changeline support, we ask the ROM
  9353                                  		; to determine if media has changed. We do not perform the
  9354                                  		; 2 second check for these drives.
  9355                                  
  9356 0000050B 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; Do we	have changeline	support?
  9357 00000510 740A                    		jz	short mChk_NoChangeLine	; Brif not
  9358 00000512 E89E12                  		call	mediacheck	;  Call	into removable routine
  9359 00000515 7236                    		jb	short err_exitj
  9360 00000517 E8F613                  		call	haschange
  9361 0000051A 7512                    		jnz	short Media_Done
  9362                                  mChk_NoChangeLine:
  9363                                  		; If we come here, we have a floppy with no changeline support
  9364                                  			
  9365 0000051C BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; Presume no change
  9366 0000051F A0[1E01]                		mov	al, [tim_drv]	; Last drive accessed
  9367 00000522 263A4504                		cmp	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
  9368                                  					; Is drive of last access the same?
  9369 00000526 7505                    		jnz	short Media_Unk	; No, then "i don't know"
  9370 00000528 E82800                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
  9371 0000052B EB01                    		jmp	short Media_Done

  9373                                  
  9374                                  Media_Unk:

  9376                                  
  9377                                  		; SI now contains the correct value for media change.

  9384 00000537 07                      		pop	es

  9389 00000543 E85613                  		call	media_set_vid
