 12271                                  
 12272                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12273                                  
 12274                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12275                                  
 12276                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12277                                  ;	get media id
 12278                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12279                                  ;
 12280                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 12281                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12282                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 12283                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 12284                                  ;
 12285                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12286                                  ;
 12287                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 12288                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12289                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12290                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 12291                                  ;
 12292                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12293                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12294                                  ;
 12295                                  ; LOGIC:
 12296                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 12297                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 12298                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 12299                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 12300                                  ;
 12301                                  ; {
 12302                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 12303                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 12304                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 12305                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12306                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12307                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12308                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 12309                                  ;		};
 12310                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12311                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12312                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12313                                  ;		};
 12314                                  ;	else
 12315                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 12316                                  ;
 12317                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12318                                  
 12319                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 12320                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 12321                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 12322                                  
 12323                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12324                                  GetMediaId:
 12325 0000115D E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12326 00001160 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 12327 00001164 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 12328 00001169 E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 12329 0000116C 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 12330                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12331 0000116E 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12332                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12333 00001173 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 12334                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12335 00001175 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 12336 00001178 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 12337                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12338                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12339 0000117B 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 12340 0000117D C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 12341 00001181 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12342                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12343 00001185 46                      		inc	si
 12344                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 12345                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12346 00001186 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12347 00001189 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12348                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12349                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12350 0000118C F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 12351                                  	
 12352                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12353                                  		; cf = 0
 12354                                  		;clc
 12355                                  
 12356 0000118E C3                      		retn
 12357                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12358                                  
 12359                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 12360 0000118F B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12361 00001191 F9                      		stc
 12362                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 12363 00001192 C3                      		retn
 12364                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12365                                  
 12366                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12367                                  
 12368                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12369                                  ;  set media id
 12370                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12371                                  
 12372                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 12373                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12374                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 12375                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 12376                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 12377                                  ;	    the bds table.
 12378                                  ;
 12379                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12380                                  ;
 12381                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 12382                                  ;	    the request packet.
 12383                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 12384                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12385                                  ;
 12386                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12387                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12388                                  ;
 12389                                  ; logic:
 12390                                  ;
 12391                                  ; {
 12392                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 12393                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 12394                                  ;	BootIo;
 12395                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12396                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12397                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12398                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 12399                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 12400                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 12401                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 12402                                  ;		};
 12403                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12404                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12405                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12406                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 12407                                  ;		};
 12408                                  ;	else
 12409                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 12410                                  ;
 12411                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12412                                  
 12413                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12414                                  SetMediaId:
 12415 00001193 E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12416 00001196 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12417                                  					; Logical drive	number
 12418 0000119A 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 12419 0000119C C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 12420 000011A1 52                      		push	dx
 12421 000011A2 E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12422 000011A5 5A                      		pop	dx
 12423 000011A6 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 12424                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12425 000011A8 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12426                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12427 000011AD 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 12428 000011AF 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12429                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12430 000011B4 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 12431 000011B6 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 12432 000011B7 57                      		push	di
 12433 000011B8 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 12434 000011B9 07                      		pop	es
 12435 000011BA BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12436 000011BD C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 12437 000011C1 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12438 000011C4 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12439 000011C7 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12440                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12441                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12442 000011CA F3A4                    		rep movsb
 12443 000011CC 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 12444 000011CD 1F                      		pop	ds
 12445 000011CE 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 12446 000011CF 07                      		pop	es
 12447 000011D0 E864F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 12448 000011D3 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 12449 000011D5 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 12450 000011DA E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 12451 000011DD C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 12452                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 12453                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 12454 000011E2 C3                      		retn
 12455                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12456                                  
 12457                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 12458 000011E3 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12459 000011E5 F9                      		stc
 12460                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 12461 000011E6 C3                      		retn
 12462                                  
 12463                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12464                                  
 12465                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12466                                  
 12467                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12468                                  ;	BootIo
 12469                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12470                                  ;
 12471                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 12472                                  ;
 12473                                  ; input :
 12474                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 12475                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 12476                                  ;
 12477                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 12478                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 12479                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 12480                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 12481                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12482                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12483                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 12484                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 12485                                  ;
 12486                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12487                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 12488                                  ;
 12489                                  ; logic:
 12490                                  ;
 12491                                  ; {
 12492                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 12493                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 12494                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 12495                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 12496                                  ; }
 12497                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12498                                  
 12499                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12500                                  BootIo:	
 12501 000011E7 06                      		push	es
 12502 000011E8 57                      		push	di
 12503 000011E9 53                      		push	bx
 12504 000011EA 1E                      		push	ds
 12505 000011EB 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 12506                                  
 12507                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 12508                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 12509                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12510                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 12511                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 12512                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 12513                                  
 12514 000011EC BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 12515 000011EF 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 12516 000011F1 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 12517 000011F5 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 12518 000011F8 E8CEF6                  		call	diskio
 12519 000011FB 5B                      		pop	bx
 12520 000011FC 5F                      		pop	di
 12521 000011FD 07                      		pop	es
 12522 000011FE C3                      		retn
 12523                                  
 12524                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12525                                  
 12526                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12527                                  
 12528                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12529                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 12530                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12531                                  ;
 12532                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 12533                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 12534                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 12535                                  ; history in the flags.
 12536                                  ;
 12537                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 12538                                  ;
 12539                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 12540                                  ;
 12541                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 12542                                  ;
 12543                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12544                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 12545                                  ;
 12546                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12547                                  
 12548                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 12549 000011FF 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12550 00001203 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 12551 00001205 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 12552                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12553 00001207 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 12554                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12555                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 12556 0000120C 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12557 0000120E 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 12558 00001213 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12559 00001215 E8F806                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 12560 00001218 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 12561                                  
 12562                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 12563                                  
 12564 0000121A B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 12565 0000121C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 12566                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 12567                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 12568 0000121E 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12569 00001220 53                      		push	bx
 12570 00001221 BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 12571                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 12572                                  					; physical drive
 12573 00001224 E8C206                  		call	set_changed_dl
 12574 00001227 5B                      		pop	bx
 12575                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 12576 00001228 C3                      		retn
 12577                                  
 12578                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12579                                  
 12580                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12581                                  
 12582                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12583                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 12584                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12585                                  ;
 12586                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12587                                  ;
 12588                                  ; INPUT :
 12589                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12590                                  ;
 12591                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 12592                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 12593                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12594                                  
 12595                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12596                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 12597 00001229 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 12598 0000122D C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12599                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 12600                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12601 00001230 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 12602                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12603 00001232 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12604                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12605                                  					; unformatted_media
 12606 00001237 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 12607 00001239 FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 12608                                  
 12609                                  GafDone:				
 12610 0000123B 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12611 0000123E C3                      		retn
 12612                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12613                                  
 12614                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12615                                  
 12616                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12617                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 12618                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12619                                  ;
 12620                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12621                                  ;
 12622                                  ; input :
 12623                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12624                                  ;
 12625                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 12626                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12627                                  
 12628                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12629                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 12630 0000123F C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 12631 00001243 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12632                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12633 00001246 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 12634                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12635                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 12636 0000124B 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12637 0000124F 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 12638                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12639 00001251 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12640                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12641                                  					; unformatted_media
 12642                                  saf_Done:				
 12643 00001256 C3                      		retn
 12644                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12645

 12648                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12649                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 12650                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12651                                  ;
 12652                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 12653                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 12654                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 12655                                  ;
 12656                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12657                                  
 12658                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12659                                  ioctl_support_query:
 12660 00001257 06                      		push	es
 12661 00001258 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 12662 0000125C 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 12663                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 12664 00001260 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 12665                                  					; See if major code is 8
 12666 00001262 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 12667 00001264 0E                      		push	cs
 12668 00001265 07                      		pop	es
 12669 00001266 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 12670                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12671 00001269 BF[3A0C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 12672                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 12673                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 12674 0000126C 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 12675 0000126E F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 12676 00001270 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 12677 00001272 B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 12678                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12679                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 12680                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 12681                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 12682                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 12683                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12684                                  ioctlsupexit:				
 12685 00001275 07                      		pop	es
 12686                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12687                                  		; cf = 0
 12688                                  		;clc
 12689 00001276 C3                      		retn
 12690                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12691                                  nosupport:				
 12692 00001277 07                      		pop	es
 12693 00001278 E95AEE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 12694                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12695                                  
 12696                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12697                                  
 12698                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12699                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 12700                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12701                                  ;
 12702                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 12703                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 12704                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 12705                                  ;	    drive)
 12706                                  ;
 12707                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 12708                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 12709                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 12710                                  ;
 12711                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 12712                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 12713                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 12714                                  ;
 12715                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 12716                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 12717                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 12718                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 12719                                  ;
 12720                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 12721                                  ;
 12722                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 12723                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 12724                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 12725                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 12726                                  ; 
 12727                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12728                                  
 12729                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12730                                  SenseMediaType:				
 12731 0000127B C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 12732 0000127F C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12733                                  		; 10/10/2022
 12734                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 12735 00001282 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 12736 00001284 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 12737                                  		;
 12738 00001286 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12739                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 12740                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12741                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 12742 0000128A B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 12743                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 12744 0000128C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 12745 0000128E 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 12746 00001290 FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 12747                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 12748 00001292 FEC8                    		dec	al
 12749 00001294 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 12750 00001296 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 12751 00001298 0404                    		add	al, 4
 12752 0000129A 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 12753 0000129C 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 12754 0000129E 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 12755 000012A0 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 12756                                  GotMediaType:				
 12757 000012A2 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 12758                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12759                                  		; cf = 0
 12760                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 12761 000012A5 C3                      		retn
 12762                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12763                                  
 12764                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 12765 000012A6 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 12766 000012A9 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 12767 000012AB B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 12768 000012AD 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 12769 000012B0 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 12770                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 12771 000012B2 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 12772                                  SenseErrExit:				
 12773 000012B4 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 12774 000012B6 F9                      		stc
 12775 000012B7 C3                      		retn
 12776                                  
 12777                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12778                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12779                                  		;db    0
 12780                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12781                                  
 12782                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12783                                  
 12784                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12785                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 12786                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12787                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12788                                  
 12789                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 12790                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 12791                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 12792                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 12793                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 12794                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 12795                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 12796                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 12797                                  ;
 12798                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 12799                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 12800                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 12801                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 12802                                  ;
 12803                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 12804                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 12805                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 12806                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 12807                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 12808                                  ;
 12809                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 12810                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 12811                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 12812                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 12813                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 12814                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 12815                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 12816                                  
 12817                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 12818                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 12819                                  
 12820                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12821                                  
 12822                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 12823 000012B8 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 12824 000012BB 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 12825 000012BD 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 12826 000012C0 743B                    		jz	short mine
 12827                                  
 12828                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 12829

 12833 000012CA 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 12834 000012CC E9A500                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 12835                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12836                                  
 12837                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 12838 000012CF CF                      		iret
 12839                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 12841                                  int2f_replace_int13:

 12843 000012D1 8CD8                    		mov	ax, ds	; then we can use ds: -> Bios_Data
 12844                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022

 12846                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 12847 000012D3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 12848                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12849                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 12850                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 12851                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 12852                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2

 12854 000012DC FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]

 12856 000012E4 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 12857

 12859                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 12860                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 12861                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 12862 000012E8 8916[B400]              		mov	[Orig13], dx
 12863 000012EC A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 12864 000012EF 891E[0601]              		mov	[Old13], bx
 12865 000012F3 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 12866                                  
 12867 000012F7 07                      		pop	es			; es:bx := old old13 vector
 12868 000012F8 5B                      		pop	bx
 12869 000012F9 1F                      		pop	ds			; ds:dx := old orig13 vector
 12870 000012FA 5A                      		pop	dx
 12871 000012FB 58                      		pop	ax
 12872                                  i2f_iret:				
 12873 000012FC CF                      		iret
 12874                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 12876                                  mine:

 12878 000012FF 73FB                    		jnb	short i2f_iret
 12879 00001301 08C0                    		or	al, al			; a get installed state request?
 12880 00001303 7504                    		jnz	short disp_func

 12908                                  					;  IRET type function. Callers of
 12909                                  					;  this int2f subfunction will have

 12934                                  		;lds	di, ds:start_bds
 12935                                  ;ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022
