 14122                                  
 14123                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14124                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14125                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14126                                  ;
 14127                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14128                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14129                                  
 14130                                  mediacheck:	
 14131 000017B3 E885F0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14132 000017B6 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14133 000017B8 E85501                  		call	haschange
 14134 000017BB 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14135 000017BD E84401                  		call	checkromchange
 14136 000017C0 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14137 000017C2 50                      		push	ax
 14138 000017C3 52                      		push	dx
 14139 000017C4 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14140                                  					; set logical drive number
 14141 000017C8 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14142 000017CA CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14143                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14144                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14145 000017CC 5A                      		pop	dx
 14146 000017CD 58                      		pop	ax
 14147 000017CE 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14148 000017D0 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14149                                  
 14150                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14151                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14152                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14153                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14154                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14155                                  ; status.
 14156                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14157 000017D3 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14158 000017D7 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14159                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14160                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14161                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14162                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14163 000017DB 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14164                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14165                                  
 14166                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14167                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14168                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14169                                  
 14170 000017DD 50                      		push	ax
 14171 000017DE 51                      		push	cx
 14172 000017DF 52                      		push	dx
 14173 000017E0 E870ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14174 000017E3 5A                      		pop	dx
 14175 000017E4 59                      		pop	cx
 14176 000017E5 58                      		pop	ax
 14177 000017E6 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14178 000017E8 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14179                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14180 000017EA 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14181                                  mediaret:				
 14182 000017EC C3                      		retn
 14183                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14184                                  
 14185                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14186                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14187                                  ; or write.
 14188                                  
 14189                                  mediadovolid:				
 14190 000017ED E807EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14191 000017F0 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14192 000017F2 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14193 000017F5 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14194 000017F7 E9D6F3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14195                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14196                                  
 14197                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14198                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14199                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14200                                  ; dos.
 14201                                  ;
 14202                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14203                                  
 14204                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14205                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14206                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14207                                  
 14208                                  checklatchio:	
 14209                                  
 14210                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14211                                  			
 14212 000017FA E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14213 000017FD 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14214                                  
 14215                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14216                                  
 14217 000017FF E80201                  		call	checkromchange
 14218 00001802 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14219                                  
 14220                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14221                                  ; expensive verification.
 14222                                  
 14223 00001804 E8F0ED                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14224 00001807 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14225 00001809 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14226 0000180C 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14227 0000180E 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14228 00001810 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14229 00001812 E87D00                  		call	returnvid
 14230                                  checklatchret:				
 14231 00001815 E8B8F3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14232                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14233 00001818 F9                      		stc
 14234 00001819 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14235                                  checkret:				
 14236 0000181A C3                      		retn
 14237                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14238                                  
 14239                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14240                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14241                                  ;
 14242                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14243                                  
 14244                                  checkfatvid:				
 14245 0000181B E8CD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14246 0000181E 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14247 00001820 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14248                                  
 14249                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14250                                  
 14251                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14252                                  
 14253                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14254                                  
 14255                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14256                                  ;
 14257                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14258                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14259                                  ;
 14260                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14261                                  ;
 14262                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14263                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14264                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14265                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14266                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14267                                  ;
 14268                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14269                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14270                                  ; routine.)
 14271                                  ;
 14272                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14273                                  
 14274                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14275                                  check_vid:
 14276                                  
 14277                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14278                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14279                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14280                                  
 14281 00001822 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14282                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14283                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14284 00001827 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14285 00001829 E8E400                  		call	haschange
 14286 0000182C 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14287 0000182E 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14288 00001830 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14289                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14290 00001835 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14291                                  					; if not fat system
 14292 00001837 E8F600                  		call	read_volume_id
 14293 0000183A 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14294 0000183C E89B01                  		call	check_volume_id
 14295 0000183F BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14296                                  					; definitely changed
 14297 00001842 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14298                                  
 14299 00001844 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14300                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14301 00001845 E8C200                  		call	resetchanged
 14302                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14303                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14304                                  		;clc
 14305                                  checkfatret:				
 14306 00001848 C3                      		retn
 14307                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14308                                  
 14309                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14310                                  changed_drv:
 14311 00001849 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14312 0000184A C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14313                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14314 0000184F C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14315                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14316                                  
 14317                                  ; extended id check
 14318                                  
 14319                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14320                                  
 14321                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14322                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14323                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14324                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14325                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14326                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14327                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14328                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14329                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14330                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14331                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14332                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14333                                  ;
 14334                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14335                                  
 14336                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14337                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 14338 00001850 50                      		push	ax
 14339                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14340                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14341 00001851 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14342 00001854 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14343 00001858 750E                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14344 0000185A A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14345 0000185D 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14346 00001861 7505                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14347 00001863 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; 0
 14348                                  					; don't know
 14349 00001865 58                      		pop	ax
 14350 00001866 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14351                                  					; reset the flag
 14352                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14353                                  
 14354                                  ext_changed:				
 14355 00001868 58                      		pop	ax
 14356 00001869 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14357                                  					; disk changed!
 14358                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14359                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14360                                  		;clc
 14361 0000186C EBDB                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14362                                  
 14363                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14364                                  
 14365                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14366                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14367                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14368                                  ;
 14369                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14370                                  
 14371                                  checkio:				
 14372 0000186E 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14373 00001871 75D5                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14374 00001873 E837FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14375 00001876 74D0                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14376 00001878 E87CED                  		call	GetBp
 14377 0000187B 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14378 0000187D E89BFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14379 00001880 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14380 00001882 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14381 00001884 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14382 00001886 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14383 00001887 C3                      		retn
 14384                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14385                                  
 14386                                  checkioerr:				
 14387 00001888 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14388                                  
 14389                                  checkioret:				
 14390 0000188B F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14391 0000188C E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr
 14392                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14393                                  
 14394                                  no_error_map:				
 14395 0000188F E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr2
 14396                                  
 14397                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14398                                  
 14399                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14400                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14401                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14402                                  
 14403                                  returnvid:		
 14404 00001892 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14405                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14406 00001895 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14407 00001898 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14408 0000189A F9                      		stc
 14409 0000189B C3                      		retn
 14410                                  
 14411                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14412                                  
 14413                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14414                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14415                                  ;
 14416                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14417                                  ; **trashes si**
 14418                                  
 14419                                  media_set_vid:				
 14420 0000189C BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 14421                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 14422                                  
 14423                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 14424                                  
 14425                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14426                                  
 14427                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 14428                                  
 14429                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14430                                  vid_into_packet:
 14431 0000189F 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 14432 000018A0 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 14433 000018A4 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14434 000018A7 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 14435 000018A9 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14436 000018AC 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 14437 000018AF 1F                      		pop	ds
 14438                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 14439 000018B0 C3                      		retn
 14440                                  
 14441                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14442                                  
 14443                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14444                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 14445                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 14446                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 14447                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 14448                                  ;
 14449                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 14450                                  ;		ah has media byte
 14451                                  ;
 14452                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 14453                                  ;		    no registers modified
 14454                                  ;		carry set
 14455                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 14456                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 14457                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 14458                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 14459                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 14460                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 14461                                  ;
 14462                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14463                                  
 14464                                  hidensity:
 14465                                  
 14466                                  ; check for correct drive
 14467                                  		
 14468                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14469 000018B1 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14470                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 14471                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 14472 000018B6 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 14473                                  
 14474                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 14475                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 14476                                  
 14477 000018B8 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 14478 000018BD 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 14479                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 14480                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 14481 000018BF 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 14482 000018C2 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 14483                                  
 14484                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 14485                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 14486                                  
 14487 000018C4 26807D2207              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14488                                  					; ffOther
 14489 000018C9 7418                    		jz	short Is720K
 14490 000018CB 26807D2209              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14491                                  					; ff288
 14492 000018D0 7411                    		jz	short Is720K
 14493 000018D2 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 14494 000018D4 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 14495                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 14496                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 14497 000018D7 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 14498                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 14499                                  					; 2 sides
 14500 000018DA BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 14501                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 14502                                  					; & head max
 14503 000018DD 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14504 000018E0 E986ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 14505                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14506                                  
 14507                                  Is720K:					
 14508 000018E3 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14509 000018E6 E947ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 14510                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14511                                  
 14512                                  		; 18/12/2022
 14513                                  ;dofloppy:				
 14514                                  		;retn
 14515                                  
 14516                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14517                                  
 14518                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14519                                  
 14520                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14521                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 14522                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 14523                                  ;
 14524                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 14525                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 14526                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14527                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 14528                                  ;
 14529                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 14530                                  ;
 14531                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 14532                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14533                                  
 14534                                  set_changed_dl:	
 14535 000018E9 06                      		push	es
 14536 000018EA 57                      		push	di
 14537                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 14538                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14539 000018EB C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 14540                                  
 14541                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 14542                                  
 14543                                  scan_bds:				
 14544 000018EF 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14545 000018F3 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 14546                                  
 14547                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 14548                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 14549                                  
 14550 000018F5 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14551                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 14552                                  get_next_bds:				
 14553 000018F9 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 14554                                  					; go to	next bds
 14555 000018FC 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 14556 000018FF 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 14557 00001901 5F                      		pop	di
 14558 00001902 07                      		pop	es
 14559 00001903 C3                      		retn
 14560                                  
 14561                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14562                                  
 14563                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14564                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 14565                                  ;
 14566                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 14567                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 14568                                  ;		zero reset - change
 14569                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14570                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14571                                  
 14572                                  checkromchange:	
 14573                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 14574                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14575 00001904 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 14576                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14577                                  					; fchanged
 14578 00001909 C3                      		retn
 14579                                  
 14580                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14581                                  
 14582                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14583                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 14584                                  ;
 14585                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14586                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14587                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14588                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14589                                  
 14590                                  resetchanged:	
 14591                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 14592                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14593 0000190A 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 14594                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14595                                  					; ~fchanged
 14596 0000190F C3                      		retn
 14597                                  
 14598                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14599                                  
 14600                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14601                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 14602                                  ;
 14603                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14604                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 14605                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 14606                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14607                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14608                                  
 14609                                  haschange:
 14610                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 14611                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14612 00001910 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14613                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14614                                  					; fchangeline
 14615 00001915 C3                      		retn
 14616                                  
 14617                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14618                                  
 14619                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14620                                  
 14621                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14622                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 14623                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14624                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 14625                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 14626                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14627                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14628                                  
 14629                                  ; set_volume_id
 14630                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 14631                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 14632                                  ;
 14633                                  ;   on entry:
 14634                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 14635                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 14636                                  ;
 14637                                  ;   on exit:
 14638                                  ;	carry clear:
 14639                                  ;	   successful call
 14640                                  ;	carry set
 14641                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 14642                                  
 14643                                  set_volume_id:				
 14644 00001916 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 14645 00001917 50                      		push	ax
 14646 00001918 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 14647 0000191B 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 14648 0000191D E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 14649 00001920 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 14650 00001922 E8A200                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 14651 00001925 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 14652                                  setvret:				
 14653                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14654                                  		; cf = 0
 14655                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 14656 00001928 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 14657 00001929 5A                      		pop	dx
 14658 0000192A C3                      		retn
 14659                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14660                                  
 14661                                  seterr:					
 14662 0000192B 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 14663 0000192C 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 14664 0000192D C3                      		retn
 14665                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14666 0000192E 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 14667                                  
 14668                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14669                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 14670                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14671                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 14672                                  
 14673                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14674                                  
 14675                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14676                                  
 14677                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14678                                  ;
 14679                                  ;   on entry:
 14680                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14681                                  ;
 14682                                  ;   on exit:
 14683                                  ;	carry clear
 14684                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 14685                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 14686                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 14687                                  ;
 14688                                  ;	carry set:
 14689                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 14690                                  
 14691                                  read_volume_id:
 14692 00001930 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 14693 00001931 51                      		push	cx
 14694 00001932 53                      		push	bx
 14695 00001933 50                      		push	ax
 14696 00001934 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 14697 00001935 57                      		push	di
 14698 00001936 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 14699 00001937 07                      		pop	es
 14700 00001938 BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14701 0000193B BE[FE08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14702 0000193E B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 14703 00001941 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14704 00001943 5F                      		pop	di
 14705 00001944 07                      		pop	es
 14706 00001945 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 14707                                  					; # of fats
 14708 00001949 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 14709                                  					; sectors / fat
 14710 0000194D F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 14711 0000194F 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 14712                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 14713                                  					;
 14714                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 14715                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14716 00001953 2EA3[2E19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 14717                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 14718                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 14719 00001957 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 14720                                  					; # root dir entries
 14721 0000195B B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 14722 0000195D D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 14723 0000195F 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 14724                                  next_sec:				
 14725 00001961 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 14726 00001962 2EA1[2E19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14727                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 14728                                  					; get sector #
 14729 00001966 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 14730                                  					; sectors / track
 14731 0000196A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14732 0000196C F7F1                    		div	cx
 14733                                  
 14734                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 14735                                  
 14736 0000196E 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 14737                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 14738 0000196F 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 14739 00001971 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14740 00001973 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 14741                                  					; # heads on this disc
 14742 00001977 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 14743 00001979 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 14744 0000197B E8FBED                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 14745                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 14746 0000197E 7243                    		jb	short readviderr
 14747 00001980 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 14748 00001983 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 14749                                  fvid_loop:				
 14750 00001985 803F00                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 14751 00001988 7436                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 14752 0000198A 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 14753 0000198D 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 14754 0000198F 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 14755 00001992 7511                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 14756                                  ent_loop:				
 14757 00001994 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 14758 00001997 E2EC                    		loop	fvid_loop
 14759 00001999 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 14760 0000199A 2EFF06[2E19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14761                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 14762                                  					; next sector
 14763 0000199F E2C0                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 14764                                  notfound:				
 14765 000019A1 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14766 000019A3 EB16                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 14767                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14768                                  
 14769                                  found_vid:				
 14770 000019A5 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14771 000019A6 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 14772 000019A8 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 14773 000019A9 57                      		push	di
 14774 000019AA 1E                      		push	ds
 14775 000019AB 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 14776 000019AC BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14777 000019AF B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 14778                                  					; length of string minus nul
 14779 000019B2 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 14780 000019B4 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 14781 000019B6 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 14782 000019B7 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14783 000019B9 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 14784 000019BA 07                      		pop	es
 14785                                  fvid_ret:				
 14786 000019BB 58                      		pop	ax
 14787                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14788                                  		; cf = 0
 14789                                  		;clc
 14790                                  rvidret:				
 14791 000019BC 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 14792 000019BD 59                      		pop	cx
 14793 000019BE 5A                      		pop	dx
 14794 000019BF C3                      		retn
 14795                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14796                                  
 14797                                  no_vid:					
 14798 000019C0 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14799 000019C1 EBDE                    		jmp	short notfound	; not found
 14800                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14801                                  
 14802                                  readviderr:				
 14803 000019C3 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 14804 000019C4 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 14805 000019C5 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 14806                                  
 14807                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14808                                  
 14809                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 14810                                  ;
 14811                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 14812                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 14813                                  
 14814                                  transfer_volume_id:	
 14815 000019C7 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 14816 000019C8 56                      		push	si
 14817 000019C9 51                      		push	cx
 14818 000019CA BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14819                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 14820 000019CD 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14821                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 14822 000019D0 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 14823 000019D3 FC                      		cld
 14824 000019D4 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14825 000019D6 59                      		pop	cx
 14826 000019D7 5E                      		pop	si
 14827 000019D8 5F                      		pop	di
 14828 000019D9 C3                      		retn
 14829                                  
 14830                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14831                                  
 14832                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 14833                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 14834                                  ;
 14835                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 14836                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 14837                                  
 14838                                  check_volume_id:	
 14839 000019DA 57                      		push	di
 14840 000019DB 51                      		push	cx
 14841 000019DC BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14842                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 14843 000019DF 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14844                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 14845 000019E2 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 14846 000019E5 FC                      		cld
 14847 000019E6 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 14848 000019E8 59                      		pop	cx
 14849 000019E9 5F                      		pop	di
 14850 000019EA C3                      		retn
 14851                                  
 14852                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14853                                  
 14854                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14855                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 14856                                  ;
 14857                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 14858                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 14859                                  ;
 14860                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 14861                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 14862                                  ;
 14863                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 14864                                  
 14865                                  fat_check:		
 14866 000019EB 50                      		push	ax
 14867 000019EC 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 14868 000019EE A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 14869 000019F1 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 14870                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 14871 000019F5 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 14872 000019F7 4E                      		dec	si
 14873                                  okret1:					
 14874 000019F8 58                      		pop	ax
 14875 000019F9 C3                      		retn
 14876                                  
 14877                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14878                                  
 14879                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 14880                                  		;times 7 db 0
 14881                                  
 14882                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 14883                                  
 14884                                  		; 09/12/2022
 14885                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 14886                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 14887                                  
 14888                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14889                                  
 14890                                  		; 09/12/2022
 14891                                  		;db 0
 14892                                  
 14893                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 14894                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 14895                                  
 14896                                  %if number2mod>0 & number2mod<16
 14897 000019FA 00<rep 6h>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 14898                                  %endif
 14899                                  
 14900                                  ;align 16
 14901                                  
 14902                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14903                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 14904                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 14905                                  ; 13/12/2022
 14906                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 14907                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 14908                                  
 14909                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------
 14910                                  
 14911                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 14912                                  ; 01/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 
 14913                                  ; ============================================================================
 14914                                  ; end of BIOSCODE
 14915

 14917                                  ; %include sysinit5.s	; 09/12/2022

 14919                                  
 14920                                  ;=============================================================================
 14921                                  ; (IO.SYS) SYSINIT SEGMENT 
 14922                                  ;=============================================================================
 14923                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 14924                                  
 14925                                  section .SYSINIT vstart=0
 14926                                  
 14927                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 14928                                  ; SYSINIT.BIN (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) - RETRO DOS v4.0 by ERDOGAN TAN - 21/10/2022
 14929                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14930                                  ; Last Update: 04/01/2023 (Modified IO.SYS)  ((Previous: 31/12/2022))
 14931                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14932                                  ; Beginning: 03/06/2018 (Retro DOS 3.0), 21/03/2019 (Retro DOS 4.0)
 14933                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14934                                  ; Assembler: NASM version 2.15
 14935                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14936                                  ;	   ((nasm sysinit5.s -l sysinit5.lst -o SYSINIT5.BIN -Z error.txt)) 	
 14937                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14938                                  ; Modified from 'sysinit2.s' (SYSINIT2.BIN) file of Retro DOS v3.0 (6/7/2018)
 14939                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14940                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT1.ASM' and 'SYSINIT2.ASM' files of MSDOS 6.0
 14941                                  ; source code by Microsoft, 1991 
 14942                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14943                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT.ASM' file of MSDOS 2.0 (IBM PCDOS v2.0) source code
 14944                                  ; by Microsoft, 12/10/1983
 14945                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 14946                                  ; main file: 'retrodos4.s'
 14947                                  ; incbin 'SYSINIT3.BIN' ; (SYINITSEG)
 14948                                  
 14949                                  ; 21/10/2022
 14950                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14951                                  ; This source code (version) is based on SYSINIT source code of disassembled
 14952                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS file (SYSINIT.BIN) 
 14953                                  ; Dissassembler: Hex-Rays Interactive Disassembler (IDA)
 14954                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14955                                  ; Binary file splitter & joiner: FFSJ v3.3
 14956                                  
 14957                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 14958                                  ; SYSINIT.TXT (27/01/1983)
 14959                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 14960                                  ;    SYSINIT is  a module linked behind the OEM bios.  It takes
 14961                                  ;over  the  system  initialization  after  the  OEM  bios   has
 14962                                  ;performed any  initialization  it  needs  to  do.   Control is
 14963                                  ;transfered with a long jump to the external  variable  SYSINIT
 14964                                  ;
 14965                                  ;
 14966                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared external:
 14967                                  ;
 14968                                  ;   CURRENT_DOS_LOCATION    WORD
 14969                                  ;
 14970                                  ;This word  contains  the  segment  number of the DOS before it
 14971                                  ;is relocated.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 14972                                  ;
 14973                                  ;   FINAL_DOS_LOCATION      WORD
 14974                                  ;
 14975                                  ;This word contains the segment number of the DOS after SYSINIT
 14976                                  ;moves it.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 14977                                  ;
 14978                                  ;   DEVICE_LIST             DWORD
 14979                                  ;
 14980                                  ;This  double  word  pointer  points  to  the  linked  list  of
 14981                                  ;character and block device drivers.  The  OEM  must  set  this
 14982                                  ;value.
 14983                                  ;
 14984                                  ;   MEMORY_SIZE             WORD
 14985                                  ;
 14986                                  ;This word  contains  the  number  of  RAM  paragraphs.  If the
 14987                                  ;bios doesn't set  this  variable  SYSINIT  will  automatically
 14988                                  ;calculate it.   NOTE:  systems with PARITY checked memory must
 14989                                  ;size memory in the BIOS.  SYSINITs method is to  write  memory
 14990                                  ;and read it back until it gets a mismatch.
 14991                                  ;
 14992                                  ;   DEFAULT_DRIVE           BYTE
 14993                                  ;
 14994                                  ;This is  the initial default drive when the system first comes
 14995                                  ;up.  drive a=0, drive b=1,  etc.   If  the  bios  doesn't  set
 14996                                  ;it then drive a is assumed.
 14997                                  ;
 14998                                  ;   BUFFERS                 BYTE
 14999                                  ;
 15000                                  ;This is  the  default  number of buffers for the system.  This
 15001                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 15002                                  ;It is DBed to 2 in SYSINIT it should be greater than 1.
 15003                                  ;
 15004                                  ;   FILES                   BYTE
 15005                                  ;
 15006                                  ;This is  the  default  number  of  files for the system.  This
 15007                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 15008                                  ;It is  DBed  to  8 in SYSINIT, values less than 5 are ignored.
 15009                                  ;
 15010                                  ;   SYSINIT                 FAR
 15011                                  ;
 15012                                  ;The entry  point  of  the  SYSINIT  module.  OEM BIOS jumps to
 15013                                  ;this label at the end of its INIT code.
 15014                                  ;
 15015                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared public:
 15016                                  ;
 15017                                  ;   RE_INIT                 FAR
 15018                                  ;
 15019                                  ;This is an entry point which allows the BIOS to do some INIT
 15020                                  ;work  after  the  DOS is initialized.  ALL REGISTERS MUST BE
 15021                                  ;PRESERVED.  On entry DS points to the first available memory
 15022                                  ;(after  the DOS).  DS:0 points to a 100H byte program header
 15023                                  ;prefix which represents  the  "program"  currently  running.
 15024                                  ;This  program  should  be  thought  of  as  the OEM BIOS and
 15025                                  ;SYSINIT taken together.  This is not  a  normal  program  in
 15026                                  ;that  no  memory  is  allocated to it, it is running in free
 15027                                  ;memory.
 15028                                  ;NOTES:
 15029                                  ;     At the time this routine is called SYSINIT occupies the
 15030                                  ;highest 10K of memory ("highest" is determined by the  value
 15031                                  ;of the MEMORY_SIZE variable), DO NOT DO WRITES THERE.
 15032                                  ;     Since this is called AFTER DOS is initialized, you can
 15033                                  ;make system calls.  This also implies that the code for this
 15034                                  ;routine    CANNOT   be   thrown   away   by   use   of   the
 15035                                  ;FINAL_DOS_LOCATION since the DOS has already been moved.
 15036                                  ;     If you don't want  anything done just set this to point
 15037                                  ;at a FAR RET instruction.
 15038                                  
 15039                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15040                                  ; TITLE   BIOS SYSTEM INITIALIZATION
 15041                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15042                                  
 15043                                  ;include version.inc
 15044                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15045                                  
 15046                                  ;FALSE   EQU     0
 15047                                  ;TRUE    EQU     0FFFFh
 15048                                  
 15049                                  ;IBMVER	    EQU     TRUE
 15050                                  ;IBMCOPYRIGHT EQU   FALSE
 15051                                  ;STACKSW    EQU	    TRUE		;Include Switchable Hardware Stacks
 15052                                  ;IBMJAPVER  EQU     FALSE		; If TRUE set KANJI true also
 15053                                  ;MSVER      EQU     FALSE
 15054                                  ;ALTVECT    EQU     FALSE		; Switch to build ALTVECT version
 15055                                  ;KANJI      EQU     FALSE
 15056                                  
 15057                                  ;(MSDOS 6.0, versiona.inc, 1991)
 15058                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15059                                  ;MAJOR_VERSION  EQU	6
 15060                                  ;;MINOR_VERSION	EQU	0	;6.00
 15061                                  ;MINOR_VERSION  EQU	21	;6.21  ; 21/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15062                                  
 15063                                  ; 22/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0)
 15064                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15065                                  MAJOR_VERSION   EQU	5
 15066                                  MINOR_VERSION   EQU	0
 15067                                  
 15068                                  expected_version equ	(MINOR_VERSION<<8)+MAJOR_VERSION
 15069                                  
 15070                                  ;DOSREVNM equ	00000000b       ; m037 - bits 0-2 = revision number of DOS
 15071                                  				; currently 0.
 15072                                  DOSREVNM equ	00000111b	; [[[ 7 for Retro DOS v4.0 ]]] (21/03/2019)	
 15073                                  DOSINROM equ	00001000B       ; bit 3 of ver flags returned in BH
 15074                                  DOSINHMA equ	00010000B       ; bit 4 of ver flags 
 15075                                  
 15076                                  ;      if1
 15077                                  ;      %OUT  ... for DOS Version 5.00 ...
 15078                                  ;      endif
 15079                                  
 15080                                         ;******************************
 15081                                         ;Each assembler program should:
 15082                                         ;  mov ah,030h                   ;DOS Get Version function
 15083                                         ;  int 021h                      ;Version ret. in AX,minor version first
 15084                                         ;  cmp ax,expected_version       ;ALL utilities should check for an
 15085                                         ;  jne error_handler             ; EXACT version match.
 15086                                         ;******************************
 15087                                  
 15088                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15089                                  ; device definitions
 15090                                  
 15091                                  ;Attribute bit masks
 15092                                  DEVTYP  EQU     8000h           ;Bit 15 - 1  if Char, 0 if block
 15093                                  DEVIOCTL EQU    4000h           ;Bit 14 - CONTROL mode bit
 15094                                  ISFATBYDEV EQU  2000h           ;Bit 13 - Device uses FAT ID bytes, comp media.
 15095                                  ISCIN   EQU     0001h           ;Bit 0 - This device is the console input.
 15096                                  ISCOUT  EQU     0002h           ;Bit 1 - This device is the console output.
 15097                                  ISNULL  EQU     0004h           ;Bit 2 - This device is the null device.
 15098                                  ISCLOCK EQU     0008h           ;Bit 3 - This device is the clock device.
 15099                                  ISIBM   EQU     0010h           ;Bit 4 - This device is special
 15100                                  
 15101                                  ; The device table list has the form:
 15102                                  struc	SYSDEV
 15103 00000000 ????????                .NEXT:		resd 1		;Pointer to next device header
 15104 00000004 ????                    .ATT:		resw 1		;Attributes of the device
 15105 00000006 ????                    .STRAT:		resw 1		;Strategy entry point
 15106 00000008 ????                    .INT:		resw 1		;Interrupt entry point
 15107 0000000A ????????????????        .NAME:		resb 8		;Name of device (only first byte used for block)
 15108                                  .size:
 15109                                  endstruc
 15110                                  
 15111                                  ;Static Reguest Header
 15112                                  struc	SRHEAD
 15113 00000000 ??                      .REQLEN:	resb 1		;Length in bytes of request block
 15114 00000001 ??                      .REQUNIT:	resb 1		;Device unit number
 15115 00000002 ??                      .REQFUNC:	resb 1		;Type of request
 15116 00000003 ????                    .REQSTAT:	resw 1		;Status Word
 15117 00000005 ????????????????                	resb 8		;Reserved for queue links
 15118                                  .size:
 15119                                  endstruc
 15120                                  
 15121                                  ;Status word masks
 15122                                  STERR   EQU     8000H           ;Bit 15 - Error
 15123                                  STBUI   EQU     0200H           ;Bit 9 - Buisy
 15124                                  STDON   EQU     0100H           ;Bit 8 - Done
 15125                                  STECODE EQU     00FFH           ;Error code
 15126                                  WRECODE EQU     0
 15127                                  
 15128                                  ;Function codes
 15129                                  DEVINIT EQU     0               ;Initialization
 15130                                  DINITHL EQU     26              ;Size of init header
 15131                                  DEVMDCH EQU     1               ;Media check
 15132                                  DMEDHL  EQU     15              ;Size of media check header
 15133                                  DEVBPB  EQU     2               ;Get BPB
 15134                                  DEVRDIOCTL EQU  3               ;IOCTL read
 15135                                  DBPBHL  EQU     22              ;Size of Get BPB header
 15136                                  DEVRD   EQU     4               ;Read
 15137                                  DRDWRHL EQU     22              ;Size of RD/WR header
 15138                                  DEVRDND EQU     5               ;Non destructive read no wait (character devs)
 15139                                  DRDNDHL EQU     14              ;Size of non destructive read header
 15140                                  DEVIST  EQU     6               ;Input status
 15141                                  DSTATHL EQU     13              ;Size of status header
 15142                                  DEVIFL  EQU     7               ;Input flush
 15143                                  DFLSHL  EQU     15              ;Size of flush header
 15144                                  DEVWRT  EQU     8               ;Write
 15145                                  DEVWRTV EQU     9               ;Write with verify

 15151                                  struc	SYS_FCB
 15152 00000000 ??                      .fcb_drive:	resb 1
 15153 00000001 ????????????????        .fcb_name:	resb 8
 15154 00000009 ??????                  .fcb_ext:	resb 3
 15155 0000000C ????                    .fcb_EXTENT:	resw 1
 15156 0000000E ????                    .fcb_RECSIZ:	resw 1	; Size of record (user settable)
 15157 00000010 ????                    .fcb_FILSIZ:	resw 1	; Size of file in bytes; used with the following
 15158                                                          ; word
 15159 00000012 ????                    .fcb_DRVBP:	resw 1	; BP for SEARCH FIRST and SEARCH NEXT
 15160 00000014 ????                    .fcb_FDATE:	resw 1	; Date of last writing
 15161 00000016 ????                    .fcb_FTIME:	resw 1	; Time of last writing
 15162 00000018 ??                      .fcb_DEVID:	resb 1	; Device ID number, bits 0-5 if file.
 15163                                                          ; bit 7=0 for file, bit 7=1 for I/O device
 15164                                                          ; If file, bit 6=0 if dirty
 15165                                                          ; If I/O device, bit 6=0 if EOF (input)
 15166                                                          ;               Bit 5=1 if Raw mode
 15167                                                          ;               Bit 0=1 if console input device
 15168                                                          ;               Bit 1=1 if console output device
 15169                                                          ;               Bit 2=1 if null device
 15170                                                          ;               Bit 3=1 if clock device
 15171 00000019 ????                    .fcb_FIRCLUS:	resw 1	; First cluster of file
 15172 0000001B ????                    .fcb_CLUSPOS:	resw 1	; Position of last cluster accessed
 15173 0000001D ????                    .fcb_LSTCLUS:	resw 1	; Last cluster accessed and directory
 15174 0000001F ??                                   	resb 1	; pack 2 12 bit numbers into 24 bits...
 15175 00000020 ??                      .fcb_NR:	resb 1	; Next record
 15176 00000021 ????????                .fcb_RR:	resb 4	; Random record
 15177                                  .size:
 15178                                  endstruc
