 29583                                  ;*** isSysMCB - sets ZF if ES points to an MCB owned by "SC" + (8 or 9)
 29584                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29585                                  ; ENTRY:  ES:0 should point to a valid MCB
 29586                                  ; EXIT:   ZF set if owned by SC+8 or SC+9 (for japan)
 29587                                  ; USES:   Flags
 29588                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29589                                  
 29590                                  isSysMCB:
 29591                                  	;push	ax
 29592                                  
 29593                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 29594                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 29595                                  	;je	short ism10
 29596                                  	;cmp	ax,JapanPSPOwner	; 9 (for Japan) is valid
 29597                                  	;;je	short ism10
 29598                                  	;;jmp	short ismX		; Anything else isn't.
 29599                                  	;jne	short ismX
 29600                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8  ; 09/04/2019
 29601                                  	jne	short ismX 
 29602                                  ism10:	
 29603                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]	; Check the name...
 29604                                  	;cmp	ax,'SC' ; 4353h
 29605                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 29606                                  ismX:	
 29607                                  	;pop	ax
 29608                                  	retn
 29609                                  
 29610                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 29611                                  
 29612                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29613                                  ;*** AddrToUmb - converts a segment address in AX to its appropriate UMB number
 29614                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29615                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a segment address
 29616                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain the UMB number which contains the address (0==conv)
 29617                                  ; ERROR:  If the address is above UM Range, AX will return as FFFF.
 29618                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 29619                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29620                                  ; An address in the following areas is treated as:
 29621                                  ;    0      <-> umbhead (0x9FFF)          = Conventional memory
 29622                                  ;    0x9FFF <-> addr of first UM sys MCB  = UMB #1
 29623                                  ;      ...
 29624                                  ;    addr of last UM sys MCB <-> TOM      = invalid; returns #0xFFFF
 29625                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29626                                  
 29627                                  AddrToUmb:
 29628                                  	push	cx
 29629                                  	push	dx
 29630                                  	push	es
 29631                                  
 29632                                  	mov	dx,ax		; DX = address to search for
 29633                                  
 29634                                  	call	UmbHead		; AX = first segment
 29635                                  	jc	short atuE	; If it couldn't get it, error out.
 29636                                  
 29637                                  	mov	es,ax		; ES = first UMB segment
 29638                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now... (cx = UMB#)
 29639                                  
 29640                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 29641                                  ; ATU10--ES - Current MCB address
 29642                                  ;        DX - Address given for conversion
 29643                                  ;        CX - Current UMB #
 29644                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 29645                                  
 29646                                  atu10:	mov	ax,es
 29647                                          cmp	ax,dx		; Present segment >= given segment?
 29648                                  	jae	short atuX	; Yep--done.
 29649                                  
 29650                                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if this is a system MCB
 29651                                  	jnz	short atu20
 29652                                  
 29653                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ a system MCB, we're in a new UMB.
 29654                                  atu20:	
 29655                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 29656                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 29657                                  	je	short atu30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 29658                                  
 29659                                  	;NextMCB es, ax
 29660                                  
 29661                                  	mov     ax,es
 29662                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 29663                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 29664                                  	inc     ax
 29665                                  	mov     es,ax
 29666                                  	
 29667                                  	jmp	short atu10
 29668                                  
 29669                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29670                                  ; if we get to atu30, they specified a number that was past the last MCB.
 29671                                  ; make sure it's not _inside_ that MCB before we return an error condition.
 29672                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29673                                  
 29674                                  atu30:	
 29675                                  	mov	ax,es
 29676                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 29677                                  	cmp	ax,dx		; Present >= given?
 29678                                  	jae	short atuX	; Yep! It _was_ inside.
 29679                                  atuE:	
 29680                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Else, fall through with UMB # == -1
 29681                                  	dec	cx		; (that makes it return 0xFFFF and sets CF)
 29682                                  atuX:	
 29683                                  	mov	ax, cx		; Return the UMB number in AX
 29684                                  	
 29685                                  	pop	es	
 29686                                  	pop	dx
 29687                                  	pop	cx
 29688                                  	retn
 29689                                  
 29690                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29691                                  ;*** convUMB - checks after GetXNum to convert an address to a UMB number
 29692                                  ;            -- if GetXNum read a hex number, we interperete that as a segment
 29693                                  ; address rather than a UMB number... and use that address to look up a UMB.
 29694                                  ; This routine checks for that condition and calls AddrToUmb if necessary.
 29695                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29696                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a UMB number or segment, gnradix has been set by GetXNum
 29697                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain a UMB number
 29698                                  ; ERROR:  None
 29699                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 29700                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29701                                  
 29702                                  convUMB:
 29703                                  	cmp	word [cs:gnradix],16
 29704                                  	jne	short cu10	; If it didn't read in hex, it's not an address
 29705                                  	call	AddrToUmb	; Else, convert the address to a UMB number
 29706                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 29707                                  	jne	short cu10
 29708                                  	inc	ax		; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 29709                                  cu10:	
 29710                                  	retn
 29711                                  
 29712                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29713                                  ;*** setUMBs - links umbs and sets allocation strategy for a load
 29714                                  ;            -- if LoadHigh, the allocation strategy MAY be LOW_FIRST instead
 29715                                  ; of the usual HIGH_FIRST.  See the code.
 29716                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29717                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 29718                                  ; EXIT:   None
 29719                                  ; ERROR:  None
 29720                                  ; USES:   Flags, fm_umb, fm_strat
 29721                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29722                                  
 29723                                  setUMBs:
 29724                                  	push	ax
 29725                                  	push	bx
 29726                                  	call	fm_link
 29727                                  	pop	bx
 29728                                  	pop	ax
 29729                                  	retn
 29730                                  
 29731                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29732                                  ;*** loadLow - returns AL==0 if UMB0 == 0, else AL==1
 29733                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29734                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 29735                                  ; EXIT:   AL==0 if mem strategy should be set to LOW_FIRST, else AL==1
 29736                                  ;         Carry set if UMB0 not specified (_NOT_ an error)
 29737                                  ; ERROR:  None
 29738                                  ; USES:   Flags, fm_strat, fm_umb
 29739                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29740                                  ; We want to set the memory strategy to LOW_FIRST if the user specified a
 29741                                  ; load UMB, and it is 0.  That 0 can be either from the user having _specified_
 29742                                  ; zero (/L:0;...), or from having specified a too-big min size (/L:1,99999999)
 29743                                  ; such that the load UMB is too small, and shouldn't be used.
 29744                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29745                                  
 29746                                  loadLow:
 29747                                  	;push	ds
 29748                                  	;push	cs		; Point DS into appropriate data segment
 29749                                  	;pop	ds	
 29750                                  
 29751                                  	;mov	al,[UmbLoad]
 29752                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad]
 29753                                  	cmp	al,UNSPECIFIED ; 0FFh, -1
 29754                                  	jne	short ll10
 29755                                  
 29756                                  	stc
 29757                                  ll15:
 29758                                  	mov	al,1		; Return with AL==1 && STC if no UMBs specified
 29759                                  	;stc
 29760                                  	;jmp	short llX
 29761                                  	retn
 29762                                  ll10:	
 29763                                  	or	al,al		; AL=the load UMB: Is it == 0?
 29764                                  	;jz	short llX	; Yep... CF==0 (from OR) && AL=0, so just exit
 29765                                  
 29766                                  	jnz	short ll15	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 29767                                  	retn
 29768                                  
 29769                                  	;mov	al,1
 29770                                  	;clc
 29771                                  ;llX:
 29772                                  	;pop	ds		; Return DS to where it was
 29773                                  	;retn
 29774                                  
 29775                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29776                                  ;*** HideUMBs - links UMBs and hides upper-memory as appropriate
 29777                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29778                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 29779                                  ; EXIT:   None
 29780                                  ; ERROR:  None
 29781                                  ; USES:   Flags, fm_strat, fm_umb
 29782                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29783                                  
 29784                                  HideUMBs:
 29785                                  	push	ax
 29786                                  	push	cx
 29787                                  	push	ds
 29788                                  	push	es
 29789                                  
 29790                                  	call	UmbTest		; See if we REALLY linked in anything...
 29791                                  	jc	short husX	; ...if not, there's nothing for us to do.
 29792                                  
 29793                                  	call	FixMem		; Concatenate adjacent free MCBs in upper mem
 29794                                  	call	setUMBs		; Link UMBs and set memory-allocation strategy
 29795                                  
 29796                                  	;putdata fInHigh,1	; Remember that we're now running high
 29797                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],1
 29798                                  
 29799                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB	; See if they gave us a list to leave free
 29800                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 29801                                  
 29802                                  	cmp	al,UNSPECIFIED	; If they didn't,
 29803                                  	je	short husX	; then we shouldn't do this loop:
 29804                                  
 29805                                  	xor	cx,cx
 29806                                  
 29807                                  ; -----------------------------------------------
 29808                                  ; HUS10-CX - UMB number (after inc, 1==first UMB)
 29809                                  ; -----------------------------------------------
 29810                                  
 29811                                  hus10:	inc	cx		; For each UMB:
 29812                                  	cmp	cx,MAXUMB ; 16
 29813                                  	jae	short hus20
 29814                                  
 29815                                  	mov	al,cl		; (stopping as soon as we're outside of the
 29816                                  	push	es
 29817                                  	call	findUMB		; valid range of UMBs)
 29818                                  	pop	es		; push/pop: trash what findumb finds.  :-)
 29819                                  	jc	short hus20
 29820                                  
 29821                                  	call	_hideUMB_	; hide what we need to hide.
 29822                                  
 29823                                  	jmp	short hus10
 29824                                  hus20:	
 29825                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB	; Now check if they offered /L:0
 29826                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0	
 29827                                  
 29828                                  	or	al,al		; --Is the load UMB 0? (-1==unspecified)
 29829                                  	jnz	short husX	; If not, we're done.
 29830                                  
 29831                                  	call	hl_unlink	; If so, however, fix UMBs and strategy.
 29832                                  husX:	
 29833                                  	pop	es
 29834                                  	pop	ds
 29835                                  	pop	cx
 29836                                  	pop	ax
 29837                                  	retn
 29838                                  
 29839                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29840                                  ;*** GetLoadUMB - Returns the load UMB number in AL (-1 if not specified)
 29841                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29842                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 29843                                  ; EXIT:   AL == load UMB
 29844                                  ; ERROR:  None
 29845                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 29846                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29847                                  
 29848                                  ;GetLoadUMB:
 29849                                  ;	;getdata al, UmbLoad
 29850                                  ;	push	ds
 29851                                  ;	push	cs
 29852                                  ;	pop	ds
 29853                                  ;	mov	al,[UmLoad]
 29854                                  ;	pop	ds
 29855                                  ;	retn
 29856                                  
 29857                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29858                                  ;*** GetLoadSize - Returns the load UMB minimum size (0 if not specified)
 29859                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29860                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 29861                                  ; EXIT:   AX == load UMB minimum size
 29862                                  ; ERROR:  None
 29863                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 29864                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29865                                  
 29866                                  GetLoadSize:
 29867                                  	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 29868                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad]
 29869                                  	jmp	short GetSize
 29870                                  
 29871                                  	;push	bx
 29872                                  	;;push	si
 29873                                  	;push	ds
 29874                                  	;push	cs
 29875                                  	;pop	ds
 29876                                  
 29877                                  	;mov	al,[UmbLoad]
 29878                                  
 29879                                  	;xor	ah,ah			;    ax==UMB
 29880                                  	;mov	bx,UmbSize		;    bx==array
 29881                                  	;shl	al,1	                ;    ax==offset
 29882                                  	;;add	ax,bx			;    ax==element index
 29883                                  	;;mov	si,ax			; ds:si==element index
 29884                                  
 29885                                  	;;lodsw				;    ax==size
 29886                                  
 29887                                  	;add	bx,ax
 29888                                  	;mov	ax,[bx]
 29889                                  
 29890                                  	;pop	ds
 29891                                  	;;pop	si
 29892                                  	;pop	bx
 29893                                  	;retn
 29894                                  
 29895                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29896                                  ;*** GetSize - Returns the UMB in AL's minimum size (0 if not specified)
 29897                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29898                                  ; ENTRY:  AL == a UMB number
 29899                                  ; EXIT:   AX == UMB minimum size, as specified by the user
 29900                                  ; ERROR:  None
 29901                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 29902                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29903                                  
 29904                                  GetSize:
 29905                                  	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 29906                                  
 29907                                  	push	bx
 29908                                  	;push	si
 29909                                  	;push	ds
 29910                                  	;push	cs
 29911                                  	;pop	ds
 29912                                  
 29913                                  	xor	ah,ah			;    ax==UMB
 29914                                  	mov	bx,UmbSize		;    bx==array
 29915                                  	shl	al,1	                ;    ax==offset
 29916                                  	;add	ax,bx			;    ax==element index
 29917                                  	;mov	si,ax			; ds:si==element index
 29918                                  
 29919                                  	;lodsw				;    ax==size
 29920                                  
 29921                                  	add	bx,ax
 29922                                  	;mov	ax,[bx]
 29923                                  	mov	ax,[cs:bx]
 29924                                  
 29925                                  	;pop	ds
 29926                                  	;pop	si
 29927                                  	pop	bx
 29928                                  	retn
 29929                                  
 29930                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29931                                  ;*** StoLoadUMB - Overrides the load UMB number with what's in AL
 29932                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29933                                  ; ENTRY:   AL == new load UMB
 29934                                  ; EXIT:    None
 29935                                  ; ERROR:   None
 29936                                  ; USES:    Flags, AX
 29937                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29938                                  ; CAUTION: Should only be used if /L:... was used.  Logically, that is the only
 29939                                  ;          time you would ever need this, so that's okay.
 29940                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29941                                  
 29942                                  ;StoLoadUMB:
 29943                                  ;	;putdata UmbLoad, al
 29944                                  ;	push	es
 29945                                  ;	push	cs
 29946                                  ;	pop	es
 29947                                  ;	mov	[es:UmbLoad],al
 29948                                  ;	pop	es
 29949                                  ;	retn
 29950                                  
 29951                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29952                                  ;*** StoLoadSize - Overrides the load UMB minimum size with what's in AX
 29953                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29954                                  ; ENTRY:  AL == new load size
 29955                                  ; EXIT:   None
 29956                                  ; ERROR:  None
 29957                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 29958                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29959                                  
 29960                                  StoLoadSize:
 29961                                  	push	dx
 29962                                  
 29963                                  	;getdata dl, UmbLoad		; Put UMB# in DL and size in AX
 29964                                  	;
 29965                                  	;push	ds
 29966                                  	;push	cs
 29967                                  	;pop	ds
 29968                                  	;mov	dl,[UmbLoad]
 29969                                  	;pop	ds	
 29970                                  
 29971                                  	mov	dl,[cs:UmbLoad]
 29972                                  
 29973                                  	cmp	dl,UNSPECIFIED ; 0FFh
 29974                                  	je	short sls10
 29975                                  
 29976                                  	call	stowSiz			; We've got a function to do just this
 29977                                  sls10:	
 29978                                  	pop	dx
 29979                                  	retn
 29980                                  
 29981                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29982                                  ;*** hideUMB - marks as HIDDEN all FREE elements in UMB passed as AL
 29983                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29984                                  ; ENTRY:    AL must indicate a valid UMB; 0==conv && is invalid.
 29985                                  ; EXIT:     None; free elements in UMB marked as hidden
 29986                                  ; ERROR:    None
 29987                                  ; USES:     Flags
 29988                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29989                                  
 29990                                  hideUMB:
 29991                                  	push	ax
 29992                                  	push	es
 29993                                  
 29994                                  	call	findUMB		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 29995                                  	jc	short huX
 29996                                  
 29997                                  ; ------------------------------------------------
 29998                                  ; HU10--ES - MCB inside UMB; if it's a system MCB,
 29999                                  ;            we're not in the same UMB, so exit.
 30000                                  ; ------------------------------------------------
 30001                                  
 30002                                  hu10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30003                                  	jz	short huX	; If it is, we've finished the UMB.
 30004                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 30005                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30006                                  	jnz	short hu20
 30007                                  
 30008                                  	call	hideMCB
 30009                                  hu20:	
 30010                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30011                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end  ;'Z'
 30012                                  	jz	short huX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30013                                  
 30014                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30015                                  	mov     ax,es
 30016                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30017                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30018                                  	inc     ax
 30019                                  	mov     es,ax
 30020                                  
 30021                                  	jmp	short hu10
 30022                                  huX:	
 30023                                  	pop	es
 30024                                  	pop	ax
 30025                                  	retn
 30026                                  
 30027                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30028                                  ;*** isTiny - returns with ZF set if user didn't specify /S
 30029                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30030                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30031                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if user DIDN'T specify /S
 30032                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30033                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30034                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30035                                  
 30036                                  isTiny:
 30037                                  	push	ax
 30038                                  
 30039                                  	;getdata al, fUmbTiny
 30040                                  	;
 30041                                  	;push	ds
 30042                                  	;push	cs
 30043                                  	;pop	ds
 30044                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny]
 30045                                  	;pop	ds
 30046                                  
 30047                                  	mov	al,[cs:fUmbTiny]		
 30048                                  
 30049                                  	or	al,al
 30050                                  	pop	ax
 30051                                  	retn
 30052                                  
 30053                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30054                                  ;*** isFreeMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FREE
 30055                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30056                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30057                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is free, else !ZF
 30058                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30059                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30060                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30061                                  
 30062                                  ;isFreeMCB:
 30063                                  ;	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30064                                  ;	retn
 30065                                  
 30066                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30067                                  ;*** hideMCB - marks as HIDDEN the MCB at ES:0
 30068                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30069                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30070                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB marked as HIDDEN
 30071                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30072                                  ; USES:     None
 30073                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30074                                  
 30075                                  hideMCB:
 30076                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 30077                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0], 'HI' ; 4948h
 30078                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2], 'DD' ; 4444h
 30079                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4], 'EN' ; 4E45h
 30080                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6], '  ' ; 2020h	
 30081                                  	retn
 30082                                  
 30083                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30084                                  ;*** unHideMCB - marks as FREE the MCB at ES:0
 30085                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30086                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30087                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB marked as FREE
 30088                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30089                                  ; USES:     None
 30090                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30091                                  
 30092                                  unHideMCB:
 30093                                  	push	ax
 30094                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],FreePSPOwner ; 0
 30095                                  	mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30096                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 30097                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 30098                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 30099                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 30100                                  	pop	ax
 30101                                  	retn
 30102                                  
 30103                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30104                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 30105                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 30106                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30107                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30108                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 30109                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 30110                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 30111                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30112                                  
 30113                                  findUMB:
 30114                                  	push	ax
 30115                                  	push	cx
 30116                                  	push	dx
 30117                                  
 30118                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 30119                                  
 30120                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 30121                                  
 30122                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 30123                                  	mov	es,ax
 30124                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 30125                                  
 30126                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30127                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 30128                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 30129                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 30130                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30131                                  
 30132                                  fu10:	
 30133                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 30134                                  	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 30135                                  
 30136                                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30137                                  	jnz	short fu20
 30138                                  
 30139                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 30140                                  fu20:	
 30141                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30142                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30143                                  	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30144                                  
 30145                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30146                                  	mov     ax,es
 30147                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30148                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30149                                  	inc     ax
 30150                                  	mov     es,ax
 30151                                  
 30152                                  	jmp	short fu10
 30153                                  fuE:	
 30154                                  	stc
 30155                                  fuX:
 30156                                  	pop	dx
 30157                                  	pop	cx
 30158                                  	pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 30159                                  	retn
 30160                                  
 30161                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30162                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 30163                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30164                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30165                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 30166                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 30167                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 30168                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30169                                  
 30170                                  BigFree:
 30171                                  	push	bx
 30172                                  	push	cx
 30173                                  
 30174                                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 30175                                  	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 30176                                  
 30177                                  	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 30178                                  	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 30179                                  
 30180                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30181                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 30182                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 30183                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 30184                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30185                                  
 30186                                  bf10:	
 30187                                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 30188                                  	jz	short bf30
 30189                                  
 30190                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 30191                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30192                                  	jnz	short bf20
 30193                                  
 30194                                  	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30195                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 30196                                  	cmp	cx,ax
 30197                                  	jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 30198                                  
 30199                                  	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 30200                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 30201                                  	mov	cx,ax
 30202                                  
 30203                                  bf20:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30204                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 30205                                  	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 30206                                  
 30207                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 30208                                  	mov     ax,es
 30209                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30210                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30211                                  	inc     ax
 30212                                  	mov     es,ax
 30213                                  
 30214                                  	jmp	short bf10
 30215                                  
 30216                                  bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 30217                                  	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 30218                                  	or	bx,bx
 30219                                  	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 30220                                  bfE:	
 30221                                  	stc
 30222                                  bfX:
 30223                                  	pop	cx
 30224                                  	pop	bx
 30225                                  	retn
 30226                                  
 30227                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30228                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 30229                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30230                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30231                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 30232                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30233                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30234                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30235                                  
 30236                                  isSpecified:
 30237                                  	push	ax
 30238                                  
 30239                                  	xor	bh,bh
 30240                                  	mov	bl,al
 30241                                  
 30242                                  	;getdata al, DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 30243                                  	;
 30244                                  	;push	ds
 30245                                  	;push	cs
 30246                                  	;pop	ds
 30247                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 30248                                  	;pop	ds
 30249                                  	
 30250                                  	mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 30251                                  	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 30252                                  
 30253                                  	pop	ax
 30254                                  	retn
 30255                                  
 30256                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30257                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 30258                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30259                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 30260                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 30261                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 30262                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30263                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30264                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 30265                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 30266                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 30267                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 30268                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 30269                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30270                                  
 30271                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 30272                                  
 30273                                  shrinkMCB:
 30274                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, es>
 30275                                  	push	bx
 30276                                  	push	cx
 30277                                  	push	es
 30278                                  
 30279                                  	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 30280                                  	mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 30281                                  
 30282                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30283                                  	sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 30284                                  	;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 30285                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 30286                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30287                                  	cmp	cx,bx
 30288                                  	jb	short smE ; (*)
 30289                                  
 30290                                  	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30291                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30292                                  
 30293                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 30294                                  	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 30295                                  
 30296                                  	add	ax,bx
 30297                                  	inc	ax
 30298                                  	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 30299                                  
 30300                                  	mov	ax,cx
 30301                                  	sub	ax,bx
 30302                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30303                                  	; ax > 0
 30304                                  	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 30305                                  
 30306                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30307                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 30308                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 30309                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 30310                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30311                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 30312                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 30313                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 30314                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 30315                                  
 30316                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30317                                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 30318                                  
 30319                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30320                                  	; cf=0
 30321                                  	;clc
 30322                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30323                                  	;jmp	short smX
 30324                                  smE:	
 30325                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30326                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 30327                                  	;stc
 30328                                  smX:	
 30329                                  	;popreg	<es, cx, bx>
 30330                                  	pop	es
 30331                                  	pop	cx
 30332                                  	pop	bx
 30333                                  	retn
 30334                                  
 30335                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30336                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 30337                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30338                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 30339                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 30340                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30341                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 30342                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30343                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 30344                                  ;
 30345                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 30346                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 30347                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 30348                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 30349                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 30350                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 30351                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 30352                                  ;       Endif
 30353                                  ;    Endif
 30354                                  ; Endif
 30355                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 30356                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 30357                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 30358                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 30359                                  ;    ENDIF
 30360                                  ; ENDIF
 30361                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30362                                  
 30363                                  _hideUMB_:
 30364                                  	push	bx
 30365                                  	push	dx
 30366                                  	push	es
 30367                                  
 30368                                  	mov	al,cl
 30369                                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 30370                                  	jz	short hu_20
 30371                                  
 30372                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 30373                                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 30374                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 30375                                  
 30376                                  	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 30377                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 30378                                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 30379                                  	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 30380                                  
 30381                                  	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 30382                                  	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 30383                                  
 30384                                  	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 30385                                  	jbe	short hu_10
 30386                                  
 30387                                  	mov	al,cl		;   Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 30388                                  	call	unMarkUMB
 30389                                  	jmp	short hu_20
 30390                                  hu_10:	
 30391                                  	call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 30392                                  	jz	short hu_20
 30393                                  
 30394                                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 30395                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 30396                                  
 30397                                  	mov	dx,es
 30398                                  	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 30399                                  
 30400                                  hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 30401                                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 30402                                  	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 30403                                  
 30404                                  	xor	dx,dx
 30405                                  hu_30:	
 30406                                  	mov	al,cl
 30407                                  
 30408                                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 30409                                  
 30410                                  	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 30411                                  	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 30412                                  
 30413                                  	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 30414                                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 30415                                  hu_X:	
 30416                                  	pop	es
 30417                                  	pop	dx
 30418                                  	pop	bx
 30419                                  	retn
 30420                                  
 30421                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30422                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 30423                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30424                                  ; Entry:  None
 30425                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 30426                                  ; Error:  None
 30427                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 30428                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30429                                  
 30430                                  UnFreeze:
 30431                                  	push	ax
 30432                                  	push	es
 30433                                  
 30434                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 30435                                  	jc	short ufX
 30436                                  
 30437                                  	mov	es,ax
 30438                                  
 30439                                  ; ------------------------------
 30440                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 30441                                  ; ------------------------------
 30442                                  
 30443                                  uf10:	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 30444                                  	jnz	short uf20
 30445                                  	call	unHideMCB
 30446                                  uf20:	
 30447                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30448                                  
 30449                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30450                                  	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30451                                  
 30452                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30453                                  	mov     ax,es
 30454                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30455                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30456                                  	inc     ax
 30457                                  	mov     es,ax
 30458                                  
 30459                                  	jmp	short uf10
 30460                                  ufX:	
 30461                                  	pop	es
 30462                                  	pop	ax
 30463                                  	retn
 30464                                  
 30465                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30466                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 30467                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30468                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30469                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 30470                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30471                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30472                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30473                                  
 30474                                  isFrozMCB:
 30475                                  	;push	ax
 30476                                  
 30477                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 30478                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 30479                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 30480                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30481                                  
 30482                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 30483                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 30484                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 30485                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30486                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 30487                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 30488                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 30489                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30490                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 30491                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 30492                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30493                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30494                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 30495                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30496                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30497                                  ifmX:	
 30498                                  	;pop	ax
 30499                                  	retn
 30500                                  
 30501                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30502                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 30503                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30504                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30505                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 30506                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30507                                  ; USES:     None
 30508                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30509                                  
 30510                                  frezMCB:
 30511                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 30512                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 30513                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 30514                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30515                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30516                                  	retn
 30517                                  
 30518                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30519                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 30520                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30521                                  ; Entry:  None
 30522                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 30523                                  ; Error:  None
 30524                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 30525                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30526                                  
 30527                                  FreezeUM:
 30528                                  	push	ax
 30529                                  	push	cx
 30530                                  	push	dx
 30531                                  	push	es
 30532                                  
 30533                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB
 30534                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30535                                  
 30536                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 30537                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 30538                                  
 30539                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 30540                                  	mov	es,ax
 30541                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 30542                                  
 30543                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 30544                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 30545                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 30546                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 30547                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 30548                                  
 30549                                  fum10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30550                                  	jnz	short fum20
 30551                                  
 30552                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 30553                                  fum20:	
 30554                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 30555                                  	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 30556                                  
 30557                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 30558                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30559                                  	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 30560                                  
 30561                                  	call	frezMCB
 30562                                  fum30:	
 30563                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30564                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30565                                  	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30566                                  
 30567                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30568                                  	mov     ax,es
 30569                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30570                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30571                                  	inc     ax
 30572                                  	mov     es,ax
 30573                                  	
 30574                                  	jmp	short fum10
 30575                                  
 30576                                  fumX:	pop	es
 30577                                  	pop	dx
 30578                                  	pop	cx
 30579                                  	pop	ax
 30580                                  	retn
 30581                                  
 30582                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30583                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 30584                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30585                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30586                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 30587                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30588                                  ; USES:     CF (AX,BX,DS,ES pushed 'cause they're used by others)
 30589                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30590                                  
 30591                                  UmbTest:
 30592                                  	push	ax
 30593                                  	push	bx
 30594                                  	push	ds
 30595                                  	push	es
 30596                                  
 30597                                  	call	fm_link			; Link in UMBs (if not already linked)
 30598                                  	call	WalkMem			; Check to see if they're really linked
 30599                                  	pushf				; And remember what we found out
 30600                                  	call	fm_unlink		; Unlink UMBs (if WE have linked 'em)
 30601                                  	popf				; And restore what we found out.
 30602                                  
 30603                                  	pop	es
 30604                                  	pop	ds
 30605                                  	pop	bx
 30606                                  	pop	ax
 30607                                  	retn
 30608                                  
 30609                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30610                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 30611                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30612                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30613                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 30614                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30615                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30616                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30617                                  
 30618                                  WalkMem:
 30619                                  	push	ax ; ?
 30620                                  	push	bx ; ?
 30621                                  	push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 30622                                  		   	
 30623                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 30624                                  	int	21h
 30625                                  
 30626                                  	mov	ax,[es:bx-2]
 30627                                  	mov	es,ax
 30628                                  
 30629                                  ; ------------------------------
 30630                                  ; UM10: ES = Current MCB pointer
 30631                                  ; ------------------------------
 30632                                  
 30633                                  um10:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30634                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ;  'Z'
 30635                                  	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.
 30636                                  
 30637                                  	;NextMCB es, bx			; Move to the next MCB
 30638                                  
 30639                                  	mov     bx,es
 30640                                  	;add	bx,[es:3]
 30641                                  	add     bx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30642                                  	inc     bx
 30643                                  	mov     es,bx
 30644                                  		
 30645                                  	jmp	short um10		; And restart the loop.
 30646                                  um20:	
 30647                                  	mov	ax,es
 30648                                  
 30649                                  	cmp	ax,9FFFh		; This sets CF iff ax < 9FFF.
 30650                                  
 30651                                  	pop	es ; ?
 30652                                  	pop	bx ; ?
 30653                                  	pop	ax ; ?
 30654                                  	retn
 30655                                  
 30656                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30657                                  ;*** hl_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0; restores strategy too
 30658                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30659                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 30660                                  ; EXIT:     None
 30661                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30662                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 30663                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30664                                  
 30665                                  hl_unlink:
 30666                                  	xor	bh,bh
 30667                                  
 30668                                  	;getdata bl,fm_umb		; Restore original link-state
 30669                                  	;
 30670                                  	;push	ds
 30671                                  	;push	cs
 30672                                  	;pop	ds
 30673                                  	;mov	bl,[fm_umb]
 30674                                  	;pop	ds
 30675                                  
 30676                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]
 30677                                  
 30678                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 30679                                  	int	21h
 30680                                  	retn
 30681                                  
 30682                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30683                                  ; HIGHEXIT.INC (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 30684                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30685                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30686                                  
 30687                                  ;   Module:   HIGHEXIT.INC - Code executed after LoadHigh or DeviceHigh
 30688                                  ;   Date:     May 14, 1992
 30689                                  
 30690                                  ;   Modification log:
 30691                                  ;
 30692                                  ;     DATE    WHO      DESCRIPTION
 30693                                  ;   --------  -------  --------------------------------------------------------
 30694                                  ;   05/14/92  t-richj  Original
 30695                                  ;   06/21/92  t-richj  Final revisions before check-in
 30696                                  
 30697                                  UMB_HeadIdx	equ	8Ch	; Offset from ES (after func52h) to get UMBHead
 30698                                  
 30699                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30700                                  ;*** UnHideUMBs - Marks HIDDEN elements as FREE
 30701                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30702                                  ; ENTRY:  None; perhaps, earlier, HideUMBs was called... if not, we have
 30703                                  ;               very little to do, as no elelments will be marked as HIDDEN.
 30704                                  ; EXIT:   Sets InHigh to zero; carry clear if HideUMBs was called earlier.
 30705                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30706                                  ; USES:   fInHigh (from highvar.inc), carry flag
 30707                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30708                                  
 30709                                  UnHideUMBs:
 30710                                  	push	ax		; Save ax for what we're about to do
 30711                                  
 30712                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30713                                  ; BUGBUG t-richj 11-8-92: The following six lines were commented out for a good
 30714                                  ;    length of time. Those six constitute a check of whether or not we should
 30715                                  ;    indeed clean up the upper-memory chain; without such a check, COMMAND.COM
 30716                                  ;    will destroy the current link-state and memory-allocation strategy after
 30717                                  ;    every command execution.
 30718                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30719                                  
 30720                                  	;getdata al,fInHigh	; Get InHigh from data segment
 30721                                  	;
 30722                                  	;push	ds
 30723                                  	;push	cs
 30724                                  	;pop	ds
 30725                                  	;mov	al,[fInHigh]
 30726                                  	;pop	ds	
 30727                                  
 30728                                  	mov	al,[cs:fInHigh]
 30729                                  
 30730                                  	or	al,al
 30731                                  	jnz	short uhu10	; If didn't call loadhigh/devicehigh earlier,
 30732                                  
 30733                                  	pop	ax		; then there's nothing to do here... so
 30734                                  	stc			; restore everything and return. Just like
 30735                                  	retn			; that.
 30736                                  uhu10:
