 30737                                  	call	linkumb		; Make sure UMBs are linked in.
 30738                                  	call	FreeUMBs
 30739                                  
 30740                                  	;putdata fInHigh,0	; We're leaving, so update fInHigh.
 30741                                  	;
 30742                                  	;push	es
 30743                                  	;push	cs
 30744                                  	;pop	es
 30745                                  	;mov	byte [es:fInHigh],0
 30746                                  	;pop	ds	
 30747                                  
 30748                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],0	
 30749                                  
 30750                                  	call	he_unlink	; Unlink UMBs
 30751                                  
 30752                                  	pop	ax
 30753                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30754                                  	;clc	; 12/12/2022 (this clc may not be necessary!?)
 30755                                  	retn
 30756                                  
 30757                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30758                                  ;*** he_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0
 30759                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30760                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 30761                                  ; EXIT:     None
 30762                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30763                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 30764                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30765                                  
 30766                                  he_unlink:
 30767                                  	xor	bh, bh
 30768                                  
 30769                                  	;getdata bl, fm_umb	; Restore original link-state
 30770                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]	
 30771                                  
 30772                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 30773                                  	int	21h
 30774                                  	retn
 30775                                  
 30776                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30777                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 30778                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30779                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30780                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 30781                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)
 30782                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30783                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30784                                  
 30785                                  FreeUMBs:
 30786                                  	push	ax
 30787                                  	push	es
 30788                                  
 30789                                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 30790                                  	jc	short fusX
 30791                                  
 30792                                  	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 30793                                  fus10:	
 30794                                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 30795                                  	jnz	short fus20
 30796                                  	call	freeMCB
 30797                                  fus20:	   
 30798                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30799                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30800                                  	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 30801                                  
 30802                                  	mov	ax,es
 30803                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30804                                  	inc	ax
 30805                                  	mov	es,ax		; Go on forward.
 30806                                  
 30807                                  	jmp	short fus10
 30808                                  fusX:	
 30809                                  	pop	es
 30810                                  	pop	ax
 30811                                  	retn
 30812                                  
 30813                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30814                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 30815                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30816                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30817                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 30818                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30819                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30820                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30821                                  
 30822                                  isHideMCB:
 30823                                  	;push	ax
 30824                                  
 30825                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 30826                                  	jne	short ihm_x				; then check for HIDDEN
 30827                                  
 30828                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 30829                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 30830                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 30831                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 30832                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 30833                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 30834                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 30835                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 30836                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 30837                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 30838                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30839                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 30840                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 30841                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30842                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30843                                  ihm_x:	
 30844                                  	;pop	ax
 30845                                  	retn
 30846                                  
 30847                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30848                                  ;*** freeMCB - marks as free the MCB at ES:0
 30849                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30850                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30851                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB free'd
 30852                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30853                                  ; USES:     AX
 30854                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30855                                  
 30856                                  freeMCB:
 30857                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30858                                  	mov	ax,'  '
 30859                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 30860                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 30861                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 30862                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 30863                                  	retn
 30864                                  
 30865                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30866                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 30867                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30868                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 30869                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 30870                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 30871                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30872                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30873                                  
 30874                                  HeadUmb:
 30875                                  	; 13/05/2019
 30876                                  
 30877                                  	;push	si ; ?
 30878                                  	;push	ds ; ?
 30879                                  	;push	es
 30880                                  	;push	bx ; *
 30881                                  
 30882                                  	; 09/04/2019
 30883                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 30884                                  
 30885                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 30886                                  	int	21h
 30887                                  			; DOS - 2+ internal - GET LIST OF LISTS
 30888                                  			; Return: ES:BX -> DOS list of lists
 30889                                  	;mov	ax,[es:8Ch]
 30890                                  	mov	ax,[es:UMB_HeadIdx]	; And read what's in ES:008C
 30891                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 30892                                  	;je	short xhu_e		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 30893                                  
 30894                                  	;clc				; Else, it isn't.
 30895                                  	;jmp	short xhu_x
 30896                                  xhu_e:	
 30897                                  	;stc
 30898                                  	cmc	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 ; *
 30899                                  xhu_x:	
 30900                                  	;pop	bx ; *
 30901                                  	;pop	es	
 30902                                  	;pop	ds ; ?
 30903                                  	;pop	si ; ?
 30904                                  	retn
 30905                                  
 30906                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30907                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 30908                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30909                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30910                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 30911                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30912                                  ; USES:     AX, BX, fm_umb
 30913                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30914                                  
 30915                                  linkumb:
 30916                                  	mov	ax,DOS_GET_UMBLINK ; 5802h
 30917                                  	int	21h			; Current link-state is now in al
 30918                                  
 30919                                  	or	al,al			; BUGBUG: proper check?
 30920                                  	jnz	short lumbX		; Jumps if UMBs already linked in
 30921                                  
 30922                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 30923                                  	mov	bx,1
 30924                                  	int	21h
 30925                                  lumbX:
 30926                                  	retn
 30927                                  
 30928                                  %endif
 30929                                  
 30930                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 30931                                  ; (SYSINIT:2B5Fh)
 30932                                  
 30933                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30934                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 30935                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30936                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30937                                  
 30938                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30939                                  ;
 30940                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 30941                                  ;
 30942                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 30943                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 30944                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 30945                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 30946                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 30947                                  ;
 30948                                  ;	Output : none
 30949                                  ;
 30950                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 30951                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 30952                                  ;
 30953                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30954                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 30955                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 30956                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 30957                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 30958                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30959                                  
 30960                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 30961                                  InitDevLoad:
 30962                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30963                                  	; ds = cs
 30964 00002818 803E[071F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 30965                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 30966                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 30967 0000281D 741F                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 30968                                  
 30969                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 30970                                  ;	cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 30971                                  ;	je	short InitForConv
 30972                                  ;
 30973                                  ;; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 30974                                  ;; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 30975                                  ;; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 30976                                  ;; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 30977                                  ;; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 30978                                  ;; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 30979                                  ;
 30980                                  ;	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 30981                                  ;
 30982                                  ;	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 30983                                  ;	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 30984                                  ;	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 30985                                  ;	pushf
 30986                                  ;	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 30987                                  ;	popf
 30988                                  ;
 30989                                  ;	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 30990                                  ;
 30991                                  ;	jmp	short InitForHi
 30992                                  
 30993                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 30994                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 30995                                  InitForConv:
 30996                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30997                                  	; ds = cs
 30998 0000281F E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 30999                                  					;  current UMB ?
 31000 00002822 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 31001 00002824 E85004                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 31002 00002827 E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 31003 0000282A 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 31004                                  					;  in low memory
 31005                                  InitForHi:
 31006                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31007                                  	; ds = cs
 31008                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 31009                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 31010                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 31011 0000282C A1[FD1E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 31012 0000282F 8B16[F91E]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 31013 00002833 0316[FB1E]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 31014 00002837 EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 31015                                  
 31016                                  InitForLo:
 31017                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31018                                  	; ds = cs
 31019                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 31020 00002839 C606[071F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31021                                  initforlo_x:
 31022                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31023                                  	; ds = cs
 31024                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 31025                                  					;  we are loading low
 31026                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 31027                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 31028 0000283E A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 31029 00002841 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 31030                                  idl1:
 31031 00002845 E86C00                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 31032                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31033                                  	; ds = cs
 31034                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 31035                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 31036                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 31037                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 31038 00002848 A3[EC1E]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 31039 0000284B 8916[EE1E]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 31040 0000284F C706[F01E]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 31041 00002855 A3[F21E]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 31042 00002858 C3                      	retn
 31043                                  
 31044                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31045                                  ;
 31046                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 31047                                  ;
 31048                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 31049                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 31050                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 31051                                  ;		   current UMB
 31052                                  ;
 31053                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31054                                  
 31055                                  SpaceInUMB:
 31056                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31057                                  	; ds = cs
 31058                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 31059                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 31060                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 31061 00002859 A1[FB1E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 31062 0000285C 0306[F91E]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 31063 00002860 2B06[FD1E]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 31064                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31065                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 31066                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 31067                                  	;stc
 31068                                  	;retn
 31069                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31070 00002864 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 31071 00002867 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 31072                                  spcinumb1:
 31073 00002869 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 31074                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31075                                  	; ds = cs
 31076 0000286A 3B06[EA1E]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 31077                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 31078                                  spcinumb2:
 31079 0000286E C3                      	retn
 31080                                  
 31081                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31082                                  ;
 31083                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 31084                                  ;
 31085                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 31086                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 31087                                  ;
 31088                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31089                                  
 31090                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31091                                  ;
 31092                                  ;PrepareMark:
 31093                                  ;	push	ds
 31094                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 31095                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31096                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31097                                  ;	pop	ds
 31098                                  ;
 31099                                  ;	inc	ax
 31100                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31101                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31102                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31103                                  ;	retn
 31104                                  
 31105                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31106                                  ;
 31107                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 31108                                  ;
 31109                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 31110                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 31111                                  ;		 the device.
 31112                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 31113                                  ;
 31114                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 31115                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 31116                                  ;	UMB.
 31117                                  ;
 31118                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 31119                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 31120                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 31121                                  ;
 31122                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31123                                  
 31124                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31125                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 31126                                  
 31127                                  GetUMBForDev:
 31128                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31129                                  	; ds = cs
 31130 0000286F BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 31131 00002872 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31132 00002875 CD21                    	int	21h
 31133                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 31134                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 31135                                  
 31136 00002877 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31137 00002879 742C                    	jz	short gufd_err
 31138                                  
 31139 0000287B 4B                      	dec	bx
 31140                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31141                                  	; ds = cs
 31142 0000287C 391E[EA1E]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 31143                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 31144 00002880 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 31145 00002882 43                      	inc	bx
 31146                                  
 31147 00002883 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31148 00002886 CD21                    	int	21h
 31149 00002888 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 31150                                  
 31151                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31152                                  	;dec	ax
 31153                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 31154                                  	;
 31155                                  PrepareMark:

 31157 0000288B 48                      	dec	ax
 31158 0000288C 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 31159 0000288E C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31160 00002894 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31161 0000289A 40                      	inc	ax
 31162 0000289B 1F                      	pop	ds
 31163                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31164                                  	; ds = cs
 31165                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31166                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31167                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax

 31169 000028A0 A3[F91E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax

 31171                                  	;
 31172                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31173                                  	; cf=0
 31174                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 31175 000028A6 C3                      	retn
 31176                                  gufd_err:
 31177 000028A7 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 31178                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31179                                  	; ds = cs
 31180                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 31181                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax

 31189                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31190                                  ;
 31191                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 31192                                  ;
 31193                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 31194                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 31195                                  ;
 31196                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 31197                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 31198                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 31199                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 31200                                  ;
 31201                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 31202                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 31203                                  ;
 31204                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31205                                  
 31206                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31207                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)

 31216 000028C0 40                      	inc	ax
 31217 000028C1 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax

 31219                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 31220                                  
 31221 000028C5 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 31222 000028C6 2EC536[F803]            	lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 31223                                  
 31224 000028CB 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31225 000028CD FC                      	cld
 31226                                  dsm_again:
 31227 000028CE AC                      	lodsb
 31228 000028CF 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 31229 000028D1 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 31230 000028D3 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31231 000028D5 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31232                                  isit_slash:
 31233 000028D7 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 31234 000028D9 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 31235 000028DB 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31236 000028DD EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31237                                  isit_null:

 31239 000028E1 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 31240 000028E3 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 31241                                  
 31242 000028E5 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 31243 000028E8 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 31244                                  dsm_next_char:
 31245 000028EB AC                      	lodsb
 31246 000028EC 08C0                    	or	al, al
 31247 000028EE 7407                    	jz	short blankout

 31249 000028F2 7403                    	je	short blankout

 31252                                  blankout:

 31256                                  dsm_exit:

 31266                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 31267                                  ;
 31268                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 31269                                  ;
 31270                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 31271                                  ;
 31272                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 31273                                  ;	in DevSize
 31274                                  ;
 31275                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31276                                  
 31277                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31278                                  SizeDevice:
 31279                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31280                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *

 31282 00002904 06                      	push	es
 31283 00002905 1F                      	pop	ds
 31284 00002906 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 31285 00002908 B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 31286 0000290B CD21                    	int	21h
 31287 0000290D 7243                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 31288                                  
 31289 0000290F 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 31290 00002911 B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 31291 00002914 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 31292 00002916 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 31293 00002918 CD21                    	int	21h
 31294 0000291A 722F                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 31295 0000291C 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 31296 0000291F 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31297 00002922 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 31298 00002926 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no
 31299 00002928 2EC706[EA1E]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 31300                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 31301 0000292F EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 31302                                  szdev1:
 31303 00002931 B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 31304 00002933 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 31305 00002935 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 31306 00002937 D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 31307 00002939 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 31308                                  	;
 31309                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31310 0000293B 2E3B06[081F]            	cmp     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31311 00002940 7705                    	ja      short szdev2
 31312 00002942 2EA1[081F]              	mov     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31313                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31314 00002946 F8                      	clc
 31315                                  szdev2:
 31316 00002947 2EA3[EA1E]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size
 31317                                  
 31318                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31319                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31320                                  	; cf=0
 31321                                  	;clc
 31322                                  sd_close:
 31323 0000294B 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our
 31324                                  					;  carry flag
 31325 0000294C B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close
 31326 0000294F CD21                    	int	21h			; we are not checking for err
 31327 00002951 9D                      	popf
 31328                                  sd_err:
 31329                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31330                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *

 31332 00002953 C3                      	retn

 31635 00002A36 EBF5                    	jmp	short sd_next_char ; 01/11/2022
 31636                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31637                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31638                                  ;sd_ret:
 31639                                  	;retn

 31641                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31642                                  ;
 31643                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 31644                                  ;
 31645                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 31646                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 31647                                  ;
 31648                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 31649                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 31650                                  ;
 31651                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 31652                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 31653                                  ;
 31654                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31655                                  
 31656                                  ; 13/05/2019
 31657                                  
 31658                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31659                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 31660                                  GetHexNum:
 31661 00002A38 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 31662 00002A3A 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 31663                                  ghn_next:
 31664 00002A3C 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 31665 00002A3F 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 31666 00002A42 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 31667 00002A44 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 31668 00002A47 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 31669 00002A49 50                      	push	ax
 31670 00002A4A 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 31671 00002A4C E83706                  	call	delim
 31672 00002A4F 58                      	pop	ax
 31673                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31674 00002A50 B90400                  	mov	cx, 4
 31675 00002A53 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 31676 00002A55 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 31677                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 31678                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31679 00002A58 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 31680                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31681                                  	;mov	cx,4
 31682                                  ghn_shift1:
 31683 00002A5A D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 31684 00002A5C D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 31685 00002A5E E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 31686 00002A60 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 31687 00002A62 46                      	inc	si
 31688 00002A63 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 31689                                  ghn_into_paras:
 31690 00002A65 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 31691 00002A68 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31692 00002A6B F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 31693 00002A6F 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 31694                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31695                                  	;mov	cx,4
 31696                                  ghn_shift2:
 31697 00002A71 F8                      	clc
 31698 00002A72 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 31699 00002A74 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 31700 00002A76 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 31701 00002A78 F8                      	clc
 31702 00002A79 C3                      	retn
 31703                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31704                                  ghn_err:
 31705                                  gnib_err:
 31706 00002A7A F9                      	stc
 31707                                  ghn_ret:
 31708                                  gnib_ret:
 31709 00002A7B C3                      	retn

 31715                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 31716                                  ;
 31717                                  ;	Retruns binary value in BL
 31718                                  ;
 31719                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 31720                                  ;

 31730 00002A86 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 31731 00002A89 C3                      	retn

 31830                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31831                                  ;
 31832                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 31833                                  ;
 31834                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 31835                                  ;
 31836                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 31837                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 31838                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 31839                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 31840                                  ;				NC
 31841                                  ;			  else 
 31842                                  ;				CY
 31843                                  ;

 31845                                  ;

 31849                                  	; 31/12/2022

 31870 00002AF0 7502                    	jne	short ua_err		; N: error

 31873                                  	; 12/12/2022

 31883                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31884                                  ;
 31885                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 31886                                  ;
 31887                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 31888                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 31889                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 31890                                  ;			; DS = data
 31891                                  ;
 31892                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 31893                                  ;
 31894                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 31895                                  ;
 31896                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31897                                  
 31898                                  umb_insert:
 31899 00002AF7 1E                      	push	ds
 31900                                  
 31901                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31902                                  	; ds = cs
 31903                                  
 31904                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]

 31906                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 31907 00002AFC 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 31908 00002B00 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 31909 00002B02 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31910                                  ui_next:
 31911 00002B04 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 31912                                  					;    new block
 31913 00002B06 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 31914                                  					; Q: is current block the
 31915                                  					;    last
 31916 00002B08 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31917 00002B0E 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 31918                                  					; N: get next block
 31919 00002B10 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 31920                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 31921 00002B12 E8E200                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31922 00002B15 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 31923                                  
 31924                                  ui_insert:
 31925 00002B17 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 31926 00002B19 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 31927                                  
 31928 00002B1A 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 31929 00002B1C F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 31930                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 31931 00002B1E C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'

 31938                                  
 31939                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 31940                                  
 31941 00002B33 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 31942 00002B35 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'

 31944                                  					; mark as free
 31945 00002B42 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 31946                                  					; start & end of new block
 31947 00002B45 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 31948                                  
 31949                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 31950

 31952 00002B4C 43                      	inc	bx
 31953 00002B4D 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 31954 00002B4F 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 31955                                  
 31956                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 31957                                  					; this block
 31958 00002B50 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 31959                                  	
 31960 00002B52 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 31961 00002B58 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 31962 00002B5F 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 31963 00002B63 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 31964                                  
 31965 00002B6A EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 31966                                  
 31967                                  ui_append:
 31968                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 31969 00002B6C 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 31970 00002B71 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 31971                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 31972                                  					; block for the next arena.

 31975

 31977 00002B7F 40                      	inc	ax
 31978 00002B80 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 31979                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 31980 00002B82 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 31981                                  
 31982 00002B84 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block

 31984 00002B86 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 31985 00002B8C 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 31986 00002B93 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 31987 00002B97 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 31988                                  
 31989                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 31990 00002B9E 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 31991 00002BA0 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 31992 00002BA6 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 31993                                  					; mark as free

 31995 00002BAE 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 31996                                  ui_done:
 31997                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 31998 00002BB3 1F                      	pop	ds

 32003                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32004                                  
 32005                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32006                                  ;
 32007                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 32008                                  ;
 32009                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 32010                                  ;	iff it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 32011                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 32012                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 32013                                  ;
 32014                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 32015                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 32016                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 32017                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 32018                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 32019                                  ;
 32020                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32021                                  
 32022                                  umb_coalesce:
 32023                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32024                                  	; ds = cs
 32025 00002BB5 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 32026                                  
 32027 00002BB6 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 32028                                  
 32029                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32030                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32031 00002BB8 8E06[161F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32032 00002BBC 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 32033                                  uc_nextfree:
 32034 00002BC1 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32035 00002BC3 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32036                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 32037 00002BC5 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 32038 00002BCA 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 32039                                  					; N: get next arena
 32040 00002BCC E82100                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 32041 00002BCF 72E2                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32042 00002BD1 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 32043                                  uc_again:
 32044 00002BD3 E81A00                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 32045 00002BD6 72DB                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32046                                  uc_check:
 32047 00002BD8 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 32048 00002BDD 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 32049                                  					; Y: coalesce
 32050 00002BDF 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 32051 00002BE4 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 32052                                  	;add	[3],cx
 32053 00002BE5 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 32054 00002BE9 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 32055 00002BEC 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 32056 00002BEE EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 32057                                  
 32058                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32059                                  ;uc_done:
 32060                                  	;retn
 32061                                  
 32062                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32063                                  ;
 32064                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 32065                                  ;
 32066                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 32067                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 32068                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 32069                                  ;
 32070                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32071                                  
 32072                                  	; 01/11/2022
 32073                                  get_next:
 32074 00002BF0 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32075 00002BF5 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 32076                                  _get_next_:
 32077 00002BF7 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 32078 00002BF9 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 32079 00002BFD 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 32080 00002BFE 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32081                                  	;clc
 32082                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32083                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32084                                  	; cf=0
 32085                                  	;clc
 32086 00002C00 C3                      	retn
 32087                                  gn_err:
 32088 00002C01 F9                      	stc
 32089                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 32090                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 32091 00002C02 C3                      	retn
 32092                                  
 32093                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32094                                  ;
 32095                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 32096                                  ;
 32097                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32098                                  
 32099                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32100                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 32101                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 32102                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32103                                  	; ds = cs
 32104 00002C03 E8D3FE                  	call	umb_allocate
 32105 00002C06 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32106                                  
 32107                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 32108                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 32109                                  
 32110                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32111                                  	; ds = cs
 32112                                  
 32113 00002C08 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 32114 00002C0A B106                    	mov	cl,6
 32115 00002C0C D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 32116                                  
 32117 00002C0E 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 32118 00002C10 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 32119                                  
 32120 00002C12 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32121                                  
 32122 00002C14 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 32123 00002C17 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 32124                                  	
 32125 00002C19 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'

 32135 00002C39 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0

 32187                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 32188                                  ;
 32189                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 32190                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 32191                                  ;
 32192                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32193                                  
 32194                                  ShrinkUMB:
 32195                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32196                                  	; ds = cs
 32197 00002C77 833E[F91E]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 32198                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 32199 00002C7C 7421                    	je	short su_exit
 32200 00002C7E 06                      	push	es
 32201 00002C7F 53                      	push	bx
 32202                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32203                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 32204                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32205                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32206 00002C80 8B1E[FD1E]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 32207 00002C84 2B1E[F91E]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 32208 00002C88 8E06[F91E]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 32209                                  	
 32210 00002C8C B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 32211 00002C8F CD21                    	int	21h
 32212                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 32213                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 32214                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 32215 00002C91 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32216 00002C93 48                      	dec	ax
 32217 00002C94 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32218 00002C96 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 32219 00002C9D 5B                      	pop	bx
 32220 00002C9E 07                      	pop	es
 32221                                  su_exit:

 32239                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0

 32241                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32242 00002CA9 8E06[161F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32243                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 32244 00002CAD 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 32245 00002CB2 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 32246                                  ulu_next:
 32247 00002CB7 E836FF                  	call	get_next
 32248 00002CBA 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 32249 00002CBC 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 32250 00002CBE 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 32251 00002CC0 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32252 00002CC2 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next

 32261                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32262                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 32263                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32264                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32265                                  
 32266                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 32267                                  ;
 32268                                  ; Summary:
 32269                                  ;
 32270                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 32271                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 32272                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 32273                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 32274                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 32275                                  ;
 32276                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 32277                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 32278                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 32279                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 32280                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 32281                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 32282                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 32283                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 32284                                  ;
 32285                                  ; Example:
 32286                                  ;
 32287                                  ;   [menu]
 32288                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 32289                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 32290                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 32291                                  ;
 32292                                  ;   [network]
 32293                                  ;   include misc
 32294                                  ;   device=foo
 32295                                  ;
 32296                                  ;   [misc]
 32297                                  ;   device=bar
 32298                                  ;   include alternate
 32299                                  ;
 32300                                  ;   [alternate]
 32301                                  ;   device=tar
 32302                                  ;
 32303                                  ;
 32304                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 32305                                  ;
 32306                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 32307                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 32308                                  ;
 32309                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 32310                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 32311                                  ;   following order:
 32312                                  ;
 32313                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 32314                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 32315                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 32316                                  ;
 32317                                  
 32318                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 32319                                  
 32320                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 32321                                  
 32322                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 32323                                  
 32324                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 32325                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 32326                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 32327                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 32328                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 32329                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 32330                                  
 32331                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32332                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 32335                                  
 32336                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32337                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 32338                                  
 32339 00002CCC 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0

 32345                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in

 32350                                  setparms:
 32351 00002CCD 1E                      	push	ds
 32352 00002CCE 50                      	push	ax
 32353 00002CCF 53                      	push	bx
 32354 00002CD0 51                      	push	cx
 32355 00002CD1 52                      	push	dx
 32356                                  
 32357 00002CD2 0E                      	push	cs
 32358 00002CD3 1F                      	pop	ds
 32359                                  
 32360 00002CD4 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 32361 00002CD6 8A1E[9736]              	mov	bl,[drive]
 32362                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32363 00002CDA 43                      	inc	bx
 32364                                  	;inc	bl			; get it correct for ioctl call
 32365                                  					; (1=a,2=b...)
 32366 00002CDB BA[6F35]                	mov	dx,deviceparameters
 32367 00002CDE B444                    	mov	ah,IOCTL ; 44h
 32368 00002CE0 B00D                    	mov	al,GENERIC_IOCTL ; 0Dh
 32369 00002CE2 B508                    	mov	ch,RAWIO ; 8
 32370 00002CE4 B140                    	mov	cl,SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS ; 40h
 32371 00002CE6 CD21                    	int	21h
 32372

 32374                                  ;
 32375                                  ;	;;mov	ax,Bios_Data		; get Bios_Data segment
 32376                                  ;	;mov	ax,KERNEL_SEGMENT ; 70h

 32381                                  ;	test	word [cs:switches],flagec35 ; 4

 32392 00002CEF 8A0E[9736]              	mov	cl,[drive]
 32393 00002CF3 B87000                  	mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 32394 00002CF6 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax

 32397 00002CFA D2E0                    	shl	al,cl			; set proper bit depending on drive
 32398                                  	;or	[531h],al ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS Offset SYINIT:3EACh)
 32399 00002CFC 0806[3105]              	or	[ec35_flag],al		; set the bit in the permanent flags

 32416 00002D01 59                      	pop	cx
 32417 00002D02 5B                      	pop	bx
 32418 00002D03 58                      	pop	ax

 32435 00002D09 C706[7335]5000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 32436                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+1],2
 32437 00002D0F C606[7035]02            	mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_3INCH720KB ; 2
 32438                                  	;mov	word [deviceparameters+2],0
 32439 00002D14 C706[7135]0000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],0
