 32449                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32450                                  ;
 32451                                  ; procedure : parseline
 32452                                  ;
 32453                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 32454                                  ;
 32455                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32456                                  
 32457                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32458                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 32459                                  
 32460                                  parseline:
 32461                                  	push	ds
 32462                                  
 32463                                  	push	cs
 32464                                  	pop	ds
 32465                                  
 32466                                  nextswtch:
 32467                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 32468                                  	je	short done_line
 32469                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 32470                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 32471                                  
 32472                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 32473                                  
 32474                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 32475                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 32476                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 32477                                  	je	short getparm
 32478                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 32479                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 32480                                  
 32481                                  getparm:
 32482                                  	call	check_switch
 32483                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 32484                                  	jc	short swterr
 32485                                  getnext:
 32486                                  	call	getchr
 32487                                  	jc	short done_line
 32488                                  	jmp	short nextswtch
 32489                                  swterr:
 32490                                  	jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 32491                                  
 32492                                  done_line:
 32493                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32494                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 32495                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 32496                                  	jnz	short okay
 32497                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 32498                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 32499                                  
 32500                                  okay:
 32501                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 32502                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 32503                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 32504                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 32505                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 32506                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32507                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32508                                  	; cf=0
 32509                                  	;clc
 32510                                  	call	setdeviceparameters
 32511                                  exitpl:
 32512                                  	pop	ds
 32513                                  	retn
 32514                                  put_back:
 32515                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 32516                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 32517                                  	jmp	short done_line
 32518                                  
 32519                                  %endif
 32520                                  
 32521                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32522                                  ;
 32523                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 32524                                  ;
 32525                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 32526                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 32527                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 32528                                  ; error.
 32529                                  ;
 32530                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32531                                  
 32532                                  check_switch:
 32533 00002D22 E816FA                  	call	getchr
 32534                                  	;jc	short err_check
 32535 00002D25 724E                    	jc	short err_chk
 32536 00002D27 24DF                            and     al,0DFh                 ; convert it to upper case
 32537 00002D29 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 32538                                  	;jb	short err_check
 32539 00002D2B 7248                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32540 00002D2D 3C5A                    	cmp	al,'Z'
 32541 00002D2F 7743                    	ja	short err_check
 32542                                  
 32543 00002D31 06                      	push	es
 32544                                  
 32545 00002D32 0E                      	push	cs
 32546 00002D33 07                      	pop	es
 32547                                  
 32548 00002D34 8A0E[2C37]              	mov	cl,[switchlist]		; get number of valid switches
 32549 00002D38 B500                    	mov	ch,0
 32550 00002D3A BF[2D37]                	mov	di,1+switchlist		; point to string of valid switches
 32551 00002D3D F2AE                    	repne	scasb
 32552                                  
 32553 00002D3F 07                      	pop	es
 32554 00002D40 7532                    	jnz	short err_check
 32555                                  
 32556 00002D42 B80100                  	mov	ax,1
 32557 00002D45 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; set bit to indicate switch
 32558 00002D47 8B1E[9836]              	mov	bx,[switches]		; get switches so far
 32559 00002D4B 09C3                    	or	bx,ax			; save this with other switches
 32560 00002D4D 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 32561                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32562 00002D4F A8F8                    	test	al,switchnum ; 0F8h
 32563                                  	;test	ax,switchnum ; 0F8h	; test against switches that require number to follow
 32564 00002D51 741E                    	jz	short done_swtch
 32565                                  
 32566 00002D53 E8E5F9                  	call	getchr
 32567 00002D56 721A                    	jc	short err_swtch
 32568                                  
 32569 00002D58 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 32570 00002D5A 7516                    	jne	short err_swtch
 32571                                  
 32572 00002D5C E8DCF9                  	call	getchr
 32573 00002D5F 53                      	push	bx			; preserve switches
 32574                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32575                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],' '	; allow space separators
 32576                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32577                                  	; ds = cs
 32578 00002D60 C606[2A03]20            	mov	byte [sepchr],' '
 32579 00002D65 E8D803                  	call	getnum
 32580                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 32581                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32582 00002D68 C606[2A03]00            	mov	byte [sepchr],0
 32583 00002D6D 5B                      	pop	bx			; restore switches
 32584                                  
 32585                                  ; because getnum does not consider carriage-return or line-feed as ok, we do
 32586                                  ; not check for carry set here. if there is an error, it will be detected
 32587                                  ; further on (hopefully).
 32588                                  
 32589 00002D6E E80500                  	call	process_num
 32590                                  
 32591                                  done_swtch:
 32592                                  	;clc
 32593                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32594                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32595                                  	; cf=0
 32596                                  	;clc
 32597 00002D71 C3                      	retn
 32598                                  
 32599                                  err_swtch:
 32600 00002D72 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 32601                                  err_check:
 32602 00002D74 F9                      	stc
 32603                                  err_chk:
 32604 00002D75 C3                      	retn
 32605                                  
 32606                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32607                                  ;
 32608                                  ; procedure : process_num
 32609                                  ;
 32610                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 32611                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 32612                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 32613                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 32614                                  ;
 32615                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32616                                  
 32617                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32618                                  	; (SYSINIT:3156h)
 32619                                  process_num:
 32620 00002D76 850E[9836]              	test	[switches],cx		; if this switch has been done before,
 32621 00002D7A 752B                    	jnz	short done_ret		; ignore this one.
 32622                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32623 00002D7C F6C108                  	test	cl,flagdrive ; 8
 32624                                  	;test	cx,flagdrive ; 8
 32625 00002D7F 7404                    	jz	short try_f
 32626 00002D81 A2[9736]                	mov	byte [drive],al
 32627                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32628                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 32629                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32630                                  	; cf=0
 32631 00002D84 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 32632                                  try_f:
 32633                                  	; 12/12/2022

 32692                                  ;
 32693                                  ; procedure : parseline
 32694                                  ;
 32695                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 32696                                  ;
 32697                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32698                                  
 32699                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32700                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 32701                                  parseline:
 32702                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32703                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 32704                                  
 32705                                  	;push	ds ; *
 32706                                  
 32707                                  	;push	cs ; *
 32708                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 32709                                  
 32710                                  nextswtch:
 32711 00002DA8 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 32712 00002DAA 741C                    	je	short done_line
 32713 00002DAC 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 32714 00002DAE 7421                    	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 32715                                  
 32716                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 32717                                  
 32718 00002DB0 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 32719 00002DB2 760F                    	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 32720 00002DB4 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'
 32721 00002DB6 7402                    	je	short getparm
 32722 00002DB8 F9                      	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 32723                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 32724                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32725                                  swterr:
 32726 00002DB9 C3                      	retn
 32727                                  
 32728                                  getparm:
 32729 00002DBA E865FF                  	call	check_switch
 32730 00002DBD 891E[9836]              	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 32731 00002DC1 72F6                    	jc	short swterr
 32732                                  getnext:
 32733 00002DC3 E875F9                  	call	getchr
 32734                                  	;jc	short done_line
 32735                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 32736                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32737 00002DC6 73E0                    	jnc	short nextswtch
 32738                                  ;swterr:
 32739                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 32740                                  
 32741                                  done_line:
 32742                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32743 00002DC8 F606[9836]08            	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 32744                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 32745 00002DCD 750C                    	jnz	short okay
 32746 00002DCF F9                      	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 32747                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 32748                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32749 00002DD0 C3                      	retn
 32750                                  
 32751                                  ;exitpl:
 32752                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32753                                  	; ds = cs
 32754                                  	;;pop	ds ; *
 32755                                  	;retn
 32756                                  
 32757                                  put_back:
 32758 00002DD1 FF06[D203]              	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 32759 00002DD5 FF0E[D603]              	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 32760 00002DD9 EBED                    	jmp	short done_line
 32761                                  
 32762                                  okay:
 32763 00002DDB A1[9836]                	mov	ax,[switches]
 32764 00002DDE 83E003                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 32765 00002DE1 A3[7135]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 32766 00002DE4 C706[9535]0000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 32767                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 32768                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32769                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32770                                  	; cf=0
 32771                                  	;clc
 32772                                  	;call	setdeviceparameters
 32773                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32774                                  	;jmp	short setdeviceparameters
 32775                                  
 32776                                  %endif

 32780                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32781                                  ;
 32782                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 32783                                  ;
 32784                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 32785                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 32786                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 32787                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 32788                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 32789                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 32790                                  ;
 32791                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 32792                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 32793                                  ;
 32794                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 32795                                  ;
 32796                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32797                                  
 32798                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32799                                  
 32800                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32801                                  setdeviceparameters:
 32802                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32803                                  	; ds = cs
 32804                                  	
 32805 00002DEA 06                      	push	es
 32806                                  
 32807 00002DEB 0E                      	push	cs
 32808 00002DEC 07                      	pop	es
 32809                                  
 32810 00002DED 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 32811 00002DEF 8A1E[7035]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 32812 00002DF3 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 32813 00002DF6 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 32814                                  
 32815 00002DF8 C706[7335]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 32816                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 32817                                  got_80:
 32818 00002DFE D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table
 32819 00002E00 8BB7[1837]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 32820                                  
 32821                                  	;mov	di,deviceparameters+7	
 32822                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32823 00002E04 BF[7635]                	mov	di,deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB ; es:di -> bpb
 32824 00002E07 B91F00                  	mov	cx,A_BPB.size ; 31
 32825 00002E0A FC                      	cld
 32826                                  	;repe	movsb
 32827                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32828 00002E0B F3A4                    	rep	movsb
 32829                                  
 32830 00002E0D 07                      	pop	es
 32831                                  
 32832                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32833 00002E0E F606[9836]20            	test	byte [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 32834                                  	;test	word [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 32835 00002E13 7406                    	jz	short see_heads
 32836                                  
 32837 00002E15 A1[9536]                	mov	ax,[slim]
 32838                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+20],ax
 32839 00002E18 A3[8335]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],ax
 32840                                  
 32841                                  see_heads:
 32842                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32843 00002E1B F606[9836]40            	test	byte [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 32844                                  	;test	word [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 32845 00002E20 7406                    	jz	short heads_not_altered
 32846                                  
 32847 00002E22 A1[9336]                	mov	ax,[hlim]
 32848                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+22],ax	
 32849 00002E25 A3[8535]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax
 32850                                  
 32851                                  heads_not_altered:
 32852                                  
 32853                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 32854                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 32855                                  
 32856                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 32857                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32858                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 32859                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32860 00002E28 B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 32861 00002E2B A2[7835]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 32862                                  
 32863 00002E2E B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 32864                                  
 32865                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 32866                                  
 32867                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 32868                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32869 00002E30 8A3E[8035]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 32870                                  
 32871                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32872                                  	; ax = 2
 32873 00002E34 3906[8535]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 32874                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 32875 00002E38 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediad ; just use default if heads>2
 32876                                  
 32877 00002E3A 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 32878                                  
 32879                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 32880                                  
 32881 00002E3C 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 32882                                  
 32883                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 32884                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 32885                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 32886                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 32887                                  
 32888                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 32889                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 32890                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 32891                                  
 32892 00002E3E 833E[8335]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 32893 00002E43 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 32894 00002E45 833E[7335]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 32895 00002E4A 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 32896                                  
 32897                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 32898                                  
 32899 00002E4C EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 32900                                  
 32901                                  ;	check for 320K
 32902                                  
 32903                                  not_144m:
 32904 00002E4E 833E[7335]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 32905 00002E53 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 32906 00002E55 833E[8335]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 32907 00002E5A 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 32908                                  
 32909 00002E5C B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 32910 00002E5E EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 32911                                  
 32912                                  only_one_head:
 32913                                  
 32914                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 32915                                  
 32916 00002E60 803E[7035]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 32917 00002E65 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 32918                                  
 32919                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 32920                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 32921                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 32922                                  
 32923 00002E67 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 32924 00002E69 833E[8335]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 32925                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32926 00002E6E 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 32927                                  
 32928 00002E70 B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 32929                                  
 32930                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 32931                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 32932                                  
 32933                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 32934                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32935                                  	; ax = 2
 32936 00002E72 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 32937 00002E73 A2[7835]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 32938                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 32939                                  
 32940                                  got_correct_mediad:
 32941 00002E76 881E[8035]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl
 32942                                  
 32943                                  ;	 Calculate the correct number of Total Sectors on medium
 32944                                  
 32945 00002E7A A1[7335]                	mov	ax,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 32946 00002E7D F726[8535]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS]
 32947 00002E81 F726[8335]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 32948 00002E85 A3[7E35]                	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS],ax
 32949 00002E88 F8                      	clc				; we currently return no errors
 32950                                  
 32951 00002E89 C3                      	retn
 32952                                  
 32953                                  ;	M047 -- end rewritten routine
 32954

 32957                                  ; procedure : organize

 32965                                  	; 04/01/2023

 32972                                  ;

 32974                                  ;;   because we the case of values in SET commands preserved
 32975                                  ;
 32976                                  ;	call	mapcase

 32978                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32979 00002E90 E81B02                  	call	mapcase

 32981 00002E93 31F6                    	xor	si,si

 32991                                  org1:
 32992 00002E9C E8B101                  	call	skip_comment
 32993 00002E9F 740D                    	jz	short end_commd_line	; found a comment string and skipped.
 32994 00002EA1 E89601                  	call	get2			; not a comment string. then get a char.
 32995 00002EA4 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf ; 0Ah
 32996 00002EA6 7406                    	je	short end_commd_line	; starts with a blank line.
 32997 00002EA8 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' ; 20h
 32998 00002EAA 76F0                    	jbe	short org1		; skip leading control characters
 32999 00002EAC EB0A                    	jmp	short findit
 33000                                  
 33001                                  end_commd_line:
 33002 00002EAE AA                      	stosb				; store line feed char in buffer for the linecount.
 33003                                  	;mov	byte [cs:com_level],0	; reset the command level.
 33004                                  	; 04/01/2023

 33007 00002EB4 EBE6                    	jmp	short org1

 33010 00002EB6 F9                      	stc
 33011 00002EB7 C3                      	retn
 33012                                  
 33013                                  findit:
 33014 00002EB8 51                      	push	cx
 33015 00002EB9 56                      	push	si
 33016 00002EBA 57                      	push	di
 33017 00002EBB 89F5                    	mov	bp,si
 33018 00002EBD 4D                      	dec	bp
 33019 00002EBE BE[DE34]                        mov     si,comtab		; prepare to search command table
 33020 00002EC1 B500                    	mov	ch,0
 33021                                  findcom:
 33022 00002EC3 89EF                    	mov	di,bp
 33023 00002EC5 8A0C                    	mov	cl,[si]
 33024 00002EC7 46                      	inc	si
 33025 00002EC8 E324                    	jcxz	nocom
 33026                                  
 33027                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33028                                  
 33029                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 33030                                  ;
 33031                                  ;;   Simplify future parsing by collapsing ";" onto "REM", and at the same
 33032                                  ;;   time skip the upcoming delimiter test (since ";" need not be followed by
 33033                                  ;;   anything in particular)
 33034                                  ;
 33035                                  ;       cmp     byte [es:di],CONFIG_SEMICOLON  ; ';'
 33036                                  ;       je	short semicolon
 33037                                  ;loopcom:
 33038                                  ;       mov     al,[es:di]
 33039                                  ;       inc     di
 33040                                  ;       and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; force upper case
 33041                                  ;       inc     si                      ; compare to byte @es:di
 33042                                  ;       cmp     al,[si-1]
 33043                                  ;       loope   loopcom
 33044                                  ;;else
 33045                                  ;;	repe	cmpsb
 33046                                  ;endif
 33047                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33048 00002ECA F3A6                    	repe	cmpsb
 33049                                  
 33050 00002ECC 9F                      	lahf
 33051 00002ECD 01CE                            add     si,cx                   ; bump to next position without affecting flags
 33052 00002ECF 9E                      	sahf
 33053 00002ED0 AC                              lodsb                           ; get indicator letter
 33054 00002ED1 75F0                    	jnz	short findcom
 33055 00002ED3 26803D0D                        cmp     byte [es:di],cr		; the next char might be cr,lf
 33056 00002ED7 7410                    	je	short gotcom0 		; such as in "rem",cr,lf case.
 33057 00002ED9 26803D0A                	cmp	byte [es:di],lf
 33058 00002EDD 740A                    	je	short gotcom0
 33059                                  
 33060                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33061                                  ;
 33062                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 33063                                  ;
 33064                                  ;;   Skip the delimiter test for the BEGIN identifier (it doesn't have one).
 33065                                  ;
 33066                                  ;       cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN  ; '['
 33067                                  ;       je	short gotcom0
 33068                                  ;;endif
 33069                                  ;	push	ax
 33070                                  ;       mov     al,[es:di]		; now the next char. should be a delim.
 33071                                  ;
 33072                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 33073                                  ;
 33074                                  ;;   If keyword is *immediately* followed by a question mark (?), then
 33075                                  ;;   set the high bit of the ASCII command code (CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY) that is
 33076                                  ;;   stored in the CONFIG.SYS memory image.
 33077                                  ;
 33078                                  ;       cmp     al,'?'                  ; explicit interactive command?
 33079                                  ;       jne	short no_query		; no
 33080                                  ;       pop     ax                      ; yes, so retrieve the original code
 33081                                  ;       or      al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ; and set the QUERY bit
 33082                                  ;       jmp     short gotcom0           ;

 33085                                  ;       jmp     short gotcom0
 33086                                  ;no_query:
 33087                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 33088                                  
 33089                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33090 00002EDF 50                      	push	ax
 33091 00002EE0 268A05                  	mov	al,[es:di]		; now the next char. should be a delim.
 33092                                  
 33093 00002EE3 E8A001                  	call	delim
 33094                                  no_delim:
 33095 00002EE6 58                      	pop	ax
 33096 00002EE7 75DA                    	jnz	short findcom
 33097                                  gotcom0:
 33098 00002EE9 5F                      	pop	di
 33099 00002EEA 5E                      	pop	si
 33100 00002EEB 59                      	pop	cx
 33101 00002EEC EB0F                    	jmp	short gotcom
 33102                                  nocom:
 33103 00002EEE 5F                      	pop	di

 33424                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33425                                  ;
 33426                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 33427                                  ;
 33428                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 33429                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 33430                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 33431                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 33432                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 33433                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 33434                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 33435                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 33436                                  ;
 33437                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33438                                  
 33439                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33440                                  
 33441                                  skip_comment:
 33442 00003050 E3EE                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 33443                                  
 33444                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33445                                  	; ds = cs	
 33446                                  
 33447 00003052 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 33448                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 33449 00003057 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 33450                                  
 33451 00003059 803E[CD03]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 33452                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 33453 0000305E 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 33454                                  
 33455 00003060 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 33456                                  	
 33457 00003063 3806[CE03]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 33458                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 33459 00003067 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 33460                                  
 33461 00003069 803E[CD03]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 33462                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 33463 0000306E 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 33464                                  
 33465 00003070 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 33466                                  	
 33467 00003074 3806[CF03]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 33468                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 33469 00003078 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 33470                                  skip_cmmt:
 33471 0000307A E3C4                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 33472 0000307C 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 33473 0000307F 46                      	inc	si
 33474 00003080 49                      	dec	cx
 33475 00003081 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 33476 00003083 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 33477                                  no_commt:
 33478 00003085 C3                      	retn
 33479                                  
 33480                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33481                                  %if 0
 33482                                  
 33483                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 33484                                  
 33485                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33486                                  ;
 33487                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 33488                                  ;
 33489                                  ;   INPUT
 33490                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 33491                                  ;
 33492                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33493                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 33494                                  ;
 33495                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33496                                  ;       All
 33497                                  ;
 33498                                  ;   HISTORY
 33499                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 33500                                  ;
 33501                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33502                                  
 33503                                  kbd_read:
 33504                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 33505                                          jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 33506                                  
 33507                                          push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 33508                                          sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 33509                                          mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 33510                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 33511                                  kbd_loop:
 33512                                          mov     ah,1            ;
 33513                                          int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 33514                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 33515                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 33516                                          int     16h             ;
 33517                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 33518                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 33519                                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 33520                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 33521                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33522                                  	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 33523                                  
 33524                                  	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?
 33525                                          jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 33526                                  kbd_loopdone:
 33527                                          pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 33528                                  kbd_nodelay:
 33529                                          sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 33530                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 33531                                          int     16h             ;
 33532                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 33533                                          jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 33534                                          inc     bx              ; yes
 33535                                          inc     bx
 33536                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 33537                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 33538                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 33539                                          mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 33540                                          int     16h             ;
 33541                                          jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 33542                                          or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 33543                                          jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 33544                                  
 33545                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 33546                                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 33547                                          je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 33548                                  	
 33549                                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 33550                                          jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 33551                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 33552                                          mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 33553                                          call    print
 33554                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 33555                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4           ;
 33556                                          jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 33557                                  kbd_notf5:
 33558                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 33559                                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 33560                                          je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 33561                                  
 33562                                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 33563                                          jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 33564                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 33565                                          mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 33566                                          call    print           ;
 33567                                          mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 33568                                          mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 33569                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 33570                                          mov     ah,0            ;
 33571                                          int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 33572                                          mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 33573                                          or      bx,bx           ;
 33574                                          jz	short kbd_clean	;
 33575                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 33576                                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 33577                                          jb	short kbd_exit	;
 33578                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 33579                                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 33580                                          stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 33581                                          retn			;
 33582                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 33583                                          clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 33584                                          retn			;
 33585                                  
 33586                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33587                                  ;
 33588                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 33589                                  ;
 33590                                  ;   INPUT
 33591                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 33592                                  ;
 33593                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33594                                  ;       None
 33595                                  ;
 33596                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33597                                  ;       None
 33598                                  ;
 33599                                  ;   HISTORY
 33600                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 33601                                  ;
 33602                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33603                                  
 33604                                  set_numlock:
 33605                                          push    ax
 33606                                          push    ds
 33607                                          sub     ax,ax
 33608                                          mov     ds,ax
 33609                                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 33610                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 33611                                          jne	short not_off	; no
 33612                                          and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 33613                                          jmp     short set_done
 33614                                  not_off:
 33615                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 33616                                          stc
 33617                                          jne	short set_done	; no
 33618                                          or      byte [0417h],20h
 33619                                  set_done:
 33620                                          pop     ds
 33621                                          pop     ax
 33622                                          retn
 33623                                  
 33624                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33625                                  
 33626                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33627                                  ;
 33628                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 33629                                  ;
 33630                                  ;   INPUT
 33631                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 33632                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 33633                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 33634                                  ;
 33635                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33636                                  ;       Same as above;  the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 33637                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 33638                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 33639                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 33640                                  ;
 33641                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33642                                  ;       All
 33643                                  ;
 33644                                  ;   NOTES
 33645                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 33646                                  ;
 33647                                  ;   HISTORY
 33648                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33649                                  ;
 33650                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33651                                  
 33652                                  menu_check:
 33653                                  
 33654                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present;  if so, then
 33655                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 33656                                  
 33657                                          push    cx              ;
 33658                                          push    si              ;
 33659                                          sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 33660                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 33661                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 33662                                          jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 33663                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 33664                                          jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 33665                                          inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 33666                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 33667                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 33668                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 33669                                          jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 33670                                          or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 33671                                          jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 33672                                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 33673                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 33674                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 33675                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 33676                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 33677                                          jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 33678                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 33679                                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 33680                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 33681                                          cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 33682                                          je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 33683                                          cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 33684                                          jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 33685                                          call    get_char        ;
 33686                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 33687                                          cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 33688                                          jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 33689                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 33690                                          jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 33691                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 33692                                          cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 33693                                          jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 33694                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 33695                                          jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 33696                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 33697                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 33698                                          jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 33699                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 33700                                          pop     si              ;
 33701                                          pop     cx              ;
 33702                                  
 33703                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 33704                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 33705                                  
 33706                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 33707                                          jnz	short menu_search
 33708                                  ;
 33709                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 33710                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 33711                                  ;
 33712                                          call    kbd_read
 33713                                          jnc	short menu_search
 33714                                          jmp	menu_abort
 33715                                  
 33716                                  ;   Search for MENU block;  it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 33717                                  
 33718                                  menu_search:
 33719                                          sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 33720                                          mov     di,szMenu	;
 33721                                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 33722                                          jnc	short menu_found ;
 33723                                          mov     byte [szBoot],0
 33724                                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 33725                                  
 33726                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 33727                                  
 33728                                  menu_color:
 33729                                          push    cx              ;
 33730                                          push    dx              ;
 33731                                          mov     dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 33732                                          call    get_number	; get first number
 33733                                          and     bl,0Fh		; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 33734                                          mov     ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 33735                                          and     dl,0F0h         ;
 33736                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 33737                                          call    delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 33738                                          jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 33739                                          call    get_number	; get next number
 33740                                          and     bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 33741                                          mov     dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 33742                                          and     dl,0Fh		;
 33743                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 33744                                          shl     bl,cl           ;
 33745                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 33746                                  check_color:                    ;
 33747                                          cmp     ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 33748                                          jne	short set_color	; no
 33749                                          xor     dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 33750                                  set_color:
 33751                                          mov     [bMenuColor],dl ;
 33752                                          pop     dx              ;
 33753                                          pop     cx              ;
 33754                                          jmp	menu_nextitem
 33755                                  
 33756                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 33757                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 33758                                  
 33759                                  menu_found:
 33760                                          mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 33761                                          mov     word [offDefBlock],0
 33762                                          mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 33763                                          and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 33764                                  
 33765                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 33766                                          sub     dx,dx           ; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 33767                                  
 33768                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 33769                                  
 33770                                  menu_process:
 33771                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 33772                                          jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 33773                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 33774                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 33775                                          je	short to_menu_getdefault
 33776                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 33777                                          je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 33778                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 33779                                          je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 33780                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 33781                                          je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 33782                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 33783                                          je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 33784                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 33785                                          je	short menu_numlock ;
 33786                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 33787                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 33788                                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 33789                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 33790                                          stc                     ;
 33791                                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 33792                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 33793                                  menu_numlock:
 33794                                          call    set_numlock
 33795                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 33796                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 33797                                          jmp     short menu_getdefault
 33798                                  
 33799                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 33800                                  
 33801                                  menu_default:
 33802                                          mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 33803                                          cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 33804                                          jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 33805                                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 33806                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 33807                                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 33808                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 33809                                          mov     si,bx           ;
 33810                                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 33811                                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 33812                                          jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 33813                                          mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 33814                                  timeout_ok:                     ;
 33815                                          mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 33816                                  timeout_skip:
 33817                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 33818                                  
 33819                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 33820                                  
 33821                                  menu_item:
 33822                                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 33823                                          jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 33824                                          mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 33825                                          call    srch_block      ;
 33826                                          je	short menu_itemfound ;
 33827                                          stc                     ;
 33828                                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 33829                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 33830                                  
 33831                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 33832                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 33833                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 33834                                  
 33835                                  menu_itemfound:
 33836                                          inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 33837                                          mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 33838                                          mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 33839                                          add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 33840                                  
 33841                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 33842                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 33843                                  ;   description...
 33844                                  
 33845                                          mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 33846                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 33847                                          mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 33848                                          call    skip_token      ;
 33849                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 33850                                          call    skip_delim      ;
 33851                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 33852                                          xchg    bx,di           ;
 33853                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 33854                                  
 33855                                  menu_nextitem:
 33856                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 33857                                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 33858                                  
 33859                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 33860                                  
 33861                                  menu_getdefault:
 33862                                          or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 33863                                          jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 33864                                          sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 33865                                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 33866                                  menu_valid:
 33867                                          sub     bx,bx           ;
 33868                                          mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 33869                                          mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 33870                                          or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 33871                                          jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 33872                                          inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 33873                                  menu_chkdefault:
 33874                                          push    bx              ;
 33875                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 33876                                          mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 33877                                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 33878                                          push    ds              ;
 33879                                          push    es              ;
 33880                                          pop     ds              ;
 33881                                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 33882                                          pop     ds              ;
 33883                                          pop     bx              ;
 33884                                          je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 33885                                          inc     bx              ;
 33886                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 33887                                          jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 33888                                  menu_nodefault:
 33889                                          mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 33890                                  menu_setdefault:
 33891                                          mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 33892                                  
 33893                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 33894                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 33895                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 33896                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 33897                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 33898                                  ;   with no timeout)
 33899                                  
 33900                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 33901                                          jne	short menu_display ; no
 33902                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 33903                                          jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 33904                                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 33905                                  
 33906                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 33907                                  
 33908                                  menu_display:
 33909                                          mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 33910                                          int     10h             ;
 33911                                          mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 33912                                          int     10h             ;
 33913                                          push    es              ;
 33914                                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 33915                                          mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 33916                                          mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 33917                                          mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 33918                                          mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 33919                                          mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 33920                                          mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 33921                                          int     10h             ;
 33922                                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 33923                                          mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 33924                                          sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 33925                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 33926                                          mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 33927                                  	dec     dl              ;
 33928                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 33929                                          mov	dh,[es:84h]
 33930                                  	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 33931                                          jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 33932                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 33933                                  menu_clear:
 33934                                          int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 33935                                          pop     es              ;
 33936                                          mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 33937                                          mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 33938                                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 33939                                  
 33940                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 33941                                          jnz     short menu_nostatus
 33942                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 33943                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 33944                                          mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 33945                                          mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 33946                                          int     10h             ;
 33947                                          mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 33948                                          call    print           ;
 33949                                          mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 33950                                          int     10h             ;
 33951                                          sub     dl,2            ;
 33952                                          mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 33953                                  
 33954                                  menu_nostatus:
 33955                                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 33956                                  menu_disploop:
 33957                                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 33958                                          inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"?  because it's a 1-byte opcode
 33959                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 33960                                          jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 33961                                  
 33962                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 33963                                  
 33964                                          mov     dl,0            ; select column
 33965                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 33966                                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 33967                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 33968                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 33969                                          int     10h             ;
 33970                                  
 33971                                          mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 33972                                          call    print           ;
 33973                                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 33974                                          mov     dx,crlfm	
 33975                                          call    print           ;
 33976                                          push    word [bDisableUI]
 33977                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
