 33978                                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 33979                                          pop     word [bDisableUI]
 33980                                  
 33981                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 33982                                  
 33983                                  menu_autoselect:
 33984                                          cmp     bx,-1           ; clean boot requested?
 33985                                          jne	short normal_boot ; no
 33986                                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 33987                                  menu_abort:
 33988                                          sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 33989                                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 33990                                  
 33991                                  normal_boot:
 33992                                          cmp     bx,-2           ; back to top-level menu?
 33993                                          jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 33994                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 33995                                          sub     si,si           ;
 33996                                          jmp     menu_search
 33997                                  
 33998                                  not_topmenu:
 33999                                          cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 34000                                          jne	short not_submenu
 34001                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 34002                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 34003                                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 34004                                          mov     si,di           ;
 34005                                          mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 34006                                          jmp     menu_found
 34007                                  
 34008                                  not_submenu:
 34009                                          add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 34010                                          mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 34011                                  
 34012                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 34013                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 34014                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 34015                                  
 34016                                  no_selection:
 34017                                          mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 34018                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 34019                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34020                                          push    ds              ;
 34021                                          mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 34022                                          sub     di,di           ;
 34023                                  
 34024                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 34025                                  ;
 34026                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 34027                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 34028                                  ;   within the requested block.  Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 34029                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion;  the amount of recursion is
 34030                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 34031                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 34032                                  ;
 34033                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 34034                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 34035                                  
 34036                                  copyblock_loop:
 34037                                          push    bx              ; save selected block name
 34038                                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 34039                                          pop     bx              ;
 34040                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34041                                  
 34042                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons:  it hit eof or a new block
 34043                                  
 34044                                  copyblock_begin:
 34045                                          push    ax              ;
 34046                                          push    cx              ;
 34047                                          push    si              ;
 34048                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 34049                                          mov     di,szCommon
 34050                                          push    ds              ;
 34051                                          push    cs              ;
 34052                                          pop     ds              ;
 34053                                          call    comp_names      ;
 34054                                          pop     ds              ;
 34055                                          pop     di              ;
 34056                                          pop     si              ;
 34057                                          pop     cx              ;
 34058                                          pop     ax              ;
 34059                                          je	short copyblock_check
 34060                                          or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 34061                                          jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 34062                                          push    di              ;
 34063                                          mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 34064                                          push    ds              ;
 34065                                          push    es              ;
 34066                                          pop     ds              ;
 34067                                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 34068                                          pop     ds              ;
 34069                                          pop     di              ;
 34070                                  copyblock_check:
 34071                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34072                                          jne	short copyblock_skip  ;
 34073                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34074                                          jmp	short copyblock_loop 
 34075                                  
 34076                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 34077                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 34078                                          call    get_char        ;
 34079                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34080                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34081                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 34082                                          je	short copyblock_begin
 34083                                          jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 34084                                  ;
 34085                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 34086                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 34087                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 34088                                  ;
 34089                                  move_config:
 34090                                          mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 34091                                          push    cx              ;
 34092                                  ;
 34093                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 34094                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 34095                                  ;
 34096                                   	;mov	cx,7
 34097                                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 34098                                          mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 34099                                          inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 34100                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 34101                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 34102                                  copy_boot: 
 34103                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 34104                                          cs
 34105                                  	lodsb
 34106                                  	mov     [di],al         ;
 34107                                          inc     di              ;
 34108                                          loop    copy_boot       ;
 34109                                  
 34110                                          push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 34111                                          mov     cx,128-7        ; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 34112                                          mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 34113                                          or      si,si           ; valid?
 34114                                          jnz	short l1	; yes
 34115                                          push    cs              ;
 34116                                          pop     es              ;
 34117                                          mov     si,szCommon
 34118                                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 34119                                          call    any_delim       ;
 34120                                          je	short l2	;
 34121                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 34122                                          inc     si              ;
 34123                                          inc     di              ;
 34124                                          loop    l1              ;
 34125                                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 34126                                          pop     es              ;
 34127                                  
 34128                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 34129                                  
 34130                                          sub     di,di           ;
 34131                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 34132                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34133                                          pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 34134                                  
 34135                                          push    cx              ;
 34136                                          rep     movsb           ; moved!
 34137                                          pop     cx              ;
 34138                                          mov     ax,ds           ;
 34139                                          pop     ds              ;
 34140                                  
 34141                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 34142                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 34143                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 34144                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 34145                                  ;   is empty.
 34146                                  
 34147                                          push    es              ;
 34148                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 34149                                          inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 34150                                          mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 34151                                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 34152                                          pop     es
 34153                                  
 34154                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 34155                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 34156                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 34157                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 34158                                  
 34159                                  menu_done:
 34160                                          cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 34161                                          je	short menu_exit	;
 34162                                          push    es              ;
 34163                                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 34164                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 34165                                          mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 34166                                          mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 34167                                          mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 34168                                          mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 34169                                          pop     es              ;
 34170                                  menu_exit:
 34171                                          mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 34172                                          mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 34173                                          sub     si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 34174                                          retn
 34175                                  
 34176                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34177                                  ;
 34178                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 34179                                  ;
 34180                                  ;   INPUT
 34181                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 34182                                  ;
 34183                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34184                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 34185                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 34186                                  ;
 34187                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34188                                  ;       None
 34189                                  ;
 34190                                  ;   NOTES
 34191                                  ;       None
 34192                                  ;
 34193                                  ;   HISTORY
 34194                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34195                                  ;
 34196                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34197                                  
 34198                                  copy_envvar:
 34199                                          push    cx              ;
 34200                                          push    si              ;
 34201                                          push    ds              ;
 34202                                          push    es              ;
 34203                                          push    es              ;
 34204                                          mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 34205                                          pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 34206                                  
 34207                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 34208                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 34209                                  ;   config.sys line)
 34210                                  ;
 34211                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 34212                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 34213                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 34214                                  
 34215                                          sub     cx,cx           ;
 34216                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 34217                                          lodsb                   ;
 34218                                          or      al,al           ; NULL?
 34219                                          stc                     ;
 34220                                          jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 34221                                          cmp     al,cr          ;
 34222                                          stc                     ;
 34223                                          je	short copy_envexit
 34224                                          cmp     al,lf          ;
 34225                                          stc                     ;
 34226                                          je	short copy_envexit
 34227                                          inc     cx              ;
 34228                                          cmp     al,'='          ;
 34229                                          jne	short copy_varlen
 34230                                          mov     al,0            ;
 34231                                          mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 34232                                          sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 34233                                          dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 34234                                          sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 34235                                  copy_varsrch:
 34236                                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 34237                                          je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 34238                                          mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 34239                                          push    cx              ;
 34240                                          push    si              ;
 34241                                          repe    cmpsb           ;
 34242                                          pop     si              ;
 34243                                          pop     cx              ;
 34244                                          jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 34245                                          cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 34246                                          jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 34247                                  
 34248                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 34249                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 34250                                  
 34251                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 34252                                          repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 34253                                          push    si              ;
 34254                                          mov     si,di           ;
 34255                                          mov     di,bx           ;
 34256                                          mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 34257                                          sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 34258                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 34259                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO:SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 34260                                  
 34261                                  	rep	; 0F3h
 34262                                  	es	; 26h
 34263                                  	movsb	; 0A4h
 34264                                  
 34265                                  	pop     si
 34266                                  copy_envprep:
 34267                                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 34268                                          je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 34269                                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 34270                                          je	short copy_envdel
 34271                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 34272                                  
 34273                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 34274                                          push    cx              ;
 34275                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 34276                                          repne   scasb           ;
 34277                                          pop     cx              ;
 34278                                          jmp	short copy_varsrch
 34279                                  
 34280                                  copy_envloop:                   ;
 34281                                          lodsb                   ;
 34282                                          cmp     al,cr           ;
 34283                                          je	short copy_envdone
 34284                                          cmp     al,lf           ;
 34285                                          je	short copy_envdone
 34286                                          stosb                   ;
 34287                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 34288                                  
 34289                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 34290                                          sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 34291                                          stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 34292                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 34293                                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 34294                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 34295                                  
 34296                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 34297                                          pop     es              ;
 34298                                          pop     ds              ;
 34299                                          pop     si              ;
 34300                                          pop     cx              ;
 34301                                  
 34302                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 34303                                          retn
 34304                                  
 34305                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34306                                  ;
 34307                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 34308                                  ;
 34309                                  ;   INPUT
 34310                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 34311                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 34312                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 34313                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 34314                                  ;
 34315                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34316                                  ;       Same as above
 34317                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 34318                                  ;
 34319                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34320                                  ;       All
 34321                                  ;
 34322                                  ;   NOTES
 34323                                  ;       None
 34324                                  ;
 34325                                  ;   HISTORY
 34326                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34327                                  ;
 34328                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34329                                  
 34330                                  copy_block:
 34331                                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 34332                                          jc	short copy_done	;
 34333                                  	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34334                                  	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 34335                                          je	short copy_done ;
 34336                                  
 34337                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 34338                                          mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 34339                                          jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 34340                                  
 34341                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 34342                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 34343                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 34344                                  
 34345                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 34346                                          push    di              ;
 34347                                  
 34348                                          mov     di,szMenu
 34349                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 34350                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 34351                                  
 34352                                          mov     di,szCommon
 34353                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 34354                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 34355                                  
 34356                                          mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 34357                                          call    srch_block      ;
 34358                                          mov     dx,di           ;
 34359                                          pop     di              ;
 34360                                          jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 34361                                          push    cx              ;
 34362                                          mov     cx,bx           ;
 34363                                          push    si              ;
 34364                                          dec     dx              ;
 34365                                          mov     si,dx           ;
 34366                                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 34367                                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 34368                                          pop     si              ;
 34369                                          pop     cx              ;
 34370                                          sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 34371                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 34372                                  
 34373                                  copy_skip:
 34374                                          pop     di
 34375                                  copy_error:
 34376                                          clc                     ;
 34377                                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 34378                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 34379                                  
 34380                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 34381                                  
 34382                                  copy_line:
 34383                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 34384                                          inc     di              ;
 34385                                          cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 34386                                          jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 34387                                          cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 34388                                          je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 34389                                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 34390                                          mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 34391                                          inc     di              ;
 34392                                          inc     di              ;
 34393                                          jmp     short copy_next ;
 34394                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 34395                                          call    get_char        ;
 34396                                          jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 34397                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 34398                                          inc     di              ;
 34399                                  copy_next:
 34400                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 34401                                          jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 34402                                  
 34403                                  copy_nextline:
 34404                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34405                                          jmp     short copy_block
 34406                                  
 34407                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34408                                  ;copy_done:
 34409                                          ;retn
 34410                                  
 34411                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34412                                  ;
 34413                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 34414                                  ;
 34415                                  ;   INPUT
 34416                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 34417                                  ;
 34418                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34419                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 34420                                  ;
 34421                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34422                                  ;       DX
 34423                                  ;
 34424                                  ;   NOTES
 34425                                  ;       None
 34426                                  ;
 34427                                  ;   HISTORY
 34428                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34429                                  ;
 34430                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34431                                  
 34432                                  get_linenum:
 34433                                          push    ax              ;
 34434                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 34435                                          push    cx              ;
 34436                                          mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 34437                                          push    si              ;
 34438                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 34439                                          sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 34440                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 34441                                          call    skip_line       ;
 34442                                          jc	short get_linenum_done
 34443                                          inc     bx              ;
 34444                                          cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 34445                                          jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 34446                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 34447                                          pop     si              ;
 34448                                          pop     cx              ;
 34449                                          pop     ax              ;
 34450                                          retn
 34451                                  
 34452                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34453                                  ;
 34454                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 34455                                  ;
 34456                                  ;   INPUT
 34457                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 34458                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 34459                                  ;
 34460                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34461                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 34462                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 34463                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 34464                                  ;
 34465                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34466                                  ;       None
 34467                                  ;
 34468                                  ;   NOTES
 34469                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 34470                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 34471                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 34472                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 34473                                  ;
 34474                                  ;   HISTORY
 34475                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34476                                  ;
 34477                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34478                                  
 34479                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 34480                                          push    ax              ;
 34481                                          push    cx              ;
 34482                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 34483                                          push    si              ;
 34484                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34485                                          push    ds              ;
 34486                                          push    es              ;
 34487                                          pop     ds              ;
 34488                                          call    find_block      ;
 34489                                          mov     di,si           ;
 34490                                          mov     bx,cx           ;
 34491                                          pop     ds              ;
 34492                                          pop     si              ;
 34493                                          pop     cx              ;
 34494                                          pop     ax              ;
 34495                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 34496                                          retn			;
 34497                                  
 34498                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34499                                  ;
 34500                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 34501                                  ;
 34502                                  ;   INPUT
 34503                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 34504                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 34505                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 34506                                  ;
 34507                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34508                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 34509                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 34510                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34511                                  ;
 34512                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34513                                  ;       AX
 34514                                  ;
 34515                                  ;   NOTES
 34516                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 34517                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 34518                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 34519                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 34520                                  ;
 34521                                  ;   HISTORY
 34522                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34523                                  ;
 34524                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34525                                  
 34526                                  find_block:
 34527                                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 34528                                          jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 34529                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 34530                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 34531                                          je	short check_line ; no
 34532                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 34533                                          jne	short next_line	;
 34534                                          or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 34535                                          jmp     short next_line ;
 34536                                  check_line:
 34537                                          or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 34538                                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 34539                                          jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 34540                                  next_line:
 34541                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 34542                                          jmp	short find_block  ;
 34543                                  ;find_exit:
 34544                                  ;	retn
 34545                                  
 34546                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34547                                  ;
 34548                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 34549                                  ;
 34550                                  ;   INPUT
 34551                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 34552                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 34553                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 34554                                  ;
 34555                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34556                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 34557                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 34558                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34559                                  ;
 34560                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34561                                  ;       AX
 34562                                  ;
 34563                                  ;   NOTES
 34564                                  ;       None
 34565                                  ;
 34566                                  ;   HISTORY
 34567                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34568                                  ;
 34569                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34570                                  
 34571                                  comp_names:
 34572                                          push    di              ;
 34573                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 34574                                          call    get_char        ;
 34575                                          jc	short comp_exit	;
 34576                                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 34577                                          mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 34578                                          je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 34579                                          inc     di              ;
 34580                                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 34581                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 34582                                          cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 34583                                          je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 34584                                          clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 34585                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 34586                                          pop     di              ;
 34587                                          retn			;
 34588                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 34589                                          xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 34590                                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 34591                                          xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 34592                                          jmp     comp_exit       ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 34593                                  
 34594                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34595                                  
 34596                                  comp_names_safe:
 34597                                          push    ax
 34598                                          push    cx
 34599                                          push	si
 34600                                          push    ds
 34601                                          push    cs
 34602                                          pop     ds
 34603                                          call    comp_names
 34604                                          pop     ds
 34605                                  	pop	si
 34606                                          pop     cx
 34607                                          pop     ax
 34608                                          retn
 34609                                  
 34610                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34611                                  ;
 34612                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 34613                                  ;
 34614                                  ;   INPUT
 34615                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 34616                                  ;
 34617                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34618                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 34619                                  ;
 34620                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34621                                  ;       None
 34622                                  ;
 34623                                  ;   NOTES
 34624                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 34625                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 34626                                  ;
 34627                                  ;   HISTORY
 34628                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34629                                  ;
 34630                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34631                                  
 34632                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 34633                                          push    ax              ;
 34634                                          push    bx              ;
 34635                                          push    cx              ;
 34636                                          push    dx              ;
 34637                                          push    si              ;
 34638                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 34639                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 34640                                          int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 34641                                          push    dx              ; save it
 34642                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 34643                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 34644                                          add     dh,3            ;
 34645                                          mov     dl,5            ;
 34646                                          int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 34647                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 34648                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 34649                                          mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 34650                                          cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 34651                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 34652                                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 34653                                          mov     ch,ah           ;
 34654                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 34655                                          rol     ch,cl           ;
 34656                                          cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 34657                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 34658                                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 34659                                  print_other:                    ;
 34660                                          mov     bh,0            ;
 34661                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 34662                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 34663                                          mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 34664                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 34665                                          mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 34666                                          mov     cx,1            ;
 34667                                          int     10h             ;
 34668                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 34669                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34670                                          int     10h             ;
 34671                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 34672                                          mov	ax,092Eh
 34673                                  	int     10h             ; display '.'
 34674                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 34675                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34676                                          int     10h             ;
 34677                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 34678                                          mov	ax,0920h
 34679                                  	int     10h             ; display ' '
 34680                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 34681                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34682                                          int     10h             ;
 34683                                          push    es              ;
 34684                                  print_loop:                     ;
 34685                                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 34686                                          inc     di              ;
 34687                                          cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 34688                                          jne	short print_nontab ;
 34689                                          mov     al,' '          ;
 34690                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 34691                                          cmp     al,' '          ;
 34692                                          jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 34693                                          cmp     al,'$'          ;
 34694                                          je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 34695                                          mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 34696                                          int     10h             ;
 34697                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 34698                                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 34699                                          jae	short print_done ; yes
 34700                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34701                                          int     10h             ;
 34702                                          jmp     print_loop      ;
 34703                                  print_done:                     ;
 34704                                          pop     es              ;
 34705                                          pop     dx              ;
 34706                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34707                                          int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 34708                                          pop     si              ;
 34709                                          pop     dx              ;
 34710                                          pop     cx              ;
 34711                                          pop     bx              ;
 34712                                          pop     ax              ;
 34713                                          retn			;
 34714                                  
 34715                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34716                                  ;
 34717                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 34718                                  ;
 34719                                  ;   INPUT
 34720                                  ;       None
 34721                                  ;
 34722                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34723                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 34724                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 34725                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 34726                                  ;
 34727                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34728                                  ;       None
 34729                                  ;
 34730                                  ;   NOTES
 34731                                  ;       None
 34732                                  ;
 34733                                  ;   HISTORY
 34734                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34735                                  ;
 34736                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34737                                  
 34738                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 34739                                          mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 34740                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 34741                                          call    disp_num        ;
 34742                                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 34743                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 34744                                          je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 34745                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 34746                                          int     21h             ;
 34747                                          mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 34748                                  check_time:
 34749                                          mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 34750                                          sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 34751                                          jae	short show_time	;
 34752                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 34753                                          mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 34754                                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 34755                                  show_time:
 34756                                          push    bx              ;
 34757                                          mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 34758                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 34759                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 34760                                          int     10h             ;
 34761                                          push    dx              ;
 34762                                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 34763                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 34764                                          int     10h             ;
 34765                                          mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 34766                                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 34767                                          mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 34768                                          cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 34769                                          mov     cl,10           ;
 34770                                          div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 34771                                          mov     cl,ah           ;
 34772                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 34773                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 34774                                          int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 34775                                          mov     al,cl           ;
 34776                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 34777                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 34778                                          int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 34779                                          pop     dx
 34780                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 34781                                          int     10h             ;
 34782                                          pop     bx              ;
 34783                                  input_key:
 34784                                          mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 34785                                          mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 34786                                          int     21h             ;
 34787                                          jnz	short got_key	;
 34788                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 34789                                          je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 34790                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 34791                                          int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 34792                                          mov     ah,dh           ;
 34793                                          sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 34794                                          mov     bh,ah           ;
 34795                                          jnc	short got_time	;
 34796                                          mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 34797                                  got_time:
 34798                                          or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 34799                                          jz	short input_key	; no
 34800                                          add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 34801                                          jmp	short check_time ;
 34802                                  got_key:
 34803                                          push    ax              ;
 34804                                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 34805                                          xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 34806                                          cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 34807                                          je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 34808                                          push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 34809                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 34810                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 34811                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 34812                                          int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 34813                                          pop     bx   		;
 34814                                  
 34815                                  timeout_disabled:
 34816                                          pop     ax              ;
 34817                                          or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 34818                                          jnz	short normal_key ; no
 34819                                          int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 34820                                          jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 34821                                  
 34822                                          cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 34823                                          jne	short not_up	; no
 34824                                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 34825                                          jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 34826                                          dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 34827                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 34828                                          dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 34829                                          jmp     short print1
 34830                                  not_up:
 34831                                          cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 34832                                          jne	short not_down	; no
 34833                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 34834                                          jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 34835                                          inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 34836                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 34837                                          inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 34838                                  print1: 
 34839                                  	mov     al,bl           ;
 34840                                  print2: 
 34841                                  	call    print_item      ;
 34842                                          call    disp_num        ;
 34843                                  to_input_key:
 34844                                          jmp     input_key       ;
 34845                                  not_down:
 34846                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 34847                                          jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 34848                                          cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 34849                                          jne	short not_f8	; no
 34850                                          xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 34851                                          call    show_status     ;
 34852                                          jmp     input_key	;
 34853                                  not_f8:
 34854                                          cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 34855                                          jne	short to_input_key ; no
 34856                                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 34857                                          mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 34858                                          jmp     short disp_input; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 34859                                  
 34860                                  normal_key:
 34861                                          cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 34862                                          je	short select_done ; yes
 34863                                          cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 34864                                          jne	short not_backspace ; no
 34865                                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 34866                                          retn			;
 34867                                  not_backspace:
 34868                                          sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 34869                                          jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 34870                                          cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 34871                                          ja	short to_input_key ; no
 34872                                          mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 34873                                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 34874                                          mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 34875                                          jmp	short print2
 34876                                  
 34877                                  select_done:
 34878                                          mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 34879                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 34880                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 34881                                  
 34882                                  	; fall into disp_input
 34883                                  
 34884                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34885                                  
 34886                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34887                                  ;
 34888                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 34889                                  ;
 34890                                  ;   INPUT
 34891                                  ;       AL == character to display
 34892                                  ;
 34893                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34894                                  ;       None
 34895                                  ;
 34896                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34897                                  ;       None
 34898                                  ;
 34899                                  ;   NOTES
 34900                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 34901                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 34902                                  ;
 34903                                  ;   HISTORY
 34904                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34905                                  ;
 34906                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34907                                  
 34908                                  disp_input:
 34909                                          push    ax
 34910                                          cmp     al,' '
 34911                                          jae	short disp_ok
 34912                                          mov     al,' '
 34913                                  disp_ok:
 34914                                          mov     dl,al
 34915                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 34916                                          int     21h
 34917                                          mov     dx,crlfm
 34918                                          call    print
 34919                                          pop     ax
 34920                                          retn
 34921                                  
 34922                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34923                                  
 34924                                  disp_num:
 34925                                          push    bx
 34926                                          add     al,'0'
 34927                                          mov     ah,0Ah
 34928                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 34929                                          mov     cx,1
 34930                                          int     10h
 34931                                          pop     bx
 34932                                          retn
 34933                                  
 34934                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34935                                  ;
 34936                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 34937                                  ;
 34938                                  ;   INPUT
 34939                                  ;       None
 34940                                  ;
 34941                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34942                                  ;       None
 34943                                  ;
 34944                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34945                                  ;       None
 34946                                  ;
 34947                                  ;   NOTES
 34948                                  ;       None
 34949                                  ;
 34950                                  ;   HISTORY
 34951                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34952                                  ;
 34953                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34954                                  
 34955                                  show_status:
 34956                                          push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 34957                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 34958                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 34959                                          int     10h             ;
 34960                                          push    dx              ; save it
 34961                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 34962                                          mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 34963                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 34964                                          jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 34965                                          mov     dl,0            ;
 34966                                          int     10h             ;
 34967                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 34968                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 34969                                          int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 34970                                          jmp     short show_done ;
 34971                                  show_onoff: 
 34972                                          int     10h
 34973                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 34974                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 34975                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 34976                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 34977                                  
 34978                                          mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 34979                                          cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 34980                                          jne	short show_noton ; no
 34981                                          mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 34982                                  show_noton:                     ;
 34983                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 34984                                          int     10h             ;
 34985                                  show_done:                      ;
 34986                                          pop     dx              ;
 34987                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34988                                          int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 34989                                          pop     bx              ;
 34990                                          retn			;
 34991                                  
 34992                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34993                                  
 34994                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34995                                  ;
 34996                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 34997                                  ;
 34998                                  ;   INPUT
 34999                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35000                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35001                                  ;
 35002                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35003                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 35004                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 35005                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 35006                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35007                                  ;
 35008                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35009                                  ;       AX
 35010                                  ;
 35011                                  ;   NOTES
 35012                                  ;       None
 35013                                  ;
 35014                                  ;   HISTORY
 35015                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35016                                  ;
 35017                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35018                                  
 35019                                  skip_token:
 35020                                          call    get_char
 35021                                          jc	short skip_token_done
 35022                                          call    any_delim
 35023                                          jne	short skip_token
 35024                                  skip_check_eol:
 35025                                          cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 35026                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35027                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35028                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35029                                          clc
 35030                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 35031                                  	retn
 35032                                  skip_token_eol:
 35033                                          stc
 35034                                  skip_token_done:
 35035                                          retn
 35036                                  
 35037                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35038                                  ;
 35039                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 35040                                  ;
 35041                                  ;   INPUT
 35042                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35043                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
