 35044                                  ;
 35045                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35046                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35047                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 35048                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 35049                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35050                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 35051                                  ;
 35052                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35053                                  ;       AX
 35054                                  ;
 35055                                  ;   NOTES
 35056                                  ;       None
 35057                                  ;
 35058                                  ;   HISTORY
 35059                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35060                                  ;
 35061                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35062                                  
 35063                                  skip_delim:       ; returns carry set if eol/eof
 35064                                          call    get_char        ;
 35065                                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 35066                                          jc	short skip_token_done ;
 35067                                          call    delim           ;
 35068                                          je	short skip_delim ;
 35069                                          jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 35070                                  
 35071                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35072                                  ;
 35073                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 35074                                  ;
 35075                                  ;   INPUT
 35076                                  ;       AL == last character read
 35077                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35078                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35079                                  ;
 35080                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35081                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35082                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 35083                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35084                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35085                                  ;
 35086                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35087                                  ;       AX
 35088                                  ;
 35089                                  ;   NOTES
 35090                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 35091                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 35092                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 35093                                  ;
 35094                                  ;   HISTORY
 35095                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35096                                  ;
 35097                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35098                                  
 35099                                  skip_opt_line:
 35100                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35101                                          je	short skip_line_done
 35102                                       
 35103                                  	; fall into skip_line
 35104                                  
 35105                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35106                                  ;
 35107                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 35108                                  ;
 35109                                  ;   INPUT
 35110                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35111                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35112                                  ;
 35113                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35114                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35115                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35116                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35117                                  ;
 35118                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35119                                  ;       AX
 35120                                  ;
 35121                                  ;   NOTES
 35122                                  ;       None
 35123                                  ;
 35124                                  ;   HISTORY
 35125                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35126                                  ;
 35127                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35128                                  
 35129                                  skip_line:
 35130                                          call    get_char
 35131                                          jc	short skip_line_done
 35132                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35133                                          jne	short skip_line
 35134                                  skip_line_done:
 35135                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35136                                          retn
 35137                                  
 35138                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35139                                  ;
 35140                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 35141                                  ;
 35142                                  ;   INPUT
 35143                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35144                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35145                                  ;
 35146                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35147                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 35148                                  ;       BX == binary #
 35149                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 35150                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35151                                  ;
 35152                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35153                                  ;       AX
 35154                                  ;
 35155                                  ;   NOTES
 35156                                  ;       None
 35157                                  ;
 35158                                  ;   HISTORY
 35159                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35160                                  ;
 35161                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35162                                  
 35163                                  ; 13/05/2019
 35164                                  
 35165                                  get_number:
 35166                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 35167                                  num_loop:
 35168                                          call    get_char        ;
 35169                                          jc	short num_done	;
 35170                                          cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 35171                                          jb	short num_done	; no more number
 35172                                          cmp     al,'9'          ;
 35173                                          ja	short num_done	;
 35174                                          push    ax              ;
 35175                                          mov     ax,10           ;
 35176                                          push    dx              ;
 35177                                          mul     bx              ;
 35178                                          pop     dx              ;
 35179                                          mov     bx,ax           ;
 35180                                          pop     ax              ;
 35181                                          sub     al,'0'          ;
 35182                                          cbw                     ;
 35183                                          add     bx,ax           ;
 35184                                          jmp	short num_loop	;
 35185                                  
 35186                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35187                                  ;num_done:
 35188                                          ;retn
 35189                                  
 35190                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35191                                  ;
 35192                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 35193                                  ;
 35194                                  ;   INPUT
 35195                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35196                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35197                                  ;
 35198                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35199                                  ;       AL == next character
 35200                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 35201                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35202                                  ;
 35203                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35204                                  ;       AX
 35205                                  ;
 35206                                  ;   NOTES
 35207                                  ;       None
 35208                                  ;
 35209                                  ;   HISTORY
 35210                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35211                                  ;
 35212                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35213                                  
 35214                                  get_char:
 35215                                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 35216                                          jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 35217                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 35218                                  	es	
 35219                                  	lodsb
 35220                                          mov     ah,al           ;
 35221                                          retn			;
 35222                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 35223                                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 35224                                  nearby_ret:
 35225                                          retn
 35226                                  
 35227                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35228                                  ;
 35229                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 35230                                  ;
 35231                                  ;   INPUT
 35232                                  ;       AL == current command code
 35233                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35234                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 35235                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 35236                                  ;
 35237                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35238                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 35239                                  ;
 35240                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35241                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 35242                                  ;
 35243                                  ;   NOTES
 35244                                  ;       None
 35245                                  ;
 35246                                  ;   HISTORY
 35247                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35248                                  ;
 35249                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35250                                  
 35251                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35252                                  query_user:
 35253                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 35254                                          ;jz	short qu_1		;
 35255                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35256                                  	;jmp	short skip_all		;
 35257                                  	jnz	short skip_all
 35258                                  qu_1:
 35259                                  	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 35260                                          jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 35261                                          push    ax                      ;
 35262                                          mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 35263                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 35264                                          jnz	short query_all		; yes
 35265                                          test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 35266                                          ;jnz	short query_all		;
 35267                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35268                                  	;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 35269                                  	jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 35270                                  query_all:
 35271                                  
 35272                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 35273                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 35274                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 35275                                  
 35276                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35277                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 35278                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35279                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 35280                                  
 35281                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 35282                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 35283                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 35284                                  find_match:                             ;
 35285                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 35286                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 35287                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 35288                                          inc     di                      ;
 35289                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 35290                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 35291                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 35292                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 35293                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 35294                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 35295                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 35296                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 35297                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35298                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 35299                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 35300                                          inc     di                      ;
 35301                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35302                                          int     21h                     ;
 35303                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 35304                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 35305                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 35306                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 35307                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 35308                                  cmd_notset:
 35309                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 35310                                  line_print:                             ;
 35311                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 35312                                          es
 35313                                  	lodsb
 35314                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 35315                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 35316                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 35317                                  non_null:                               ;
 35318                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 35319                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 35320                                          jne	short non_space		;
 35321                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 35322                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 35323                                  non_space:                              ;
 35324                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35325                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 35326                                          int     21h                     ;
 35327                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 35328                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 35329                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 35330                                  
 35331                                  generic_prompt:
 35332                                          call    print                   ;
 35333                                  input_loop:                             ;
 35334                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 35335                                          int     16h                     ;
 35336                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 35337                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 35338                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 35339                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 35340                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 35341                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 35342                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 35343                                  not_func:
 35344                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 35345                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 35346                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35347                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 35348                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35349                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 35350                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 35351                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 35352                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 35353                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 35354                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 35355                                  legal_char:                             ;
 35356                                          call    disp_input              ;
 35357                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35358                                  
 35359                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 35360                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 35361                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35362                                  	clc
 35363                                  do_cmd:
 35364                                  	pop     ax			;
 35365                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35366                                  	; cf=0
 35367                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 35368                                  	retn
 35369                                  
 35370                                  skip_cmd:
 35371                                  	pop     ax			;
 35372                                  skip_all:
 35373                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 35374                                  	stc
 35375                                  	retn
 35376                                  
 35377                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35378                                  ;
 35379                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 35380                                  ;
 35381                                  ;   INPUT
 35382                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 35383                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35384                                  ;
 35385                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35386                                  ;       None
 35387                                  ;
 35388                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35389                                  ;       None
 35390                                  ;
 35391                                  ;   NOTES
 35392                                  ;       None
 35393                                  ;
 35394                                  ;   HISTORY
 35395                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35396                                  ;
 35397                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35398                                  
 35399                                  print_error:
 35400                                          push    ax
 35401                                          push    bx
 35402                                          push    cx
 35403                                          push    dx
 35404                                          push    ds
 35405                                          push    cs
 35406                                          pop     ds
 35407                                          pushf
 35408                                          call    get_linenum
 35409                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 35410                                          call    error_line
 35411                                          popf
 35412                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 35413                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 35414                                          call    print
 35415                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 35416                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 35417                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 35418                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 35419                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 35420                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 35421                                  pe_1:     
 35422                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 35423                                          call    print
 35424                                  pe_ret: 
 35425                                  	pop     ds
 35426                                          pop     dx
 35427                                          pop     cx
 35428                                          pop     bx
 35429                                          pop     ax
 35430                                  	retn
 35431                                  
 35432                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35433                                  
 35434                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 35435                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 35436                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 35437                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 35438                                  
 35439                                  disable_autoexec:
 35440                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 35441                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35442                                  
 35443                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35444                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 35445                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 35446                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 35447                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 35448                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 35449                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 35450                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 35451                                  dae_1:
 35452                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 35453                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 35454                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 35455                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 35456                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 35457                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 35458                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 35459                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 35460                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 35461                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 35462                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 35463                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 35464                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 35465                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 35466                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 35467                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 35468                                          dec     bx                      ;
 35469                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 35470                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 35471                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 35472                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 35473                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 35474                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 35475                                          retn
 35476                                  
 35477                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 35478                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35479                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35480                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 35481                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35482                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 35483                                  	mov     dx,' Y'
 35484                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 35485                                  
 35486                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35487                                  
 35488                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 35489                                  
 35490                                  
 35491                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35492

 35494                                  ;
 35495                                  ; procedure : delim
 35496                                  ;
 35497                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35498                                  
 35499                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35500                                  ;
 35501                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35502                                  ;
 35503                                  ;any_delim:
 35504                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35505                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35506                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35507                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35508                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 35509                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35510                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 35511                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35512                                  ;
 35513                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35514                                  
 35515                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35516                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 35517                                  delim:
 35518 00003086 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 35519 00003088 7416                    	je	short delim_ret
 35520                                  
 35521 0000308A 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 35522 0000308C 7412                    	je	short delim_ret
 35523                                  
 35524                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 35525 0000308E 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 35526 00003090 740E                    	je	short delim_ret
 35527 00003092 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 35528 00003094 740A                    	je	short delim_ret
 35529 00003096 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 35530 00003098 7406                    	je	short delim_ret
 35531 0000309A 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 35532 0000309C 7402                    	je	short delim_ret
 35533 0000309E 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 35534                                  
 35535                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35536                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35537                                  ;;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 35538                                  ;	clc
 35539                                  ;;endif
 35540                                  
 35541                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35542                                  delim_ret:
 35543 000030A0 C3                      	retn
 35544

 35554 000030A1 E897F6                  	call	getchr			;skip non-control characters

 35557 000030A8 75F7                    	jne	short newline
 35558 000030AA E88EF6                  	call	getchr
 35559                                  nl_ret:

 35564                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 35565                                  ;
 35566                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35567                                  
 35568                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35569                                  mapcase:
 35570 000030AE 51                      	push	cx
 35571 000030AF 56                      	push	si
 35572 000030B0 1E                      	push	ds
 35573                                  
 35574 000030B1 06                      	push	es
 35575 000030B2 1F                      	pop	ds
 35576                                  
 35577                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35578                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35579                                  ;
 35580                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 35581                                  ;;else
 35582                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 35583                                  ;;endif
 35584                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35585 000030B3 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 35586                                  
 35587                                  convloop:
 35588 000030B5 AC                      	lodsb
 35589 000030B6 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 35590 000030B8 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 35591 000030BA 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 35592 000030BC 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 35593 000030BE 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 35594 000030C0 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 35595                                  noconv:
 35596                                  
 35597                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35598                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35599                                  ;;
 35600                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 35601                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 35602                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 35603                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 35604                                  ;;
 35605                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 35606                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 35607                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 35608                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 35609                                  ;check_eol:
 35610                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35611                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35612                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35613                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35614                                  ;;endif
 35615                                  	
 35616                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35617 000030C3 E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 35618                                  convdone:
 35619 000030C5 1F                      	pop	ds
 35620 000030C6 5E                      	pop	si
 35621 000030C7 59                      	pop	cx
 35622 000030C8 C3                      	retn
 35623                                  
 35624                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35625                                  ;
 35626                                  ; procedure : round
 35627                                  ;
 35628                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 35629                                  ; perform bounds check.
 35630                                  ;
 35631                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35632                                  
 35633                                  round:
 35634 000030C9 50                      	push	ax
 35635 000030CA 2EA1[DE03]              	mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 35636                                  
 35637 000030CE E8F0DF                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 35638                                  
 35639 000030D1 2E0106[E003]            	add	[cs:memhi],ax
 35640 000030D6 2EC706[DE03]0000        	mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 35641 000030DD 2EA1[E003]              	mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 35642 000030E1 2E3B06[A302]            	cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 35643 000030E6 7322                    	jae	short mem_err
 35644 000030E8 2EF606[3614]02          	test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 35645 000030EE 7418                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 35646 000030F0 06                      	push	es
 35647 000030F1 56                      	push	si
 35648 000030F2 2E8B36[3414]            	mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 35649 000030F7 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 35650 000030F9 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 35651 000030FB 48                      	dec	ax
 35652                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 35653 000030FC 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 35654 00003100 2E8026[3614]FD          	and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 35655 00003106 5E                      	pop	si
 35656 00003107 07                      	pop	es
 35657                                  skip_set_devmarksize:
 35658 00003108 58                      	pop	ax
 35659                                  	; 11/12/2022
 35660                                  	; cf = 0
 35661                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35662                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 35663 00003109 C3                      	retn
 35664                                  
 35665                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35666

 35672 0000310C BA[3338]                	mov	dx,badmem

 35675 0000310F E87602                  	call	print
 35676 00003112 E93FD7                  	jmp	stall

 35702                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35703                                  
 35704                                  todigit:
 35705 00003138 2C30                    	sub	al,'0'
 35706                                  	;jb	short notdig  ; 02/11/2022
 35707                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35708 0000313A 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 35709                                  	;cmp	al,9
 35710                                  	;ja	short notdig
 35711                                  	;clc
 35712                                  	;retn
 35713                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35714 0000313C 3C0A                    	cmp	al,10
 35715 0000313E F5                      	cmc
 35716                                  notdig:
 35717                                  	;stc
 35718                                  notdig2:

 35721                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35722                                  ;
 35723                                  ; procedure : getnum
 35724                                  ;
 35725                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 35726                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 35727                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 35728                                  ;
 35729                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35730                                  
 35731                                  getnum:
 35732 00003140 53                      	push	bx
 35733 00003141 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 35734                                  b2:
 35735 00003143 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 35736 00003146 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 35737                                  
 35738 00003148 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 35739 00003149 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 35740                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 35741                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35742 0000314A B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 35743 0000314C F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 35744 0000314E 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 35745 0000314F 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 35746 00003151 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 35747 00003154 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 35748                                  
 35749 00003156 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 35750                                  
 35751 00003157 E8E1F5                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 35752 0000315A 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 35753 0000315C 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 35754 0000315E 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 35755 00003160 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 35756 00003162 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 35757 00003164 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 35758 00003166 7417                    	je	short b15
 35759 00003168 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 35760 0000316D 7410                    	je	short b15
 35761 0000316F 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 35762                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 35763                                  	;nop
 35764                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35765                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35766                                  	;nop
 35767                                  	;nop
 35768 00003171 740C                    	je	short b15
 35769 00003173 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 35770 00003175 7408                    	je	short b15
 35771 00003177 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35772 00003179 7404                    	je	short b15
 35773 0000317B 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 35774 0000317D 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 35775                                  b15:
 35776 0000317F 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 35777 00003184 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 35778                                  b1:
 35779 00003189 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 35780 0000318B 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 35781 0000318D 5B                      	pop	bx
 35782 0000318E C3                      	retn
 35783                                  badnum:
 35784                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35785                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 35786 0000318F 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 35787                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 35788 00003191 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 35789 00003195 5B                      	pop	bx
 35790 00003196 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 35791 00003197 C3                      	retn
 35792                                  
 35793                                  ;****************************************************************************
 35794                                  
 35795                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 35796                                  
 35797                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35798                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 35799                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 35800                                  ;	si = 0
 35801                                  ;	ax = country id
 35802                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 35803                                  ;	bx = file handle
 35804                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 35805                                  ;
 35806                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 35807                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 35808                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 35809                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 35810                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35811                                  
 35812 00003198 57                      	push	di
 35813 00003199 50                      	push	ax
 35814 0000319A 52                      	push	dx
 35815                                  
 35816 0000319B 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 35817 0000319D 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 35818 0000319F B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 35819 000031A2 E84F01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 35820 000031A5 724D                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 35821                                  
 35822 000031A7 06                      	push	es
 35823 000031A8 56                      	push	si
 35824                                  
 35825 000031A9 0E                      	push	cs
 35826 000031AA 07                      	pop	es
 35827                                  
 35828 000031AB BF[5434]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 35829 000031AE B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 35830 000031B1 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 35831                                  
 35832 000031B3 5E                      	pop	si
 35833 000031B4 07                      	pop	es
 35834 000031B5 753D                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 35835                                  
 35836 000031B7 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 35837 000031BA 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 35838 000031BD 7535                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 35839                                  
 35840 000031BF 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 35841 000031C0 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 35842 000031C2 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 35843 000031C5 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 35844 000031C8 E82901                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 35845 000031CB 7227                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 35846                                  
 35847 000031CD 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 35848 000031CF 81F9B601                	cmp	cx, 438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 35849 000031D3 771F                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 35850                                  
 35851 000031D5 46                      	inc	si
 35852 000031D6 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 35853 000031D7 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 35854 000031D8 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 35855 000031D9 5F                      	pop	di
 35856                                  
 35857                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 35858 000031DA 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 35859 000031DD 750A                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 35860                                  
 35861 000031DF 83FA00                  	cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 35862 000031E2 7415                    	je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 35863 000031E4 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 35864 000031E7 7413                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 35865                                  
 35866                                  setdoscntry_next:
 35867 000031E9 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 35868 000031EB 46                      	inc	si
 35869 000031EC 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 35870 000031ED E2EB                    	loop	setdoscntry_find

 36028                                  
 36029                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 36030                                  ;input: al - data id

 36077                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 36078                                  
 36079                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 36080                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 36081                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 36082                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 36083                                  ;	 be moved.
 36084                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 36085                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 36086                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 36087                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 36088                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 36089                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 36090                                  
 36091 000032F4 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 36092 000032F5 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36093 000032F8 F9                      	stc
 36094 000032F9 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 36095 000032FB 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 36096 000032FC 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 36097                                  
 36098 000032FE 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 36099 00003300 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 36100 00003302 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 36101 00003304 F9                      	stc
 36102 00003305 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 36103                                  ricb_exit:
 36104 00003307 C3                      	retn

 36108                                  set_country_path:
 36109                                  
 36110                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 36111                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 36112                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 36113                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 36114                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.

 36136
